Womuwika kwa wanhu hawawele Wayahudi leka wambeze, yasubuligwe ng'hobwa na kugazigwa na kumkopola kwa kumuwamba mumsalaba, ila zuwa lya kadatu kulawa yabagame kozilipuligwa.”
Aho mayawo wana wa Zebedayo nakamuyila Yesu hamwe na wanage, kafugama kumwando kwa hoyali na kumlanda chinhu.
Yesu kamuuza, “Kwangugana choni?” Ayo mamo kamlonjela, “Ulonje kota kuli undewa wa hegwe, awa wana wa heni weli wochikala yumwe kudilo kwa hegwe na yumwe kumoso.”
Yesu kamlonjela, “Hamvizelele mwangulanda choni! Ndaze, moweza kung'hwela chizombe cha kugazigwa chonding'hwela heni?” Wamwidichila, “Toweza.”

Yesu kawalonjela, “Mwangukomya mong'hwela chizombe cha kugazigwa chonding'hwela heni, ila kikala kudilo ama kumoso kwa heni haiwele mbuli ya heni kudita, mbuli ayo Mhaza wa heni nakawahagula walinguganigwa kikala honhu hala na kahi nakawagongomanyila honhu kwa chiwalo cha hewo.”
Wala walanguswa wanji kumi lowahuliche ago, wawazudila awo wang'holozawo weli.
Ahyo Yesu nakawachema, kawalonjela, “Mvizela vilongozi wa isi zinji walongozaga wanhu wawo kwa lupichi, na wakulu awo wawemililaga wanhu wawo.
Ila kwa hemwe ileche kuwa ahyo, leka yalingugana yawe mkulu hali hemwe, yawe chitumagwa wa weng'ha,
na yalingugana yawe wa mwaluko hali hemwe, igana yawe chitumagwa wa hemwe.
Hihyo vyoiwele, Mwana wa Munhu hoyile kukolelwa mijito, ila kuwakolela mijito na kuulavya ukomu wa heni kwa ulohozi wa wanhu wenji.”
Yesu loyali yokuka kuli muji wa Yeliko, lung'hongola lwa wanhu nalumuwinza.
Lelo, kwali na wohambe walole weli wekale hafungo mwa nzila, na lowahuliche kota Yesu yaliyokola aho, nawachemeleza, “Mkulu, mwana wa Daudi, utonele isungu!”
Lula lung'hongola lwa wanhu luwang'anuchila na kuwalonjela wanyamalile. Ila hewo walutilila kuchemelela, “Mkulu, mwana wa Daudi, utonele isungu!”
Yesu nakema, kawachema na kuwauza, “Mwangugana ndiwaditile choni?”
Nawamwidichila, “Mkulu, twangulanda meho ga hetwe gagubuche.”
Lelo, Yesu kawonela isungu, kawadoliza meho gawo, na bahala waluka kulola goya, wamuwinza.
Yesu na walanguswa wa heye lowafichile behi na Yelusalemu wafichile Betifage kuli chidunda cha Mizeituni, nakawalajiza walanguswa wa heye weli,
nakawalonjela, “Mlute mbaka hali chijiji chiwele kumwando kwa hemwe molifika idogowi na mwana idogowi liwohigwe. Jichumuleni mujigale kwa heni.
Wone munhu yawauze mbuli, mumlonjele ‘Mkulu kanguwagana,’ Na heye kowalechelani baho.”
Mbuli ino na ikoleka leka gala galonjigwe na mloli wa Nguluwi genele,
“Muulonjele muji wa Sayuni,
ulole, Mndewa wa hegwe kanguya!
Kaliholile na kakwina idogowi,
mwana wa idogowi.”
Ahyo, wala walanguswa nawadita kota Yesu vyoyawalajize.
Waligala lila idogowi na mwanage, watambalika nguwo za hewo mchanya hao na Yesu kekalisa mchanya mwake.
Lung'hongola lwa wanhu nawazanza nguwo zawo mbalabala, na wanji watema miputi ja migodi wanzanza mbalabala.
Lung'hongola lwa wanhu walongole na wala walingumuwinza wakwiniza lizi.
“Lutogo kwa Mwana wa Daudi!
Nguluwi yamtogole heye yalinguya kwa itagwa lya Mkulu!
Lutogo kwa Nguluwi kuchanya!”
Yesu loyaliyokwinjila Yelusalemu, muji weng'ha naumema luchenze. Wanhu wali wouza, “Ayu ka whaani?”
Wanhu kuli wala wamemile walonga, “Ayu ndo Yesu mloli wa Nguluwi, kangulawa Nazaleti isi ya Galilaya.”

Lelo, Yesu nakenjila mli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, kawawinga wanhu kunze wali woguza kugula vinhu mgati mwa ng'handa ya Nguluwi. Kagudula visaga vya wala wali wovunza sendi, kagudula vigoda vya wala wali woguza ng'hunda.
Kawalonjela, “Yandichigwa kuli Maandiko Matakatifu, ‘Ng'handa ya heni yochemigwa nghanda ya kulandila.’ Ila hemwe muigalula iwa mhalika ya wabokaji!”
Wawele hambe walole na waziliche ng'huli nawamlutila kuko kuli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, na heye kawalohola.

Lelo, watambika wakulu na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa nawazudila lowawene vinduzanduza vyoyaditile Yesu, na kahi wana lowali wochemelela kuli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi wolonga, “Lutogo kwa Mwana wa Daudi.”
Ahyo wamlonjela, “Ndaze, hulinguhulika chowolonga?” Yesu nakawedichile, “Ena, ndanguhulika! Ndaze, hamnasoma gandichigwe aga?
‘Kuwalangusa wana wadodo na wali chali
wanguwa na lutogo ng'hatu.’”
Leka, kawaleka, kalawa kunze ya muji wa Besania, nakuwasa kuko.
Yesu loyali yohiluka kuli muji lokuwele kung'hali lufuku, nakona nzala.

Nakalyona igodi limwe lya misada hafungo mwa nzila, kalilutila, ila kalifika lilihela mafuza goneche leka mahamba yeka. Lelo, kalilonjela, “Uleche kulela kahi mafuza mazuwa gose!” Baho alyo igodi lya misada naliswina.
Walanguswa lowawene wabubuwala wolonga, “Lekachoni igodi ali lya misada liswina baho du?”

Yesu nakawedichila, “Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, wone muwe na makundo ne kuwa na majesa, modaha kudita vyonditile kuli lila igodi lya misada, leka nawone mchilonjele chidunda chino, ‘Ung'humbuche ukagwe kuli bahali,’ Yokoleka hihyo.
Na muwe na makundo, choneche chomumlanda Nguluwi mopegwa.”
Yesu nakenjila mli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, kawa yolangusa. Loyali yolangusa, watambika wakulu na wasekelu wa wanhu wamuuza, “Kwangudita mbuli zino kwa ludali lwachi? Yalikohi yakupele ludali luno?”
Yesu kawedichila, “Na heni ndowauzani chinhu chimwe, lomkwidichila, leka nani ndowalonjelani ndangudita mbuli azi kwa ludali lwachi.

Ndanguwauza mndonjele, ndaze, ludali lwa Yohani lwa kubatiza nalulawa kwa whaani? Ndaze, nalulawa kwa Nguluwi ama kwa wanhu?” Ila naweuza hewo kwa hewo hino, “Hotulonga, ‘Naulawa kilanga, kotuuza, Lelo, mbona hamumkundile?’
Ila hotulonga, ‘Nalulawa kwa wanhu,’ Twangudumba wanhu wamemile mina hewo weng'ha wangukunda kota Yohani ndo mloli wa Nguluwi.”
Lelo, nawamwidichila, “Hatuvizelele!” Na heye Yesu nakawalonjela, “Na heni kahi siwalonjela ndangudita mbuli zino kwa ludali lwachi.
“Hemwe mwangijesa ndaze kwa mbuli ayi, kwali na munhu yumwe yali na wana weli. Nakamlonjela yula wa mwaluko, ‘Mwanangu, lehano ulute ukadite mijito kuli mgunda wa zabibu.’
Yula msongolo nakamlonjela, ‘Ndema!’ Hamba kagalusa kaluta kumgunda.
Yula mhaza kamlonjela mwana wa keli hiho, na heye kedichila, ‘Ena mhaza ndoluta!’ Ila halutile kukola mijito.
Ndaze, yalikohi kuli awa weli yaditile kota vyoyaganile mhaza wa heye?” Wamwidichila, “Ayula wa mwaluko.”
Lelo, Yesu kawalonjela, “Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, wakongoza sendi na wahonzolomo wokwinjila kuli Undewa wa Nguluwi kusinda hemwe.
Yohani na koya kwa hemwe kawalajila nzila inojile ya ukomu, na hemwe hamumkundile, ila wakongoza sendi na wahonzolomo nawamkunda. Nahomuwene ago gengha hemwe mlema ne kumfugamila na kumkunda.”

Yesu kalonga, “Hulichizeni nhelo yinji. Munhu yumwe yawele na ng'handa nakalima mgunda wa zabibu, nakazungulusila lugagala, kabawa ideho lya kukamila divai, kazenga mumo chidandalo kahi. Hamba nakawabasila walimi, heye koka nakaheluka isi ya kutali.
Mhela wa kubeta loufichile, nakawalajiza vitumagwa kwa wala wanhu wakahole chasi cha mbena ya heye.
Wala wanhu wawebata awo vitumagwa, yumwe wamsubula, yunji wamkopola na yunji wamtowa na maganga.
Ayo munhu nakawalajiza vitumagwa wanji, wenji kupuluta wala wa mwaluko. Wala wanhu wawaditila hihila.
Vyokudumile kamlajiza mwanage aku yochijesa, ‘Womhulichiza mwana wa heni.’
Ila wala wanhu lowamuwene mwanage walonga hewo kwa hewo, ‘Ayu ndo yohalila, tumkopole leka tuhole uhalizi wa heye!’
Aho wamibata, wamlavya kunze ya ula mgunda wa zabibu, wamkopola.
“Yesu nakawauza lelo, ayo yawele na mgunda wa zabibu loyokuya, kowadita ndaze awo wanhu?”
Hewo wamwidichila, “Kowabagamiza vibi awo wehile,” “Na ula mgunda wa zabibu kowapa walimi wanji wowa wompa chasi cha mbena mhela wake.”
Aho Yesu kawalonjela, “Ndaze, hamsomile mbuli ino kuli Maandiko Matakatifu?
‘Iganga lya kuzenjela walilemile walinguzenga,
sambi liwa iganga likulu lya msisi.
Mkulu ndo yaditile mbuli ayi,
nayo ndo ya kububuwaza ng'hatu kwa hetwe!’
“Yesu nakonjezela kulonga,” Ahyo ndanguwalonjelani, “Undewa wa Nguluwi wokusigwa kwa hemwe na kupegwa wanhu hawawele Wayahudi walingulavya mafuza ganojile.
Yoneche yogwa mchanya mwa iganga alyo kobeneka pasapasa, na wone iganga limgwile munhu yoneche, lyomhondanga.”
Watambika wakulu na Mafalisayo lowahuliche azo nhelo za heye wata kanguwalonga hewo.
Lelo wali wopala chinhu cha kumibata, ila nawaliwodumba wanhu kwa vila hewo nawavizela heye Yesu yali mloli wa Nguluwi wa Nguluwi.
Yesu nakalonga nawo kahi kwa nhelo,
“Undewa wa kilanga wiwhana kota hino, kwali na mndewa yamditichile mwanage mnvina ya kuhesa.
Lelo, kawalajiza vitumagwa wawacheme walalikwe woye kuli mnvina, ila wala walalikwe walema kuya.
Kawalajiza kahi vitumagwa wanji, yolonga, ‘Muwalonjele wala walalikwe, ndiya ya heni ya goya sambi, isenga lya heni na ilogota lihatile wachinjigwa, chila chinhu cha goya, muye kuli izenjele.’
Ila hewo hawang'ulile, waluta, yumwe kumgunda kwa heye, yunji kuli mbuli za heye,
na wanji wawebata awala vitumagwa wawaliga na kuwakopola.
Yula mndewa nakazudila, kawalajiza wamizi wa heye wakawabagamize awo wakopolaji na kuwasomela luga lwao.
Hamba kawalonjela vitumagwa wa heye, ‘Ndiya ya izenjele ya goya ng'hatu, ila walalikwe wachakachaka.
Lelo, mlute kuli nzila mhanda na woneche wala womuwafika wachemeni woye kuli izenjele.’
Wala vitumagwa walawa, waluta kunzila wawegala wanhu weng'ha, wehile na wanojile. Ng'handa ya izenjele na imema wajenzi.
“Mndewa loyenjile kawona wajenzi, kamona munhu yumwe yawele havalile chiuzenjele.
Mndewa kamuuza, ‘Mng'holozangu, kwinjila ndaze hano houvalile chizenjele?’ Ila heye nakanyamalila tulu.
Aho mndewa kawalonjela vitumagwa, ‘Muwopeni magulu na moko mkamtaje kunze kuli kutitu, ako kolila na kujejeda mizino.’”
Yesu nakasinda kwa kulonga, “Walalikwa wenji, ila wahaguligwe wachefu.”
Hamba, Mafalisayo waluta, welonjelela nzila ya kumgwiliza Yesu kwa ulonzi wa heye.

Lelo, wawalajiza vitumagwa wa hewo hamwe na walanguswa wa chilundo cha Helodi. Nawamuuza, “Mlangusa, tuvizela kota hegwe kwa munhu utanganiche, na kota kwa kulangusa nzila ya Nguluwi kwa kukomya ng'hatu, hulingumdumba munhu yoneche, mina ukulu wa munhu hauwele chinhu kwa hegwe.
Lelo, tulonjele majesa ga hegwe. Ndaze, iwa goya au hebu kulavya kodi kwa mndewa wa Loma?”
Ila Yesu nakavizela wihe wa hewo wowalingijesa nakuwalonjela, “Hemwe wahadi lekachoni mwangunjeza?
Mndajile sendi yomlingulavila kodi.” Na hewo wamlavila igwala lya sendi.
Lelo, Yesu nakawauza, “Mutwi na itagwa ali ndo lya whaani?”
Nawamwidichila, “Ndo cha mndewa wa Loma.” Aho Yesu kawalonjela, “Lelo, ga mndewa wa Loma mmigalile mndewa wa Loma na ga Nguluwi mmigalile Nguluwi.”
Lowahuliche ahyo nawabubuwala wamleka, woka.
Zuwa alyo, wamwe wa Masadukayo nawawele wolonga wabagame hawozilipuka nawamlutila Yesu.
Lelo, nawamlonjela, “Mlangusa, Musa nakalonga munhu yaholile mdala wone yabagame ne kulela mwana, imgana mng'holoze, yamhole yula mdala mlekwa, leka yamlelele wana mng'holoze.
Lelo, aha hetu kwali na wanhu saba wa lulelo lumwe. Wa mwaluko nakabagama ne kulela mwana, ayula mdala mlekwa nakaholeka kahi na mng'holoze.
Iwa hihyo kwa wakeli na wakadatu, mbaka weng'ha saba.
Awo weng'ha lowabagame, na yula mdala nakabagama.
Lelo, zuwa lya wabagame kuzilipuka mdala ayo kowa mdala wa yalikohi kwa wala walume saba? Mina weng'ha saba namhola yuye.”
Yesu nakawedichila, “Hemwe muwifya kwa vila hamgazelele Maandiko Matakatifu ne mong'ho wa Nguluwi.
Mina wabagame howozilipuka hawohesa ne kuhesigwa hebu, wowa kota wahilisi wa kilanga.
Ila kwa mbuli ya kuzilipuka kwa wabagame, ndaze, hamsomile gala goyawalonjele Nguluwi? Nakawalonjela,
‘Heni nda Nguluwi wa Ibulahimu na wa Isaka na wa Yakubu!’ Lelo, heye hawele Nguluwi wa wabagame ila ndo Nguluwi wa wawele wakomu.”
Lula lung'hongola lwa wanhu loluhuliche ahyo, lububuwala kwa ulanguso wa heye.
Masadukayo lowahuliche kota Mafalisayo wahela chinhu chinji cha kumuuza kahi Yesu, nawating'hana hamwe.
Yumwe wa hewo, mtagusa, nakamuuza Yesu kwa kumjeza,
“Mlangusa, malajizo galikohi ndo gawele makulu kuli utaguso?”
Yesu nakamwidichila, “ ‘Umgane Mkulu Nguluwi wa hegwe kwa nhumbula ya hegwe yeng'ha na kwa muhe wa hegwe weng'ha na kwa luhala lwa hegwe lweng'ha.’
Ali ndo ilajizo liwele likulu na lya mwaluko.
Lya keli iwhana na lilyo, ‘Umgane youlingikalasa habehi kota vyoulingigana gwegwe baho.’
Malajizo ga Musa gandichigwe na waloli wa Nguluwi gangitumbila mizilo aji mili.”
Mafalisayo lowating'hane hamwe, Yesu nakawauza,
“Hemwe mwangona ndaze mbuli ya Kilistu Mlohozi? Ka mwana wa whaani?” Wamwidichila, “Mwana Daudi.”
Yesu kawalojela, “Lelo, iwa ndaze,” “Kota kwa ludali lwa Muhe Yelile Daudi kangumchema heye ‘Mkulu’? Mina nakalonga,
‘Mkulu nakamlonjela Mkulu wa heni,
wikale nzingo ya kudilo kwa heni,
mbaka ndiwawiche wang'honyo wa hegwe hasi ha magulu ga hegwe.’
Lelo, wone Daudi kangumchema Kilistu ‘Mkulu,’ iwa ndaze yawe mwana wa heye?”
Kuduhu munhu yoneche yajezile kumwidichila chinhu. Na kulawa zuwa lila kuduhu ne munhu kahi yajezile kumuuza chinhu.
Hamba Yesu kawalonjela wanhu wamemile hamwe na walanguswa wa heye, Nakalonga.
Nakawalonjela, Walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo wana ludali lwa kutang'hula malajizo.
Lelo, mibatilile na kudita choneche chowowalonjelani. Ila mleche kuwinza chowodita, vila hawalingudita gala gowalingudamla kwa wanhu.
Wawohaga itunyo na kuwapapiza wayawo mmayega, ila hewo wawo wangulema kugolola ne chidole wapape.
Hewo huditaga madito gawo leka wanhu wawone. Mlole ukulu wa vibende vilingulajila Malajizo mchihanga na mmoko na mlole kugonzoka kwa lupembo lwa utabuli wa mikoti jawo.
Huganaga kikala honhu hatanganiche kuli mnvina na vigoda vitanganiche kuli ng'handa za kusalila.
Waganaga kulamsigwa kwa kutogoligwa kuli masoko na wogana kuchemigwa na wanhu, “Mlangusa.”
Ila hemwe mleche chemigwa ng'oo “Mlangusa”, mina mlanguswa wa hemwe ndo yumwe hela, hemwe mweng'ha mwa lukolo lumwe.
Namleche kumchema munhu yoneche “Mhaza,” Hano hali isi, mina Mhaza wa hemwe ndo yumwe hela, yawele kilanga.
Namleche kuchemigwa, “Vilongozi,” Mina mlongozi wa hemwe ndo yumwe hela, yuye Kilistu Mlohozi.
Yawele mng'hangala hali hemwe yawe chitumagwa wa hemwe.
Yochikwiniza koduliswa, na yoneche yawele liholile kokwinizwa.

“Mochona mwemwe walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, mwawahadi! Mwanguhinda lwizi lwa undewa wa kilanga hali meho ga wanhu. Hemwe mwemwe hamlingwinjila mng'handa, na mwanguwalemeza wanji walingugana kwinjila wenjile.

Mochona mwemwe walangusa wa malajizo na Mafalisayo, mwawahadi! Mwanguwabunza na kwa usugu mwanguwasukula walekwa ng'handa za hewo na kisinjizila kota mwa wanhu wanojile kwa kulanda kwa kulutilila. Lelo kwa mbuli ahyo mogazigwa lukami.

“Mochona mwemwe walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, mwawahadi! Mwanguheluka kuli bahali na isi zinji leka muwe munhu yumwe yawinze chila chomlingukunda hemwe. Homuwa na heye, mwangumdita yalute kuli chiluli cha Jehanamu kusinda hila vyoyawele.

“Mochona mwemwe vilongozi hambe mlole! Hemwe mwangulangusa, ‘Wone munhu yochilaha kwa Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, kilaha ako hakuwele chinhu, ila one yelahe kwa zahabu ya Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, kilaha ako kwangumibata.’
Hemwe hambe mlole wapoka! Chakohi chitanganiche ng'hatu? Dhahabu au Ng'handa ya Nguluwi lilinguidita ayo dhahabu iwe yelile?
Kahi mwangulonga kuta one munhu yelahe kwa honhu ha kulavila nhambiko haiwele chinhu, ila one yelahe kuli nhambiko iwichigwe hachanya ha alitale, kilaha ako humbataga.
Hemwe mohambe mlole! Chakohi chiwele chitanganiche ng'hatu, aila nhambiko, au hala hali alitale ndo halinguidita ayo nhambiko iwe yelile?
Munhu yalingilaha kwa hala honhu helile kelaha kwa hala kuli alitale, na choneche chiwichigwe hachanya hake.
Na yalingilaha kwa Ng'handa ya Nguluwi kelaha kwa ayo Ng'handa ya Nguluwi na kahi kwa yula Nguluwi yekale mgati.
Na yalingilaha kwa kilanga kelaha kwa chigoda cha undewa cha Nguluwi, na kwa heye Nguluwi yalingikala mchigoda acho.

Mochona mwemwe walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, wahadi! Mwangulavya kwa Nguluwi chinhu chimwe kulawa kuli vinhu kumi na tangawizi kota vila mahamba galingununyilila, binzali na jila na aku mleka vinhu vitanganiche kuli Malajio ga Musa kota vila mbuli zilingutagusa goya na isungu na makundo. Ahi ndo vyomlinguganigwa kudita ne kusemwa zila zinji.
Vilongozi wohambe mlole! Mwangusa chinhu chidodo kota ng'honzi kuli mang'hwa, ila mwangumela chinhu chikulu kota isenga.
“Mochona mwemwe walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, wahadi! Mwanguhovuga chizombe na chisaye kwa kunze, ila mgati mwanguleka chimemile ubuhu vinhu vihile vya ubochelezi.
Mfalisayo hambe ulole! Uhovuje chizombe mgati tandi na kunze kowa kuzelu hihyo.

“Mochona mwemwe walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, wahadi! Mfanda kota vilaga. Mwangubakaliza lung'halilo luzelu kwa kunze gangoneka gangung'hala, ila kwa mgati gamemile mizeje ja wabagame na chila chinhu chihile.
Vivila kahi na hemwe mwangoneka na wanhu kwa kunze kota mtanganika, ila kwa mgati mmemile uhadi na wihe.
“Mochona mwemwe walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo, wahadi! Mwanguzenga vilaga vya waloli na kung'haliza vilaga vya wanhu watanganiche.
Mwangulonga, ‘Kota hetwe natwalingikala mhela wa wasekulu wa hetwe twahali kihanza na hewo kuli mbuli ya kuwakopola waloli.’
Hambi mwangulavya ulolezi mwemwe baho kota hemwe mwa wana wa wanhu wawakopole waloli.
Ena, mgongomanye jila mijito jowaluche wasekulu wa hemwe.
Hemwe lulelo lwa mizoka jiwele na dunga! Mouhusa ndaze utaguso wa chiluli cha Jehanamu.

Ndo mina heni ndanguwahilichila hemwe waloli, wanhu wawele na luhala na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa, mowakopola na kuwagaza wamwe wa hewo, na wanji mowasubula ng'hobwa kuli ng'handa za kusalila na kuwapala kuli chila honhu.

Hino nongwa yeng'ha yokuyilani kwa mbuli ya danda yeng'ha ya wanhu watanganiche iboholigwe mchanya mwa isi. Ena, kulawa kukopoligwa kwa Abeli yali hela nongwa mbaka kukopoligwa kwa Zakalia, mwana wa Balakia, yula mumkopole kuli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi hala honhu helile na alitale.
Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, lulelo alu logazigwa kwa mbuli ino ya kukopola.

“Yelusalemu! Gwa Yelusalemu! Kwanguwakopola waloli na kuwatowa kwa maganga wala watumigwe kwa hegwe. Lwa kalinga njeza kuwakungajiza wana wa hegwe kwa heni kota vila ng'huku vyoilingukungajiza vinziya vya heye hasi hali mbawa za heye, ila hegwe nahuviganile!
Hambi lelo, ng'handa ya hegwe yolekwa chihame.
Ndanguwalonjelani, humbona kahi mbaka mhela houlonga, ‘Yatambichizwe ayo yalinguya kwa itagwa lya Mkulu.’”
Yesu nakalawa kuli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, naloyali yoluta, walanguswa wa heye nawamlutila, wamlajila vyoizenjigwe goya Ng'handa ya Nguluwi.
Yesu kawalonjela, “Ena, moweza kugalola aga geng'ha! Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, kuduhu ne iganga limwe lipona aho mchanya mwa liyage, chila chinhu chowifigwa.”

Yesu loyali yekale mchanya mwa chidunda cha Mzeituni, walanguswa nawamlutila chinyele hafungo, nawamuuza, “Utulonjele mbuli azi zolawila hanili? Chilajilo chachi chitulajila kuya kwa hegwe na kuduma kwa mhela?”
Yesu kawedichila, “Milolele mleche kuhadigwa na munhu.
Mina wenji wolawila wolonga chila yumwe kota, ‘Heni ndo Kilistu Mlohozi’ Na hewo wowajiliza wanhu wenji.
Mohulika mbuli ya ngondo na uhesi wa ngondo, ila mleche kisinza, mina ago gokuya kulawila, ila kuduma kung'hali.
Isi imwe yochitowa na isi iyage, undewa umwe wochitowa na undewa uyage. Ahano na ahala howa na nzala na jimachinyina.
Geng'ha ago ndo kota mwaluko wa usungu wa kulela mwana.
“Hamba wowalavya leka mgazigwe na kukopoligwa. Isi zeng'ha zowazudilani kwa mbuli ya itagwa lya heni.
Kahi, wenji woleka makundo ga hewo, wochibagula na kizudila.
Wolawila waloli wenji wa udesi wowajiliza wanhu wenji.
Kwa mbuli ya konjezeka kwa wehile, igano lya munhu lyotita.
Ila munhu yula yokwimilila mbaka kuduma ndo heye yoloholigwa.
Leka, mwiso haunafika, Mbuli Inojile ya Undewa wa Nguluwi yodamligwa kota ulolezi kwa nhanzi zeng'ha.
“Lelo, lomkona ‘Izudizo lilinguwifya Ng'handa ya Nguluwi,’ Lilonjigwe na mloli wa Nguluwi Danyeli lima honhu Helile, yalingusoma yavizele vyoili.”
Aho, wawele Yudeya na wabilimile kuchidunda.
Yawele kuchanya mwa chiswiswili cha ng'handa ya heye, yaleche kidulika kuhola chinhu mng'handa.
Yawele kumgunda yaleche kuhiluka kumbele kuhola nguwo ya heye.
Wochona wawo wachimai wawele na himila na walingonyeza zuwa azo!
Mumlande Nguluwi leka kubilima kwa hemwe kuleche kuwa mhela wa mbeho ama zuwa lya kwesela!
Mina mhela awo kowa na kugaya ng'hatu kohakunalawila kuli mwaluko wa isi mbaka lehano, na hailawila kahi.
Wone zuwa azo naziwe hazipunguzigwe, kuduhu munhu ne yumwe yahawele yoloholigwa, ila zuwa azo zipunguzigwa na Nguluwi kwa mbuli ya wala wahaguligwe.
“Lelo, munhu yowalonjelani mazuwa ago, ‘Mlole Kilistu Mlohozi kahano’ Ama ‘Ka ahala,’ mleche kukunda.
Mina wokuya Kilistu wa udesi na waloli wa udesi. Wodita ulajilo mkulu na vinduzanduza leka wojeza kuwajiliza wala wahaguligwe na Nguluwi.
Mhulichize, mina nandiwalonjela mhela haunafika.
Lelo, howowalonjelani, ‘Mlole, ka kugunuche,’ Mleche kuluta ako, ama, ‘Mlole, kevisa mng'handa,’ Mleche kunda.
Mina kota vila lumwemwesa lwa limlungu kulawa kolulawilaga mbaka koluzibilaga isanya, ahyo ndo vyoiwa kuya kwa Mwana wa Munhu.
Ahala hohawele mtufi, ndo hojimema mikungule.
“Hala hokumala kugaya ako, isanya lowichigwa jiza na nyelezi halibunguzuka. Nhondwe zolagala kulawa kilanga na mong'ho ubatilile vinhu avyo vyeng'ha wotigaswa.
Hamba, ulajilo wa Mwana wa Munhu wokoneka kilanga, na aho nhanzi zeng'ha muisi zodama, womona Mwana wa Munhu yokuya ha ng'hungugu ya kilanga yawele na ludali na ukulu lwinji.
Na heye kowalajiza wahilisi wa kilanga wa heye wawele na mhalamhanda ilinguyowa ng'hatu, na hewo wowakungajiza wahaguligwe wa heye kuli nzingo zeng'ha zine, kulawila kilanga kweng'ha.
“Kwa ikuyu milanguse nhelo ayi, hala nhagala lozikwaluka kutitima na kubahula, mwanguvizela kota mhela wa nhonya wa habehi.
Hivyo du hemwe homkona mbuli zino zeng'ha ziditikwa, mvizele kota Mwana wa Munhu kahabehi kuya.
Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, lulelo alu halubagama vinhu avi vyeng'ha havinalawila.
Ulanga na isi zopuluta, ila ulonzi wa heni haupuluta hebu.
“Ila, kwa mbuli ya zuwa au saa ayo, kuduhu munhu yavizelele yokuya hanili, ne wahilisi wa kilanga, ne Mwana. Mhaza yaliyeng'ha ndo yavizelele.
Kota hila vyonaiwele mhela wa Nuhu, ndo vyoiwa kuya kwa Mwana wa Munhu.
Mina mhela awo, mazi tendema nalogang'hali lawila, wanhu wali wolya na kung'hwa, wohola na kuholeka, mbaka Nuhu loyenjile mgati mwa itumbwi ling'hangala.
Nahawavizelele kwali na choni mbaka gala mazi tendema logalawile, gawabagamiza weng'ha. Ndo vyoiwa mhela Mwana wa Munhu hoyokuya.
Mhela awo wanhu weli wowa kumgunda, yumwe koholigwa na yumwe kolechigwa.
Wadala weli wowa wolipula sokolo, yumwe koholigwa na yumwe kulechigwa.
“Lelo, mikale meho, kwa vila hamvizelele zuwa hoyokuya Mkulu wa hemwe.
Mvizele hino, wone yawele na ng'handa nayavizele mhizi hoyokuya yahawele meho, nahalileka ng'handa ya heye ibenigwe.
Leka ahyo, mwime goya, kwa vila Mwana wa Munhu kokuya saa yohamuizelele.”
Yesu kalutilila kulonga, “Yalikohi lelo chitumagwa wa kitumbila na yawele na luhala, wone mkulu wa heye yamuwiche hachanya ha wanhu weng'ha, yawape chilyo kwa mhela wuwula?
Kobweda yula chitumagwa wone mkulu wa heye loyohiluka komfika yodita ahyo.
Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, komuwika chitumagwa ayo yalolelaje lufufu lwa heye lweng'ha.
Ila wone chitumagwa yehile yelonjele mnhumbula, ‘Mkulu wa heni kakawa kuhiluka,’
Hamba nakwaluka kuwatowa vitumagwa wayage, nakwaluka kulya na kung'hwa hamwe na walingugala,
mkulu wa heye mpogozi kokuya zuwa lohalizelele na saa yohaizelele.
Komgaza vibi na kumuwika mchilundo chimwe na wadesi. Ako kowa na chililo na kugwalaza mizino.
“Mhela awo, undewa wa kilanga ufanda kota wahinza kumi waholile vimwemwesa vyao, waluta kumbochela mkasano.
Wahano wa hewo wali wapoka na wahano wanji wali na luhala.
Wala wapoka nawahola vimwemwesa vyao, ila hawaholile na mafuta ga kuwesela.
Ila wala wawele na luhala nawahola mibuli ja mafuta gawo hamwe na vimwemwesa vyao.
Kwa vila mkasano na kakawila kuya, wala wahinza weng'ha nawasinzila, wawasa.
Hagati ha nechilo kwali na iyowe, ‘Mwela yoo, mwela yoo! Mkasano kanguya mlute kumbochela.’
Aho wala wahinza weng'ha walilimka, waviwika goya vimwemwesa vyao.
Wala wapoka wawalonjela wala wawele na luhala, ‘Mtujidile mafuta mado ga hemwe mina vimwemwesa vya hetwe vyanguzima.’
Ila wala nawawele na luhala wawalonjela, ‘Hogotukwila hebu hetwe na hemwe! Igana mlute kowalinguguza mkegulile mwemwe!’
Lelo, wala wahinza wapoka lowalutile kugula mafuta, mkasano nakafika. Wala wahinza nawawele goya wenjila hamwe na heye mli ng'handa ya mkasano, hamba lwizi luhindigwa.
Hamba wala wahinza wanji nawoya, wachema, ‘Mkulu, mkulu, tuchumulile!’
Ila heye kawedichila, ‘Ndanguwalonjela ndikomya, siwazelele hemwe.’”
Hamba Yesu nakasinda kwa kulonga, “Lelo mikale meho, kwa vila hamzelele zuwa ne saa.
“Mhela awo Undewa wa Nguluwi wowa kota munhu yumwe yalingwinula majendo kuluta honhu hamwambu, nakawachema vitumagwa wa heye, wamlolele lufufu lwake.
Nakampa chila yumwe kota mong'ho wa heye vyouwele, yumwe kampa sendi mihako jihano, yunji mihako mili ja sendi na muyage mhako umwe wa sendi, hamba koka.
Lelo yula yapegwe sendi mihako jihano kakola mijito nazo kawa na chonjezeche mihako jihano jiyage.
Vivyo na yula yapegwe mihako mili, kazidita zonjezeka mihako mili jiyage.
Ila yula yapegwe mhako umwe, kaluta kabawa hasi, kaivisa ula mhako wa sendi za mkulu wa heye.
“Mhela loupulute, yula mkulu nakahiluka, nakaluka kukagula hisabu ya zowapatile na kutumiya sendi za heye.
Chitumagwa yapegwe migwala jihano nakoya yaholile migwala jihano jonjezeche, kamlonjela, ‘Mkulu, nakunipa migwala jihano, hano hana migwala jihano jiyage jonjezeche jomhatile.’
Mkulu wa heye kamlonjela, ‘Goya, chitumagwa unojile na wakitumbila. Kunoga kuli mbuli ndodo, ndokudita uwe mlolezi wa mbuli zitanganiche. Uye usangalale hamwe na mkulu wa hegwe.’
“Chitumagwa yapegwe migwala mili ja sendi nakoya, kalonga, ‘Mkulu, nakunipa migwala mili. Uhole migwala mili jiyage zonjezeche zomhatile.’
Mkulu wa heye kamlonjela, ‘Goya, chitumagwa unojile na wakitumbila. Kuwa wakitumbila kwa mbuli ndodo, ndokudita uwe ulolela mbuli zitanganiche. Uye usangalale hamwe na mkulu wa hegwe.’
“Ila yula yapegwe sendi igwala limwe nakoya, kalonga, ‘Mkulu, ndivizela hegwe kwa munhu yang'ang'ale, hegwe kubetaga hala hounyalile, na kukungajiza hala hosanzanze.
Nandumba, nandilivisa igwala lya hegwe hasi. Uhole lelo igwala lya hegwe.’
“Mkulu wa heye nakamlonjela, ‘Hegwe kwa chitumagwa wihile na mgata! Kuvizela kota heni sibetaga hala hosinyalile, na kukungajiza hala hosanzanze.
Naikugana lelo, kuuwika mhako wa sendi wa heni benji, naheni ndaholile mhako wa sendi wa heni na zila zonjezeche!
Lelo, msukuleni ayo mhako wa sendi namkampe yula yawele na mihako kumi.
Mina, yawele na chinhu kopegwa na konjezelwa. Ila yula yawele hela chinhu, na chila chidodo choyawele nacho choholigwa.
Na kwa mbuli ya ayu chitumagwa yawele hatanganiche, mlavyeni kunze kuli jiza! Ako kowa na chililo na kujejeda mizino.’
“Mhela Mwana wa munhu yawele Mndewa loyokuya kuli ukulu wa heye na wahilisi wa kilanga weng'ha hamwe na heye, aho kochikala mchanya mwa chigoda cha heye cha undewa chiukulu.
Isi zeng'ha zoting'hanika kumwando kwa heye, na heye kowabagula kota vila mdimi yalingubagula ming'holo na mhene.
Kowawika wanhu walingudita yaviganile Nguluwi nzingo ya kudilo kwa heye na wanhu wehile kowawika nzingo ya kumoso kwa heye.
“Hamba Mndewa kowalonjela wala wawele nzingo ya heye kudilo, ‘Muye hemwe mtambichizwe na Mhaza wa heni, bocheleni undewa muwichilwe kulawila kulumbigwa kwa isi.
Mina ndali na nzala, hemwe mingalila chilyo, ndali na ng'halu, hemwe mingalila mazi, ndali mjenzi hemwe mmbochela,
ndali mwazi, mnvaliza, ndali mtamwa, hemwe muya kundola, ndali mchinweng'ho hemwe muya kunjendela.’
Aho, awo wanhu watanganiche womwidichila mndewa ‘Mkulu, hanili natukona uwele na nzala na hetwe tukigalila chilyo, au uwele na ng'halu na hetwe tukigalila mazi?
Hanili natukona uwele mjenzi na hetwe tukubochela hakaye hetu, au ulihela nguwo na hetwe tukuvaliza?
Hanili natukona uwele mtamwa au uwele mchinweng'ho na hetwe tuya kukujendela?’
Mndewa kowedichila, ‘Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, chila chinhu chomumditile yumwe wa awa wang'holozangu wadodo, mnditila heni.’

“Hamba kowalonjela wala wehile wawele nzingo ya kumoso kwa heye, ‘Ucheni kumwando kwa heni hemwe mpanjilwe! Mlute kuli chiluli cha mazuwa gose ne kuduma yawichilwe Limazoga na wahilisi wa kilanga wa heye.
Ndali na nzala hemwe hamhele chilyo, ndali na ng'halu hemwe hamhele mazi.
Ndali mjenzi hemwe hammbochele, ndali mtamwa na mchinweng'ho hemwe hamuyile kundola.’
“Aho na hewo womwidichila, ‘Mkulu, hanili natukona uwele na nzala au ng'halu, uwele mjenzi au ulihela nguwo, na uwele mtamwa au ulimchinweng'ho, hetwe hatukuditile chinhu?’
Na heye kowedichila, ‘Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, chila lomlemile kumditila mbuli azi yumwe wa wanhu awa wadodo, namlema kunditila heni.’
Lelo, awa woluta kuli kugazigwa kwa mazuwa gose, ila wala watanganiche woluta kuli ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma.”
Yesu loyasindile kulonga ago geng'ha, kawalonjela walanguswa wa heye,
“Mvizela kota mazuwa meli galinguya kowa na mnvina ya Pasaka, na Mwana wa Munhu kolavigwa leka yawambigwe.”
Mhela awo watambika wakulu na wasekulu wa wanhu nawating'hana kuli chipepela cha Kayafa, mtambika mkulu.
Walongasa vyowomibata Yesu kwa chinyele hamba wamkopole.
Ila walonga, “Mbuli ayo ileche kukoleka mhela wa mnvina ya Pasaka, kuleche kulawila kilewa na kibagula hali wanhu.”
Yesu loyali Besania, hakaye kwa Simoni, yawele na uswema,
mdala yumwe yawele na libuli lya alabasta iwele na unhunyililo wa sendi nyinji, kamuyila hala mmeza hoyekale kulya chilyo, kamgudulila awo unhunyililo kumutwi.
Walanguswa wa heye lowawene ago nawazudila walonga, “Ya choni kuwifya aku?”
Unhunyililo awu wahaguzigwe kwa sendi nyinji na wahapegwe wazunwa.
Yesu nakawazela majesa gawo, kawalonjela, “Ndaze mbona mwangumgaza ayu mdala? Heye kanditila mbuli inojile.
Wazunwa mwanawo mazuwa gengha, ila heni siwa na hemwe mazuwa gose.
Ayu mdala loyali yonjidila unhunyililo yali yombika goya kwa kutiligwa kwa heni mchilaga.
Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, koneche kweng'ha muisi Mbuli Inojile hoidamligwa, chinhu chino choyaditile ayu mdala chodamligwa kwa kumkumbuchila heye.”
Hamba, Yudasi Isikalioti, yumwe wa wala kumi na weli, nakaluta kwa watambika wakulu,
kawalonjela, “Mondigalila choni wone ndimlavye Yesu kwa hemwe?” Wamuwazila migwala makumi gadatu ga sendi,
na baho Yudasi yali yopala ndaze vyoyomhinduka Yesu.
Zuwa lya mwaluko lya mnvina ya mibumunda johajisasile loing'hali, walanguswa nawamlutila Yesu wamuuza, “Kwangugana kohi tukuwichile goya ndiya ya Pasaka?”
Heye nakawedichila, “Luteni kuli muji kwa munhu yumwe, mumlonjele, ‘Mlangusa kangulonga, mhela wa heni ufika, kwa hegwe ndolya Pasaka hamwe na walanguswa wa heni.’”
Walanguswa wadita kota Yesu vyoyawalajize, nawawika goya ndiya ya Pasaka.
Lokuwele matinazo, Yesu kekalisa mmchisanya hamwe na walanguswa wa heye kumi na weli.
Lowali wolya, Yesu kalonga, “Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, yumwe wa hemwe konyinduka.”
Walanguswa na wesinza ng'hatu, waluka kiuza yumweyumwe, “Mkulu, ndaze nda heni?”
Yesu kedichila, “Heye yodiliza nhonje hamwe na heni kuli chisaye ndo heye yonyinduka. Kulya hamwe yali ndo ulajilo wa kigana.
Ena, Ndangukomya Mwana wa Munhu kobagama kota Maandiko Matakatifu vyogawele longa mbuli ya heye, ila mane yuye munhu ayo yalingumgalamka Mwana wa Munhu! Nayahawele goya munhu ayo wone nahaleleche.”
Yudasi, ndo yula yaganile kumhinduka, kamuuza, “Mlangusa, ndaze nda heni?” Yesu kamwidichila, “Ena hegwe kulonga.”
Nalowali wolya, Yesu kahola ibumunda, kamtogola Nguluwi, kaumogola, kawagawila walanguswa yolonga, “Mhole mulye, alu ndo lukuli lwa heni.”
Hamba kahola chizombe, katambichiza, kawapa yolonga, “Mung'hwe weng'ha,
mina ayi ndo danda ya heni ilingweneza ilagano lya Nguluwi na wanhu wa heye, danda ilingubohoka kwa mbuli ya wanhu weng'ha kuwosela gehile ga hewo.
Ndanguwalonjelani, sing'hwa kahi divai ya zabibu mbaka zuwa lila nding'hwa divai inyale hamwe na hemwe kuli undewa wa Mhaza wa heni.”
Lowasindile kwimba lwimbo, woka, nawaluta kuli chidunda cha Mizeituni.
Hamba Yesu nakawalonjela, “Nechilo ayi ya lehano, hemwe mweng'ha mombilima na kundeka ndiliyeka, mina Maandiko Matakatifu gangulonga,
‘Ndomtowa mdimi,
na chilundo cha ming'holo chosambaluka.’
Ila londizilipuka, ndowalongola Galilaya.”
Petili kamlonjela Yesu, “Wone hewo wawe na majesa na hegwe nakukuleka, heni sikuleka hebu.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Ndangukulonjela ndikomya, nechilo yiyino izogolo halineka, kombela kadatu.”
Petili nakamlonjela, “Wone iwe inganile kubagama, sikubela ng'o.” Na wala walanguswa wanji weng'ha nawalonga hihyo.
Hamba Yesu kaluta nawo kuli kamgunda ka migodi Getisemane, kawalonjela walanguswa wa heye, “Mikale hano na heni ndute hala hamwando ndikalande.”
Nakawahola Petili na wana weli wa Zebedayo, nakaluka kuwa na masinzo na kugaya.
Aho nakawalonjela, “Ndina masinzo lukami mnhumbula habehi kubagama. Mikale baha meho hamwe na heni.”
Lelo, nakaluta hamwando hado, kagwa nachifugama, kalanda, “Mhaza wa heni, wone vyoiwa, chizombe achi chikole hafungo, ila haiwele vyondilingugana heni, leka kota vyoulingugana hegwe.”
Nakawalutila wala walanguswa kawafika wawasile. Nakamlonjela Petili, “Ndokulonga mlemwela kikala meho hamwe na heni ne saa imwe?
Mikale meho na kulanda mleche kwinjila kuli kujezigwa. Muhe wa munhu wangugana kudita ganojile ila lukuli lwa ng'hochele.”
Nakaluta kahi lwa keli kulanda, “Mhaza wa heni, wone hailinguganigwa chizombe cha magazo chikole heni ne kuching'hwela, leka igano lya hegwe lyenele.”
Nakawalutila kahi, nakawafika wawasile, mina meho gawo nagali gebatigwe na usinjizi.
Baho, kawaleka, nakaluta kulanda lwa kadatu kwa luzi lulula.
Hamba kawalutila wala walanguswa, kawalonjela, “Ndaze, mng'hali muwasile na kwesela? Mlole! Mhela wuya, Mwana wa Munhu kanguwichigwa mmoko mwa wanhu wawele na gehile.
Mwinuche tucheni. Mlole! Kanguya yula munhu yalingunyinduka.”

Lelo, Yesu naloyang'hali yolonga na hewo, baho nakoya Yudasi, yumwe wa wala kumi na weli. Hamwe na heye woya na wanhu wenji wawele na mipanga na nyimbati kulawa kwa watambika wakulu na wasekulu wa wanhu.
Ayo yaganile kumhinduka Yesu, yali yawapele ulajilo yolonga, “Yula munhu yondimnonela mizeze ndo heye, mibateni.”
Baho, Yuda kamhejelela Yesu, kamlonjela, “Ulamche, mlangusa!” Hamba kamnonela.
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Mng'holozangu, udite cho uwinzile kudita.!” Aho wala wanhu woya, wamibata Yesu, wamuwika mmoko.
Yumwe wa wala wawele hamwe na Yesu nakagolola moko, nakasomola ipanga, kamtowa chitumagwa wa mtambika mkulu, nakamdumula ikutu.
Aho Yesu nakamlonjela, “Hiluse ipanga lyako muyala, mina yoneche yalingutowa kwa ipanga, kobagama kwa ipanga.
Ndaze, hamvizelele kota ndahawezile kumlanda Mhaza wa heni na heye yahangalile wamizi vilundo kumi na vili vya wahilisi wa kilanga?
Ila gokwenela ndaze Maandiko Matakatifu galingulonga kota vyoilinguganigwa ilawile?”

Mhela wuwo Yesu kalulonjela alo lung'hongola lwa wanhu woyile kumibata, “Ndaze, muya kundibata kwa nyimbati na mipanga kota vila heni nda mbokaji? Chila zuwa ndali mng'handa ya Nguluwi ndilangusa, na hamndibate!
Ila aga geng'ha gakoleka leka Maandiko Matakatifu ga waloli genele.” Hamba walanguswa weng'ha nawamleka, nawabilima.
Lelo, awo wanhu wamibate Yesu nawamhilika hakaye kwa Kayafa, mtambika mkulu, kowekungajize walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na wasekulu.
Petili nakamuwinza Yesu kwa kutali mbaka kuchipepela cha mtambika mkulu, kenjila mng'handa hamwe na wamizi leka yalole mbuli zizangulawila.
Lelo, watambika wakulu na balaza lyeng'ha nawapala ulolezi wa udesi kwa Yesu wogana wamkopole,
ila hawawene chinhu cheng'ha chila, hanga nawoya walolezi wenji wa udesi. Mwiso nawoya walolezi weli,
nawalonga, “Munhu ayu nakalonga, ‘Ndoweza kugwisa Ng'handa ya Nguluwi na kuizenga kahi kwa mazuwa gadatu.’”
Mtambika mkulu nakema kamuuza Yesu, “Ndaze, hulingwidichila ne chinhu? Wanhu awa wangulavya ulolezi wachi kwa hegwe?”
Ila Yesu nakanyamalila tulu. Kahi mtambika mkulu nakamlonjela, “Wilahe kwa itagwa lya Nguluwi yawele mkomu, tulonjele kota hegwe ndo Kilistu Mlohozi, mwana wa Nguluwi!”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Ena, hegwe kwangulonga! Ila ndanguwalonjelani, kulawa sambi momona Mwana wa Munhu yekale kudilo kwa yula Mkulu yawele na ludali yokuya kuchanya kuli ng'hungugu kilanga.”
Baho mtambika mkulu kadega nguwo za heye, kalonga, “Kamkovula Nguluwi! Twangugana choni kahi? Sambi muhulika yomkovula Nguluwi kwa heye.
Hemwe mwangona ndaze?” Hewo wamwidichila, “Imgana yabagame!”
Hamba wamtemela mite kumeho, wamzabula kwa viganza. Wanji lowali womzabula kwa viganza,
nawalonga, “Hegwe Kilistu Mlohozi, tulagulile lelo, yalikohi yakutowile?”
Petili yaliyekale kunze kunzingo. Lelo, chitumagwa yumwe mdala kamlutila, nakalonga, “Hegwe wali hamwe na Yesu wa Galilaya.”
Petili nakabela kwa weng'ha wala, nakalonga, “Sivizelele choni choulonga.”
Loyali yolawa mlwizi, chitumagwa yunji mdala nakamona, nakawalonjela wala wawele hala, “Munhu ayu yali hamwe na Yesu wa Nazaleti.”
Petili nakabela kahi aku yochilaha, “Simzelele munhu ayo.”
Hamba hado hela, wanhu wawele hala wamlutila Petili, wamlonjela, “Twangukomya, hegwe nagwe kwa yumwe wa hewo, mina kuzeleka kwa aila ndonga hela kota hegwe kulawila Galilaya.”
Aho Petili nakaluka kipanjila na kilaaha yolonga, “Heni simzelele munhu ayo!” Baho du izogolo nalika.
Petili nakakumbuchila ulonzi woyalonjelwe na Yesu, “Izogolo halineka, kombela kadatu kota hunzelele heni.” Lelo, Petili kalawa kunze, nakalila lukami.
Lokubwemwenzuche, watambika wakulu weng'ha na wasekulu wa wanhu nawaheha mbuli ya Yesu wogana wamkopole.
Wamuwoha luzabi, wamuhola, wamuhilika kwa Pilato mkulu wa mkowa yahaguligwe na mndewa wa Loma.
Aho, Yudasi, yula yamhinduche Yesu, loyawene kota mina wamtagusa kwa wihe Yesu, nakogula lukami, kawahilusila watambika wakulu vila vihande makumi gadatu vya sendi.
Nakawalonjela, “Ndita gehile kwa kumlavya munhu yawele hela nongwa yakopoligwe.” Ila hewo walonga, “Yangutuwala choni hetwe? Ayo mbuli ya hegwe.”
Na heye kataga zila sendi mng'handa ya Nguluwi, kalawa kunze, kaza kinhweng'ha.
Watambika wakulu wazihola zila sendi, walonga, “Haiwa goya kuziwika kuli ng'hano ya ng'handa ya Nguluwi, kwa vila sendi za danda.”
Baho, weuza, wahola zila sendi wazagula mgunda wa ilongo, hawe honhu ha kutilila wajenzi.
Ndo mina mbaka lehano mgunda awo wanguchemigwa, “Mgunda wa Danda.”
Ahyo ulonzi wa mloli Yelemiya wenela, “Nawahola vihande makumi madatu vya sendi, kuwazigwa kwa yula wanhu wa Izilaeli wamguzile,
nawagula kwa zizo sendi mgunda wa ilongo, kota vila mkulu vyoyandajize.”
Yesu nawamwimiza kumwando hali mkulu wa mkowa. Lelo, mkulu wa mkowa nakamuuza, “Ndaze, hambi hegwe ndo mndewa wa Wayahudi?” Yesu nakamwidichila, “Ena, hegwe kulonga.”
Ila watambika wakulu na wasekulu lowaliwomuuza, yali hambe yawedichile.
Ahyo Pilato nakamuuza, “Ndaze, hulinguhulika ulonjelezi awo weng'ha walingulavya kwa hegwe?”
Ila Yesu hedichile ne chinhu, ahyo mkulu wa mkowa nakabubuwala ng'hatu.
Yali izoweleche mhela wa mnvina ya Pasaka mkulu wa mkowa kuwachumulila Wayahudi munhu yumwe yali mchinweng'ho wamganile.
Mhela awo kwali na munhu yumwe yawele mchinweng'ho yazeleche lukami, itagwa lyake Balaba.
Ahyo, wanhu lowetinghane hamwe, Pilato nakawauza, “Mwangugana ndimchumulile yalikohi kuli awa weli, Balaba au Yesu yalinguchemigwa Kilistu Mlohozi?”
Nakalonga hino kwa vila nakavizela kota nawamigala kwa heye kwa mbuli ya kumonela maya hela.

Pilato loyaliyekale hali chigoda cha heye cha utaguso, mdala wa heye nakamhilichila usenga awu, “Uleche kiinjiza kuli utaguso wa munhu yuno yatanganiche, mina lehano ngazika lukami londali ndilota kwa mbuli ya heye.”
Ila watambika wakulu na wasekulu wawakola lupichi wanhu walande Balaba yachumulilwe na Yesu yabagame.
Mkulu wa mkowa nakawauza, “Yalikohi kuli awa weli yomlingugana ndimchumulile?” Wamwidichila, “Balaba!”
Pilato nakawauza, “Lelo, ndite choni na Yesu yalinguchemigwa Kilistu Mlohozi?” Weng'ha nawalonga, “Yawambigwe mumsalaba!”
Pilato nakauza, “Lekachoni? Nakadita wihe wachi?” Hewo nawalutilila kutowa iyowe, “Yawambigwe mumsalaba!”

Baho, Pilato loyawene kota hawalingukunda chila choyaliyolonga, na kibagula kwali kwaluka, nakahola mazi, kahovuga moko hali wala wanhu wamemile, nakalonga, “Heni ndamduhu kwa mbuli ya kubagama munhu ayu, mane mwemwe baho!”
Wanhu weng'ha nawalonga, “Danda ya heye leche ikale kwa hetwe na wana wa hetwe!”
Aho Pilato kawachumulila Balaba kulawa mchinweng'ho, na Yesu yazapigwe ng'hobwa hamba nakamlavya yawambigwe mumsalaba.
Hamba wamizi wa Pilato wamwinjiza Yesu mng'handa ya mkulu wa Loma, wamwinamila chilundo cheng'ha.
Wamvula nguwo, wamvalisa ikanzu lya chiundewa.

Hamba watowa ng'hata ya miwa ifandile kota chipembelo, wamvalisa kumutwi, wamuwichila kahi idenje kuli moko wa heye wa kudilo. Wamfugamila kumwando kwa heye, wambeza wolonga, “Ulamche Mndewa wa Wayahudi!”
Wamtemela mite, walihola lila idenje, wamsubulila kumutwi.
Lowasindile kumbeza, wamvula lila ikanzu, wamvalisa nguwo za heye, hamba wamhilika kumuwamba mumsalaba.
Lowali woluta, nawamfika munhu yumwe itagwa lyake Simoni, mwenyeng'haye wa Kilene, wamizi wamkola lupichi yapiche msalaba wa Yesu.
Lowafichile honhu halihochemigwa Goligota, hazeleche honhu ha “Izeje lya Mutwi”.
Wamng'hweza mhanzanyo wa divai na chinhu chiliusungu. Ila Yesu loyajezile nakalema kung'hwa.
Wamuwamba Yesu mumsalaba, hamba wegawila nguwo za heye kwa kuzitowela simbi.
Nawekala baho, wawa womlolela.
Hachanya ha mutwi wa heye nawawika utaguso wa heye wandichigwe, “Ayu ndo Yesu, Mndewa wa Wayahudi.”
Wabokaji weli nawawambigwa mumsalaba hamwe na heye, yumwe kudilo na yumwe kumoso.
Wanhu wawele wokola honhu hala wali womliga na wotigasa mitwi jawo na kulonga,
“Hegwe! Ndo nakivuna kota kogwisa ng'handa ya Nguluwi na kuizenga kuli mazuwa gadatu? Lelo ilohole gwegwe. Wone hegwe uli Mwana wa Nguluwi, uduliche mumsalaba!”
Vivyo du na watambika wakulu hamwe na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na wasekulu nawambeza wolonga,
“Nakawalohola wanji, ila kilohola yuye kangulemwa! Hambi, heye ndo Mndewa wa Izilaeli! Hambi, lelo yeduliche hasi kulawa mumsalaba, na hetwe tomkunda.
Naketumbila Nguluwi na kulonga eti heye ndo Mwana wa Nguluwi, lelo, Nguluwi yamlohole one yalingumgana.”
Hihyo na wala wabokaji wawambigwe hamwe na Yesu mumsalaba nawaliwomliga.
Kulawila saa tisa matinazo, jiza naigubika isi yeng'ha.
Loifichile saa tisa matinazo, Yesu nakalila kwa lizi likulu, “Eloi, Eloi, lema sabakitani?” Ilinguzeleka, “Nguluwi wa heni, Nguluwi wa heni, mbona kundeka?”
Ila wala nawemile hala lowahuliche ahyo walonga, “Kangumchema Eliya.”
Yumwe wa hewo nakabilima, nakahola ibofyabofya, kadiliza kuli divai izazame, kawika mli idenje, kamha yang'hwe.
Wanji nawalonga, “Tandi tulole wone Eliya kanguya kumlohola.”
Baho, Yesu nakalila kahi kwa lizi likulu, hamba muhe nauleka lukuli.
Baho ipaziya ligazi lya kudinya honhu helile ng'hatu ha ng'handa ya Nguluwi lidejeka vihande vili kulawa kuchanya mbaka hasi, isi naitigasika, mitalawe najitulika,
vilaga navigubuka na wanhu wenji wa Nguluwi welile nawabagame, wazilipuligwa,
na hewo, loyazilipuche heye Yesu, walawa mvilaga, wenjila Yelusalemu muji welile, woneka na wanhu wenji.
Lelo, mkulu wa wamizi na wamizi wa Yesu lowawene kutigasika kwa isi na gala galawile, nawadumba heko, nawalonga, “Ena, kwa kukomya munhu ayu nayali Mwana wa Nguluwi.”
Honhu aho hali na wadala wenji wolola kwa kutali. Awo wadala ndo wala wamuwinzile Yesu kulawila Galilaya womtanza.
Mumo wali Maliya Madelena, Maliya mayao Yakubu na Yusufu, hamwe na mayao wana wa Zebedayo.
Loifichile matinazo, mina nakoya munhu yawele na lufufu mwenyeng'haye wa Alimataya, itagwa lyake Yusufu. Na heye kahi nayali mlanguswa wa Yesu.
Nakamlutila Pilato, nakalanda yapegwe lukuli lwa Yesu. Baho, Pilato nakakunda yapegwe.
Yusufu nakaluhola lula lukuli, kaubumbiliza sanda nzelu ng'hatu,
nakuwika mgati mwa chilaga chinyale choyali yahongole kuli italawe. Hamba kabidusa iganga ikulu kadinya hali lwizi lwa chilaga, koka.
Maliya Madelena na yula Maliya yunji wali wekale wolola chilaga.
Hamitondo, zuwa iyage ila ya kwesela, watambika wakulu na Mafalisayo nawamlutila Pilato,
nawalonga, “Mkulu, tukumbuchila kota yula mhadi loyali mkomu nakalonga ‘Zuwa lya kadatu ndozilipuka.’

Lelo, twangugana chilaga chilolelwe na wamizi mbaka zuwa lya kadatu, leka walanguswa wa heye waleche kuya nakumuhiza na kuwalonjela wanhu kota kazilipuka. Udesi awu wa mwiso wowa wihile lukami kusinda ula wa mwaluko.”
Pilato nakawalonjela, “Haya, mwanawo wamizi, mlute mkalolele kota vyomvizelele.”
Lelo, waluta walolela chilaga, nawazenjelela mchanya mwa iganga na wawaleka baho wamizi wololela.
Loimalile zuwa lya kwesela, behi na kubwemwenzuka zuwa ila ya Jumapili, Maliya Madelena na yula Maliya yunji, nawaluta kulola chila chilaga.
Baho du nakulawila limachinyina, mhilisi wa kilanga wa Mkulu nakadulika kulawa kilanga, kalibidusa lila iganga hafungo, nakulikalila.
Nakoneka kota lumwemwesa na nguwo zoyavalile zali nzelu chweya!
Wamizi wa chila chilaga nawakakama aku wodumba heko, nawazilika kota wanhu wabagame.
Ila yula mhilisi wa kilanga nakawalonjela wala wadala, “Hemwe mleche kudumba! Ndivizela kota mwangumpala Yesu yawambigwe mumsalaba.
Haduhu hano mina kazilipuka kota vyonayalonjile. Muye mlole honhu howamuwichile.
Lelo, mlute himahima mkawalonjele walanguswa wa heye kuta kazilipuka kulawa kowabagame, na sambi kanguwalongola Galilaya, ako momona heye! Mkumbuche ulonzi awu wondiwalonjele.”
Wawele wodumba na kusangalala kukulu, awo wadala nawoka himahima hali chilaga, nawabilima kuluta kuwalonjela walanguswa wa heye.
Baho, Yesu nakating'hana na hewo, nakalonga, “Mlamche hemwe.” Hewo wadala wamlutila, webata magulu ga heye na kumfugamila.
Hamba Yesu nakawalonjela, “Mleche kudumba! Luteni mkawalonjele wang'holozangu walute Galilaya, na ako wombona.”
Wala wadala lowaliwoluta, wamwe wa wamizi wa chilaga nawaluta kuli muji kulonga kwa wakulu wa watambika kwa zila mbuli zeng'ha lozilawile.
Lelo, nawating'hana hamwe na wasekulu, lowasindile kudogola, wawapa wala wamizi sendi nyinji
wolonga, “Hemwe molonga ahi, ‘Walanguswa wa heye nawoya nechilo, wahiza lukuli lwa heye hetwe lotwali tuwasile.’
Na one mkulu wa mkowa yaizele mbuli ayi, hetwe tolonga na heye leka hemwe mleche kugazigwa.”
Wala wamizi nawazihola zila sendi, nawadita kota vyowalanguswe. Mbuli ayo yenela hali Wayahudi weng'ha mbaka lehano.
Wala walanguswa kumi na yumwe nawaluta Galilaya kuli chila chidunda choyawalajize Yesu.
Lowamuwene, wamfugamila, hanga wanji wali na majesa.
Yesu nakoya habehi, kawalonjela, “Mpegwa ludali lweng'ha kilanga na mu isi.
Luteni lelo, mkawadite wanhu wa isi zeng'ha wawe walanguswa wa heni, muwabatiza kwa itagwa lya Mhaza na lya Mwana na lya Muhe Yelile.
Muwalanguse kibatilila malajizo geng'ha gondiwapele. Na heni nda hamwe na hemwe mazuwa geng'ha, mbaka mwiso wa isi.”
Ayi ndo Mbuli Inojile ya Yesu Kilistu Mlohozi, Mwana wa Nguluwi.
Nayaluka kota vyoyandichigwe mli chitabu cha mloli Isaya,
“Nguluwi nakalonga, ndomigala msenga wa heni yakulongole,
yula yokugongomanyila nzila ya hegwe.
Munhu kanguchema kugunuche,
mgongomanyileni Mkulu nzila ya heye, mgolole nzila ya heye ya kukola!”
Yohani Mbatiza nakalawila kugunuche, yodamla kota, wanhu weng'ha mumgalamchile Nguluwi na kubatizigwa leka Nguluwi yawosele gehile ga hewo.
Wanhu kulawa nzingo zeng'ha za Yudeya na wenyeng'haye weng'ha wa Yelusalemu nawamlutila, nawalonga gehile gowaditile, na heye kawabatiza mlwanda lwa Yolodani.
Yohani nakavala nguwo ihonigwe kwa milaika ja ngamiya, yakowele isali lya igozi mchuno. Nayali yolya nzije na hanombwa.
Nakadamla yolonga, “Munhu yalinguya kumbele kwa heni, kowa mkulu kwa heni, heni sijeza kinamiza na kudohola ng'hweso za makwamba ga heye.
Heni ndanguwabatiza kwa mazi, ila heye kowabatiza kwa Muhe Yelile.”
Mhela wuwo Yesu nakafika kulawa Nazaleti muisi ya Galilaya, na Yohani kambatiza mlwanda lwa Yolodani.
Baho du loyatomoche kulawa mmazi, kona ulanga ugubuche, na Muhe Yelile yomdulichila kota ng'hunda.
Lizi Iihulikwa kulawa kilanga, “Hegwe ndo mwanangu ndikuganile, nojezwa na hegwe.”
Baho du Muhe Yelile nakamdita yalute kugunuche,
ako nakekala mazuwa makumi gane yojezigwa na Limazoga. Migongolo ja kisolo jali kuko, na wahilisi wa kilanga waza kumtanza.
Yohani loyawohigwe mchinweng'ho, Yesu nakaluta isi ya Galilaya, yodamla Mbuli Inojile ya Nguluwi.
Nakalonga, “Muhela ufika. Undewa wa Nguluwi wa habehi! Mwesa mumgalamchile Nguluwi, muikunde Mbuli Inojile muibochele.”
Yesu loyali yojenda mfungo mwa ilamba lya Galilaya, nakawona wavula somba weli, Simoni na Andeleya mdodowe Simoni, wovula somba na utandawala.
Yesu kawalonjela, “Mmbinze nani ndowaditani hemwe muwe wavula wanhu.”
Baho waleka utandawala wa hewo wamuwinza.
Loyalutile hamwando nakawona wanage Zebedayo Yakubu na Yohani. Wali mgati mwa itumbwi wowika goya utandawala wawo.
Baho du Yesu kawachema, na hewo wamleka mhaza wa hewo Zebedayo muli itumbwi hamwe na wakola mijito, nawamuwinza.
Nawafika muji wa Kapanaumu, naloifichile zuwa lya kwesela, Yesu nakenjila mung'handa ya kusalila, kaluka kulangusa.
Wanhu weng'ha wekala wabubuwale na gala goyali yolangusa, mina hali yolangusa kota walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa, ila yali yolangusa kwa ludali.
Baho nakenjila munhu mula mng'handa ya kusalila yawele na chijeni chihile,
kachemeleza lizi, “Kuna choni na hetwe, hegwe Yesu wa Nazaleti? Nakuya kutudumya? Tuvizela hegwe kwaani, hegwe kwa msenga Yelile yatumigwe na Nguluwi!”
Yesu kachideuza acho chijeni chihile yolonga, Nyamalile! “Mlawe munhu ayu.”
Hamba chila chijeni chihile chimtigisatigisa ayo munhu, kalila kwa lizi likulu, hamba chimlawa munhu yula.
Wanhu wesa wawele ahala honhu, wekala wahame mlomo, naweuza, “Mbuli zachi azi? Aga ndo malanguso majenzi, munhu ayu kana ludali hata lwa kulonjela vijeni vihile, navyo vyangumhulika.”
Mbuli azi za Yesu nazenela kweng'ha kuli isi ya Galilaya.
Yesu na walanguswa wa heye, hamwe na Yakubu na Yohani, nawalawa ng'handa ya kusalila, nawaluta mbaka kuli ng'handa ya Simoni na Andeleya.
Mamo wa mdala wa Simoni yaliyotamika yawasile muchinhanda. Yesu loyafichile nawamlonjela mbuli ya ayo mtamwa.
Yesu kamlutila ayo mamo, kamibata moko kamwinula. Baho utamwa umleka kaluka kuwawichila chilyo.
Nemisi, isanya lolizinjile, wamigalila Yesu watamwa weng'ha na munhu yawele na chijeni.
Wanhu wose wa muji ula nawekungajiza kunze kwa lwizi.
Na heye Yesu kawosela wanhu wenji wali na matamwa menji, na kawinga vijeni vinji, ila havikundize vijeni kulonga chinhu mina vyali vimzelele kota heye kawhaani.
Hamitondo hake, kung'hali lufuku, Yesu nakalawa, kaluta honhu ha uyeng'ha kumlanda Nguluwi.
Hamba Simoni na wayage nawaluta kumpala koyali.
Lowamuwene, wamlonjela, “Chila munhu kangukupala.”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Tucheni tulute honhu hanji hali habehi ndikadamle Mbuli Inojile kahi ako nako, mina acho ndo chingale.”
Hamba nakoka kaluta yojenda isi yeng'ha ya Galilaya, yodamla mng'handa za kusalila Mbuli Inojile kuno yolavya vijeni vihile.
Munhu yumwe yawele na uswema nakamlutila Yesu, kafugama, kamlanda na kumlonjela, “Wone ulingugana kombusila utamwa wondilingugula.”
Yesu kamonela isungu, kagolola moko wa heye, kamdoliza na kumlonjela, “Ndangugana uhovujigwe!”
Baho du utamwa wa chipata umleka munhu ayo, nakahovujigwa.
Hamba Yesu nakamlonjela yula munhu yoche, kuno yomlajiza,

nakalonga, “Ulole uleche kumlonjela munhu yoneche mbuli ayi, ila ulute ukelajile kwa mtambika mkulu kota vyoyalajize Musa, wakukagule na walavye ulolezi kota kuhovugwa. Hamba ulavye nhambiko kwa kulajila kota kuwa mkomu.”

Ila yula munhu kaluta, kavumiza mbuli ayo kweng'ha na kulonga mbuli nyinji. Yesu nakalemwela kwinjila muji woneche yokoneka, imgana kikala kunze, honhu ha uyeng'ha. Ahyo, wanhu nawamlutila kulawila kweng'ha.
Logakolile mazuwa mado, Yesu nakahiluka Kapanaumu wanhu nawahulika kota kahiluka hakaye.
Wanhu wenji nawoya wamema mluga nakwali hela honhu ha kukola kuluta hali lwizi. Yesu yali yodamla usenga wa heye,
mhela wanhu wane naweza, wamigale munhu yumwe kwa Yesu yaziliche.
Ila kwa vila wanhu wali wenji, nawalemwela kumgala behi na Yesu. Ahyo, nawatubula kuchanya kuchindwiko honhu hoyawele Yesu. Lowatubule honhu, wamdulisa ayo munhu yawele yawasile mumcheka.
Yesu loyawene vyowawele na makundo, kamlonjela ayo munhu yaziliche. “Mwanangu, kusilwa gehile gouditile.”
Wamwenga wa walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa, nawawele ahala honhu, nawenjila majesa mnhumbula mwawo,
Munhu ayu “Ndo choni kangulonga hino? Kangumkovula Nguluwi! Kuduhu munhu yawele na ludali lwa kumusila munhu gehile, ila Nguluwi yaliyeka.”
Yesu nakavizela gala gowali wochijesa, kawalonjela, “Lekachoni mwangijesa ahyo mnhumbula za hemwe?
Lilikohi liwele ubewe, kumlonjela ayu munhu yaziliche, ‘Kusilwa gehile ga hegwe,’ Au kumlonjela, ‘Winuche! Uhole mcheka ujende?’
Lelo, ndangugana mvizele kota heni Mwana wa Munhu ndina ludali lwa kuwosela wanhu gehile muisi.” Aho kamlonjela yula munhu yaziliche,
“Ndangukulonjela wime, uhole mcheka wako ulute kaye.”
Baho, wanhu weng'ha wawele womlola, ayo mtamwa kenuka, kahola mcheka wa heye kaluta kaye. Wanhu weng'ha nawabubuwala na kumtogola Nguluwi kuno wolonga, “Hatunayona mbuli kota ayi.”
Yesu nakahiluka kahi hafungo mwa ilamba lya Galilaya. Lung'hongola lwa wanhu nalumlutila, na heye kaluka kuwalangusa.
Loyali yokola, kamona Lawi mwanage Alufayo, yekalise mchituka cha kodi, Yesu nakamlonjela, “Umbinze!” Lawi kenuka, kamuwinza.
Hamba, Yesu yali yolya chilyo mng'handa ya Lawi, wakongoza kodi weng'ha na awala wawele na gehile, waliwolya hamwe na Yesu na walanguswa wa heye, nawali wenji wamuwinzile Yesu.
Walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa wala nawawele Mafalisayo, lowamuwene Yesu yolya na wanhu wawele na gehile na wakongoza kodi, wawauza walanguswa wa heye, walonga, “Lekachoni kangulya na wadita gehile?”
Yesu vyoyawahuliche kawalonjela, “Wanhu wawele wakomu hawalingumlapa mteleka mikwandi, ila wawele watamwa. Suyile kuwachema wanhu wala watanganiche, ila mbuya kwa wanhu wawele na gehile.”

Mhela umwe walanguswa wa Yohani na walanguswa wa Mafalisayo wali wokwesela kulya. Wanhu woya, wamuuza Yesu, “Lekachoni walanguswa wa Yohani na wa Mafalisayo wali wokwesela kulya, ila walanguswa wa hegwe hambe wesele kulya?”
Yesu nakawedichila, “Yalalikwe kuli mnvina ya kuhesa, kokwesela kulya ndaze wone yawe hamwe na mkasano yalihela chilyo? Ndita hebu! Mhela weng'ha yowa hamwe na mkasano hokwesela kulya hebu.
Mhela wokwiza hala mkasano hoyokusigwa kuli hewo, mhela awo ndo wokwesela kulya.
“Haduhu munhu yoweza kuhona chibende chinyale kuli nguwo ya katali. Wone yadite ahyo, achila chibende chinyale choswina kulawa kuli yila nguwo ya katali, ileka ugazi ukulu.

Munhu hambe yajele divai ya lehano kuli chizombe cha igozi cha katali, wone udite ahyo divai aila yotula achila chizombe cha igozi cha katali, divai na chizombe cha igozi chila vyotajigwa. Iwaga hino, uwiche divai mli chizombe cha igozi chinyale?”
Yali zuwa lya kwesela Yesu yali yokola mu migunda ja wanhu jiwele na ngano iwhanile na uhemba na walanguswa wa heye wopulula miso wolya.
Mafalisayo walonga, “Ulole, walanguswa wa hegwe wanguwifya wangudita chohachikundigwe kudita zuwa lya kwesela?”
Yesu kawalonjela, “Hambi hamsomile Daudi na wayage vyonawaditile mhela lowali na nzala nachowaditile?

Heye na kenjila mng'handa ya Nguluwi, kalya jila mibumunda jiwichigwe kumwando kwa Nguluwi. Mbuli ayi naikoleka mhela Abisali naloyali mtambika mkulu. Na ndo watambika waliyeng'ha nawakundizwe kulya mibumunda ajo. Ila Daudi nakajilya nakahi nakawapa wayage.”
Hamba Yesu kawalonjela, “Zuwa lya kwesela naiwichigwa kwa wanhu, haiwele wanhu kwa zuwa lya kwesela.
Ahyo Mwana wa Munhu ndo Mkulu wa zuwa lya kwesela na kana ludali lwa ayo zuwa lya kwesela.”
Yesu nakenjila kahi mng'handa ya kusalila nakwali na munhu yawele na moko uziliche.
Wanhu wamwe wali wopala chinhu cha kumvilizila Yesu, wali wamlola kodita choni kwa ayula munhu yawele na moko uziliche, komlohola au hebu vyoiwele zuwa lya kwesela.
Yesu kamlonjela ayula munhu yawele na moko uziliche, “Uye hano hamwando.”

Hamba Yesu nakawauza wanhu wala, “Malajizo ga hetwe gangutukundiza ndaze kudita zuwa lya kwesela? Kudita mbuli inojile au kudita mbuli yihile? Kulohola ukomu wa munhu au kukopola?” Ila hewo nahawalonjile chinhu.

Aho kawalola weng'ha yazudile, kawa na masinzo kwa vila lowawele na nhumbula zihile. Hamba nakamlonjela ayula munhu yaweli na moko uziliche, “Ugolole moko wa hegwe!” Na heye kagolola moko na baho uwa mkomu kahi.
Baho Mafalisayo walawa kunze, walongasa hamwe na wanhu wa chilundo cha Helodi vila vyo womdumya Yesu.
Yesu nakoka aho hamwe na walanguswa wa heye, nakaluta hafungo mwa ilamba, na lung'hongola lwa wanhu lumuwinza. Wanhu awo wali walawile kuli isi za Galilaya na Yudeya,
na miji ja Yelusalemu na Idumea, na mwambu mwa lwanda lwa Yolodani na Tilo na Sidoni. Lung'hongola alo lwa wanhu nawamlutila Yesu kwa vila nawahulika mbuli nyinji zoyali yakolile.
Yesu kawalonjela walanguswa wa heye wamngongomanyile itumbwi limwe, leka lung'hongola lwa wanhu waleche kummemelela.
Yali yawosile matamwa wanhu wenji, na watamwa weng'ha wali wofyela wogana wamdolize.
Na wanhu wali na vijeni vihile lowamuwene, nawetoza kumwando kwa heye na kuchemeleza lizi, “Hegwe kwa Mwana wa Nguluwi!”
Ila Yesu nakawalonjela kwa kuwang'hanuchila waleche kuwalonjela wanhu kota heye kawhaani.
Yesu nakoka kakwina kuchidunda nakawachema wala yawaganile. Na hewo nawamlutila,
kawahagula kumi na weli, nakawachema watumigwa. Nakawalonjela, “Ndiwahagulani hemwe muwe hamwe na heni, hamba ndowalajiza mlute kuwadamlila wanhu Mbuli Inojile.
Namowa na ludali lwa kuwinga vijeni.”
Awa ndo kumi na weli yawahagule, Simoni yula Yesu yampele itagwa lya Petili,
na kahi Yakubu na Yohani wanage Zebedayo. Yesu nakawapa awa wana weli itagwa Bonegesi, izeleche “Wanalubumo.”
Na kahi Andeleya na Filipo na Batolomeo na Matei na Tomasi na Yakubu mwanage Alufayo na Simoni yalawile Kanani na Tadei
na Yudasi Isikalioti yamhinduche Yesu.
Hamba Yesu nakaluta hakaye hake, kahi wanhu nawamema mbaka Yesu na walanguswa wa heye, nawalemwela ne mhela wa kulya.
Wang'holoze vyo wahuliche ago, nawaluta kumhola kwa vila wanhu nawalonga kota kapunganika.
Walangusa wa hewo wa malajizo ga Musa walawile Yelusalemu nawalonga, “Kana chijeni chihile chilinguchemigwa Belizebuli! Ayo ndo mkulu wa vijeni, na heye yalingumpa ludali lwa kusa vijeni vihile.”
Yesu kawachema kaluka kuwalonjela kwa nhelo, kalonga, “Yowa ndaze Limazoga limuwinje Limazoga muyage?
Wone undewa umwenga ugawanuche vilundo vilingitwanza, undewa awo hauweza kikala.
Kahi, wone ivyazi ligawanuche keli, lilingitowa, ivyazi alyo halichikala lyosumigwa.
Wone undewa wa Limazoga ugawanuche chilundo, hauchikala, leka wokwaga ng'hatu.
“Kuduhu munhu kwinjila mng'handa ya munhu yawele na mong'ho kumsukula vinhu vyose mbaka wamuwope ayo yawele na mong'ho na ng'wego hafungo, aho ndo koweza kumsukula vinhu vya heye.
“Ena ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, Nguluwi kowosela gehile gawo geng'ha na kukovula kwa hewo kweng'ha,
ila yalingumkovula Muhe Yelile, ayu hokusilwa gehile ga heye ng'o, kwa vila kawifya, kana wihe wa mazuwa gose.”
Yesu nakalonga ago, kwa vila wali womlonga “Kana vijeni vihile.”
Hamba mayake Yesu na wang'holoze nawoya ahala honhu, hoyali yolangusa Yesu, wema kunze, wamlajiza munhu yenjile mng'handa yakamcheme.
Wanhu wammemelela heye. Lelo, wanhu nawamlonjela, “Mayako na wang'holozo na walumbuzo wa kunze wangukupala hegwe.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Mayangu na wang'holozangu ndo whaani?”
Aho kawalola awala wekale ahala honhu, kalonga, “Loleni! Awa ndo mayangu na wang'holozangu.
Munhu yoneche yawele kudita goyalingugana Nguluwi ayo ndo mng'holozangu na lumbulyangu na mayangu.”
Yesu nakaluka kuwalangusa wanhu hafungo mwa ilamba. Wanhu wenji nawammemelela mbaka naimgana yenjile mitumbwi na kikalisa. Wanhu weng'ha nawali wekale musangalaza hafungo mwa ilamba.
Yali yowalangusa menji kwa nhelo, na kuli malanguso ga heye nakawalonjela,
“Mhulichize, mnyalaji nakaluta kunyala nyhadikwa.
Loyali yonyala nyhadikwa, zinji nazigwa mnzila, videje vyuya vidobola vilya.
Zinji nazigwa honhu hawele na ng'ongwa, hawele hela misanga minji. Nazota himahima kwa vila misanga najali michefu.
Lusanya lolulawile, zilakala na kwa vila mizabi jali mchanyamchanya hela, zikala.
Zinji nazigwa hali migodi ja miwa, na jila miwa jikula zipilinjila zila nyhadikwa nazo hazilelile nhyule.
Ila zinji nazigwa hali misanga jinojile, zota zikula zilela imwe mala makumi gadatu, na imwe mala makumi sita na imwe mala miya.”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Yawele na makutu ga kuhulika na yahuliche.”
Yesu vyoyaponile yeka, wamwe wa wala wamhuliche nawamlutila hamwe na wala kumi na weli, wamuuza mbuli ya awu nhelo.
Na heye kawalonjela, “Hemwe mpegwa kuuzela uviso wa Undewa wa Nguluwi, ila wanji wala wawele kunze wolonjelwa chila chinhu kwa nhelo,
leka,
‘Walole ng'hatu, ila waleche kona.
Wahuliche ng'hatu, ila waleche kuvizela.
Nawadite ahyo, wahamgaluchile Nguluwi,
na heye yahawosele gehile ga hewo.’”
Hamba Yesu kawalonjela, “Ndaze, hemwe hamuizelele nhelo ayi? Modita ndaze lelo, kuizela nhelo yoneche yila?
Mnyalaji kangunyala ulonzi wa Nguluwi.
Wanhu wanji ndo kota zila nyhadikwa zinyaligwe mnzila ulonzi hounyaligwe. Ila bahala du loyohulika, Limazoga lyuyaga na kusa ulonzi awo unyaligwe mgati mwa hewo.
Wanhu wanji ifanda kota nyhadikwa inyaligwe hali italawe. Baho du lowouhulika awo ulonzi, hubochela kwa kusangalala ng'hatu.
Ila hambe uwenjile na kuwa na mizabi mgati mwa hewo, hulutilila kibatilila hado hela, na mhela wa ugayo au wihe houlawila kwa mbuli ya ulonzi awo, baho wangugozola.
Wanhu wanji ndo kota zila nyhadikwa zigwile hali migodi jiwele na miwa. Ahyo ndo kiwhana na wanhu wala wawele hulika awo ulonzi,
ila lunhwinhwi lwa isi ino, kunojezwa na lufufu, maya ga chila mbuli kuwenjila na kubananga ulonzi awo, nawo haulela mafuza.

Ila wanji ifanda kota zila nyhadikwa zinyalilwe kuli misanga jinojile. Awa wohulika ulonzi awo, woubochela, wolela mafuza, wanji mala makumi gadatu, na wanji mala makumi sita, na wanji mala miya imwe.”
Yesu nakalonga kahi, “Ndaze, wanhu hawawesaga chenje na kigala mng'handa na kugubika na chidoto au kuwika mluvungu? Hebu! Huwikaga honhu ha kuwichila chenje.
Chila chinhu chivisigwe chowichigwa hazelu na chila chinhu chigubikwe chogubuligwa.
Ahyo, yawele na makutu ga kuhulika yahuliche.”
Nakawalonjela kahi, “Mhulichize goya chomhulika! Chipimilo chichila chomulinguwapimila wanhu wanji ndo chicho Nguluwi kowapimila namwe, kahi mokonjezelwa ng'hatu.
Yawele na chinhu kopegwa na chinji. Heye yawele hela chinhu, na achila chidodo choyawele nacho choholigwa.”
Yesu nakalonga, “Undewa wa Nguluwi ufanda kota hino, munhu nakanyala nyhadikwa kumgunda.
Nechilo kanguwasa, na nemisi kangulola na nyhadikwa zangulutilila kukula, ila heye havizelele chilingukoleka.
Misanga jangudita mihale kukula na kulela mafuza, mwaluko kuzuka mahamba madeche, hamba liso na mwiso nhyule mgati mwa liso.
Aho wone nhyule ipye, munhu ayo kokwaluka kuhola chimaje cha kebenela kwa vila mhela wa mbena ufika.”
Yesu nakawauza, “Tuuwhanize Undewa wa Nguluwi na chinhu chachi? Tudamle kwa nhelo yachi?
Ufanda kota hino, munhu nakahola nyhadikwa iwele ndodo ng'hatu ya haladali kusinda zeng'ha na kuinyala mmisanga.
Mhela udo hela, yokota na kuwa igodi likulu kusinda migodi jeng'ha kumgunda. Nhagala ziwaga ng'hulu videje vya kuulanga vyuyaga kuzenga vivulila vyawo mlubehelo lwa nhagala za alyo igodi.”
Yesu nakawadamlila usenga wa heye kwa nhelo nyinji, nakadamla na hewo kota vila vyowaliwovizela.
Heye Yesu nahayali yolangusa chinhu ne kuwika nhelo, ila wone yawe yeka na walanguswa wa heye, kowa yowagubulila goyalonjile.
Lusanya vyo luswele, Yesu kawalonjela awala walanguswa wa heye, “Tuloche kumwambu kwa ilamba.”
Lelo, nawawaleka wanhu wamemile, walanguswa nawenjila amo mu itumbwi, kwali na mitumbwi jinji aho.
Baho du nakwali na mbeho, na kutiguka kwa mazi mu ilamba, itumbwi na lyaluka kumema mazi.
Heye Yesu nakawasa yawichile mutwi mchegamo, awala walanguswa wamwinula wamlonjela, “Mlangusa, ndaze hulingona kota hetwe tobagama kwa mazi?”
Lelo, nakenuka kailonjela ila mbeho “Nyamalile!” Vivila kailonjela nhigu ya ilamba, “Tulu! Nyamalile!” Baho mbeho nainyamalila na kwali tulu.
Yesu nakawalonjela awala walanguswa wa heye, “Leka choni mwangudumba? Ndaze, mng'hali hela makundo?”
Nahewo nawadumba heko walonga, “Ayu munhu wachi lelo, mbaka nhigu na mbeho vyangumuhulika?”
Yesu na walanguswa wa heye nawafika kuli isi ya Wagelasi, mwambu ya ilamba lya Galilaya.
Baho du Yesu vyoyalawile muli itumbwi nakating'hana na munhu yali yochikala kuwele na vilaga. Ayo munhu yali na chijeni chihile.
Yali yochikala mvilaga, kwali kuduhu munhu yojeza kumhejelela yamibate yojeza kumkowela na minyololo.
Mala nyinji nawajeza kumkowela minyololo moko na magulu, nakadumulaga na kusa lyuma lyo wamkowele nalyo. Ayu munhu yali na mong'ho ng'hatu na kwali kuduhu munhu wa kumibata.
Nemisi na nechilo yali yochikala mvilaga mchidunda yotowa iyowe na kitemangatemanga kwa maganga.
Loyamuwene Yesu kwa kutali, kambilimila, kenamiza.
Kalonga kwa lizi likulu, “Kuna choni na heni, hegwe Yesu Mwana wa Nguluwi yali kuchanya? Kwa itagwa lya Nguluwi ndangukulanda uleche kungaza!”
Nakalonga ahyo kwa vila Yesu yali yamlonjele, “Chijeni chihile mlawe munhu ayu.”
Yesu kamuuza, “Itagwa lyako kwaani?” Na heye kedichila, “Itagwa lyangu chilundo cha wamizi, mina hetwe twa wenji.”
Vijeni vimdedeza Yesu yaleche kuviwinga avyo vijeni mli isi ila.
Kwali na lung'hongola lukulu lwa migubi jidimigwa hali chidunda.
Ahyo, vila vijeni vimlanda, “Utugale kuli ajo migubi, tujinjile.”
Yesu kavikundiza, avyo vijeni vihile, vijinjila jila migubi. Lung'hongola lweng'ha lwa migubi jifichile elufu mbili najifiduka mnyenje ya chidunda kwinjila milamba, jibagama.
Wadimi wa ajo migubi nawabilima, wadamla mbuli azo kuli miji na kumigunda. Wanhu nawoya kulola galawile.
Awala wanhu vyo wamlutile Yesu, wamona ayula munhu yawele na chijeni yekale hanyi, Yawele na luhala lwake na yavalile ivalo, na wala wanhu nawadumba.
Awala wanhu vyowagawene agala gogalawile kwa munhu yawele na chijeni na ajila migubi,
wamlonjela Yesu yoche kuli isi ya hewo.
Yesu vyoyali yokwinjila mu itumbwi, yula munhu yosigwe vijeni nakamlanda yamkundize kulutasa.
Yesu nakalema, kamlonjela, “Ulute kaye kwako, kawalonjele wang'holozo mbuli zeng'ha Mkulu zo yakuditile na vyoyakonele isungu.”
Ayula munhu kaluta, kaluka kudamla kuli Mji wa Dekapoli mbuli zeng'ha Yesu zoyamditile, wanhu nawekala wekagahale.
Yesu nakaloka kahi mwambu iyage ya ilamba kwa itumbwi. Lung'hongola lwa wanhu nalwikungajiza kumwando hake, na heye yali yemile hafungo mwa ilamba.
Aho Jailo yawele chilongozi wa sinagogi nakoya, loyamuwene Yesu nakafugama hali magulu ga Yesu.
Yali yolonga yolanda, “Mhinza wa heni mdodo kangutamika behi kubagama. Dedede ndangulanda tuche kaye ukamuwichile moko yaloholigwe yawe mkomu.”
Yesu nakoka hamwe na Jailo. Wanhu wenji nawamuwinza nakummemelela chila nzingo.
Kwali na mdala, yali na utamwa kwa kulawa danda mihela kumi na mili.
Mdala ayu nakagazika lukami, na kalaguligwa na wateleka mikwandi wenji ne kuloholigwa hebu. Nakataga sendi nyinji ne ulohozi kuduhu, ila nakalutilila kugazika.
Na vyoyahuliche goyodita Yesu, ndo kaluta na ahyo nakafyela lung'hongola lwa wanhu walihamwe na Yesu na kudoliza nguwo ya heye.
Nakadita ahyo, mina yali yolonga yaliyeka, “Wone ndibate nguwo ya heye, ndowa mkomu.”
Kebata nguwo ya Yesu, na danda yali ilawa bahala du kona naileka kulawa. Na heye nakehulika mlukuli lwake kawa mkomu.
Yesu nakavizela, nakona mong'ho wa heye uwa udo, kahinduka kauza kalonga, “Whaani yebate nguwo ya heni?”
Walanguswa wamwidichila walonga, “Ulole wanhu vyo wamemile, lekachoni kwanguuza whaani yakibate?”
Ila Yesu kalutilila kulola yamone ayo yaditile hino.
Aho yula mdala yavizelele choni chimlawile, kaluta yokakama kuno yodumba, nakafugamila mmagulu ga Yesu, kamlonjela yokomya gose galawile.
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Mhinza, makundo ga hegwe gakulohola. Ulute goya, uwe mkomu ulawe ng'hatu utamwa wa hegwe.”
Yesu vyoyali yang'ali yolonga, wanhu nawoya kulawa hakaye kwa Jailo chilongozi wa ng'handa ya kusalila, wamlonjela kota, “Mina mhinza wa hegwe nakabagama. Uleche kuzakumgaza Mlangusa.”
Ila Yesu nekulola chowalonjile kamlomjela Jailo chilongozi wa sinagogi, “Uleche kudumba, ukunde hela.”
Yesu hamkundize munhu yoneche kulutasa, ila Petili na Yakubu na Yohani mng'holoze Yakobo.
Nawafika kaye kwa Jailo chilongozi wa sinagogi, Yesu nakawona wanhu wapunganiche nakahulika kuwemba, chililo na kulomboleza kwinji.
Yesu nakenjila mng'handa kawalonjela wanhu, “Lekachoni mwangupunganika? Lekachoni mwangulila? Mwana habagame kawasa hela.”
Wanhu nawamseka Yesu, ahyo nakawalavya wose kunze, nakawahola mhaza na mayake mhinza yula, na wala walanguswa wa heye wadatu, nawenjila kuchihengo kowawichile lukuli lwa mhinza.
Yesu kambata moko, nakamlonjela ayula mhinza yabagame kalonga, “Talita, kumi,” Mina, “Muhinza ndangukulonjela, ulilimche!”
Baho mhinza kalilimka, nakaluka kujendajenda, nayali na miyaka kumi na mili, aga logalawile, wanhu weng'ha nawekala wabubuwala lukami.
Yesu nakawalemeza wanhu waleche kumlonjela munhu. Hamba nakawalonjela, “Wamgalile chilyo ayula mhinza yalilimche yalye.”
Yesu nakalawa koyali, kaluta hakaye hake Nazaleti koyalawile, yelongoze na walanguswa wa heye.

Ifichile zuwa lya Kwesela, kaluka kuwalangusa mng'handa ya kusalila. Kwali na wanhu wenji na wali wohulichiza na wekala wabubuwale, weuza walonga!, “Kagalavya kohi aga gose? Kahi luhala lwachi loyapegwe ayu? Kahi, kangudita ndaze vinduzanduza avi vyoyalingudita?
Ahi ayu hawele selemala, mwana wa Maliya mng'holoze na Yakubu na Yose na Yudasi na Simoni? Ndaze walumbuze hawalingikala baha na hetwe?” Hamba wambeza!
Yesu kawalonjela, “Waloli wa Nguluwi watogolagwa kweng'ha kula, ila hawatogolagwa hakaye hawo na kwa wang'holoze.”
Yesu haditile vinduzanduza hala honhu, ila nakawawichila moko watamwa wachefu, nakuwalohola.
Yesu nakabubuwala kwa vila wanhu awa nawalema kukunda.
Hamba Yesu nakavijendela vila vijiji vya habehi yowalangusa wanhu.
Yesu nakawachema awala walanguswa kumi na weli, kawalajiza weliweli, kawapa ludali lwa kuwinga vijeni vihile.
Kawalajiza kalonga, “Mleche kuhola chinhu komluta, mleche kuhola chilyo na sendi na mhako, mhole ng'hweku yeka.
Mvale makwamba, ila mleche kuhola igwanda lya keli.”
Kahi nakawalonjela, “Honeche hombocheligwa, mikale hali ng'handa yiyo mbaka homkuka honhu aho.
Honhu honeche, wanhu hawawabochele ne kuhulika gomlangusa, muche mkung'hune nhimbwisi mmagulu genu iwe ulolezi wa kuwapanjila hewo.”
Awala walangusa nawoka na kuwadamlila wanhu Mbuli Inojile na kuwalonjela wamgalamchile Nguluwi.
Nawalavya vijeni vinji na wawabakaliza mafuta watamwa waloholigwa.

Helodi mndewa wa Galilaya nakahulika goyalingudita Yesu, mina lutogo lwake nalwenela honhu heng'ha. Wanhu wamwe nawali wolonga, “Yohani Mbatiza kazilipuka, ndo vila mong'ho uno wangukola mijito mgati mwake.”
Wanhu wanji wali wolonga, “Munhu ayu ndo Eliya, na wanji wali wolonga, ayu ndo mloli wa Nguluwi, kota awala waloli wakatali.”
Mndewa Helodi vyoyahuliche, kalonga, “Hambi ndo Yohani Mbatiza! Ndimdumule mutwi, ndaze, kazilipuka!”
Aho hamwande Helodi heye nakalajiza Yohani yebatigwe, yahindilwe mchinweng'ho, nakadita hino kwa vila nakamhesa Helodiya, na yawele mdala wa Filipo. Filipo nayali mng'holoze Helodi.
Yohani Mbatiza yali yomlonjela Helodi, “Haiwa goya kuhesa mdala wa mng'holozo Filipo.”
Helodiya nakawika ng'alazi mnhumbula, mbaka yamkopole Yohani, lelo yali yolemwela kokwaluka ndaze!

Helodi yaliyomdumba Yohani, kwa vila nakavizela Yohani yali Yelile na yatanganiche, na yali yomwamila, waleche kumdita vibi. Helodi nakagana kumhulichiza Yohani, hanga loyamhuliche, nakawa na masinzo.
Zuwa imwe Helodiya nakapata mhumu. Zuwa ya kudita kukumbuchila zuwa yo yaleligwe Helodi, kawalajiza wanhu wawele wakulukulu, wakulu wa wamizi, na wakulu weng'ha waliwochikala muisi ya Galilaya.

Mhinza wa Helodiya kenjila mng'handa na kuvina goya, awala wakulu na Helodi na wajenzi wanji na wanojezwa! Mndewa Helodi nakamlonjela ayula mhinza, “Undande chinhu choneche cho ulingugana na heni ndokupa.”
Kahi na kwa ulonzi winji wa kilaha, nakamlonjela, “Ndangilaha kota choneche choundanda, ndokupa, chasi chikulu cha nusu ya undewa wa heni.”
Aho yula mhinza kalawa kunze kazangumuuza mayake, “Ndande choni?” Na heye kamwidichila, “Ulande mutwi wa Yohani Mbatiza.”
Mhinza ayula nakamhiluchila Mndewa yobilima nakumlonjela, “Ndangulanda ndigalile sambi baha mchisaye mutwi wa Yohani Mbatiza.”
Mndewa Helodi nakesinza ng'hatu, ila kwa vila nakelaha, hali wala wajenzi wezile mchilyo, nahamlemele hebu.
Lelo, Mndewa Helodi na kawalajiza wamizi wakegale mutwi wa Yohani. Mwamizi nakaluta, nakumdumula mutwi wa Yohani mla mchinweng'ho,
nakegala mutwi wa Yohani Mbatiza uwichigwe mchisaye, kamha mhinza na mhinza kamigalila mayake.
Walanguswa wa Yohani lowahuliche mbuli ayo, nawaluta kuhola mtufi wa Yohani, wazakuutila mchilaga.
Watumigwa nawahiluka, nawekungajiza hamwe hali Yesu, wamlonjela geng'ha gowaditile na kulangusa.

Yesu nakawalonjela, “Tulute tuliyeka honhu ha uviso tukesele tandi.” Nakalonga ahyo kwa vila kwali na wanhu wenji lukami wali wafika aho nakuka mbaka Yesu na walanguswa wa heye nahawawele na honhu ha kulya chilyo.
Lelo, nawoka waliyeka kwa itumbwi, waluta honhu hawele hela wanhu.
Ila wanhu wenji nawawona woluta, nawawazela. Lelo, wenji nawalawa chila muji nakubilimila kuko kowalutile Yesu na walanguswa wa heye, wawalongola kufika.
Lowaduliche kumwani, Yesu nakona lung'hongola lwa wanhu, kawonela isungu, kwa vila wali kota ming'holo jilihela mdimi. Kaluka kuwalangusa mbuli nyinji.
Nemisi naipuluta walanguswa wamlutila Yesu, nawamlonjela, “Honhu aha twa kisolo, na sambi lyangutita.
Igana uwalaje wanhu walute kumigunda na kuli vijiji vili habehi, wakagule vilyo.”
Ila Yesu nakawalonjela, “Muwape hemwe ndiya.” Na hewo wamuuza, “Lelo, tulute tugagule mibumunda kwa sendi denali miya mbili zihejile sendi za kuhega myezi nane, na kuwegalila chilyo?”
Yesu nakawauza, “Mwanajo mibumunda jilinga? Mlute mkalole.” Vyowalolile, wamlonjela, “Jabaho mibumunda jihano na somba mbili.”
Yesu nakawalajiza walanguswa wawalonjele wanhu weng'ha wekalise vilundo honhu hawele na misolo midodi.
Na hewo wekalisa kuli vilundo vya wanhu miya, miya na vya wanhu makumi gahano hano.
Hamba Yesu nakahola ajila mibumunda jihano na somba mbili, kalola kilanga, katambichiza. Kamogola kawapa walanguswa wa heye wawagawile wanhu. Na zila somba mbili nazo kawapa weng'ha.
Wanhu wose nawalya weguta.
Walanguswa wakungajiza chilyo chisigale mibumunda na somba, navimema vidoto kumi na vili.
Walume nawadile ajo mibumunda nawali wafichile elufu zihano.
Baho Yesu nakawalonjela walanguswa wenjile mli itumbwi wamlongole walute Betisaida, mwambu mwa ilamba, mhela heye yolulaga lung'hongola lwa wanhu.
Yesu vyoyawalajile wala wanhu, nakaluta kuchidunda kumlanda Nguluwi.
Loifichile matinazo, itumbwi nalyali hagati ha ilamba, na heye Yesu yali yaliyeka hafungo mwa ilamba.
Lelo, nakawona walanguswa wa heye wohila kutowa mitela ja itumbwi, kwa vila mbeho yali iputa. Behi na kubwemwenzuka, Yesu nakawawinza akuno yojenda mchanya mmazi, nakagana kuwapuluta.
Ila lowamuwene yojenda hali mazi, nawejesa idimu, nawatowa iyowe.
Mina weng'ha lowamuwene nawadumba lukami. Baho Yesu nakalonga na hewo, “Msindamale, nda heni. Mleche kudumba!”
Hamba kakwina mitumbwi mowali, na mbeho inyamalila. Walanguswa nawabubuwala ng'hatu,
kwa vila nawang'hali kuvizela ulanguso wa jila mibumunda. Luhala lwa hewo nalung'hali lububuwale.
Nawaloka ilamba, nawafika isi ya Genezaleti, nawemiza itumbwi.
Lowalawile mli itumbwi wanhu nawamzela Yesu baho.
Lelo, hima wazunguluta isi ila yeng'ha, waluka kuwahola watamwa wawasile mmicheka jawo, wawegala chila honhu kowahuliche Yesu kakuko.
Chila honhu Yesu koyalutile, mvijiji, mjini au kumigunda, wanhu nawawawika watamwa mluga, wamlanda wadolize lupembo lwa nguwo ya heye. Na weng'ha wadolize nawaloholigwa.
Mafalisayo wamwe na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa, nawalawile Yelusalemu, nawating'hana kumwando kwa Yesu.
Nawawona kota wamwe wa walanguswa wa heye wali wolya chilyo na moko gakokomoche, ne kuhovuga moko kota vila Mafalisayo navyoiganigwe na Malajizo gawo.
Mina Mafalisayo na wawele Wayahudi wanji weng'ha, nawebatililaga gowalangusigwe na wasekulu wawo, hawalyaga chinhu ne kuhovuga moko gawo goya.
Kahi, hawalyaga chinhu choneche kulawa kuli soko, mbaka wawe wachihovuje tandi. Kahi nawalangusigwa kulawa katali kota vila mbuli ya kuhovuga nego na vizombe na vinhu vya kupulika.
Lelo, Mafalisayo na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa, nawamuuza Yesu, “Lekachoni, walanguswa wa hegwe hawalingwijiza kota ulanguso wotubochele kwa wasekulu, wangulya na moko gakokomoche?”
Yesu nakedichila, “Wahadi hemwe! Mloli wa Nguluwi Isaya nakalagula goya mbuli za hemwe vyoyandiche,
Nguluwi kangulonga, ‘Wanhu awa, wangufugamila hamlomo hela,
Ila mnhumbula mwao, wa kutali na heni.’”
Kufugamila kwa hewo kwiha,
mina wangulangusa mbuli za wanhu,
kota Malajizo ga Nguluwi!
“Hemwe mwanguleka ilajizo lya Nguluwi, na mwangibatilila gomlanguswe na wanhu.”
Yesu nakalutilila kulonga, “Hemwe mna nzila ya usugu kwa kuleka malajizo ga Nguluwi, kwa mbuli ya kuwinza mabochelo ga hemwe!
Mina Musa nakalajiza, muwatogole wahaza na mai za hemwe, na yawele ngumliga mhaza au mayake, imgana yabagame.
Ila hemwe, mwangulangusa, kota, munhu yawe na chinhu cha kumtanza mhaza wa heye au mayake, ila yolonga kota chinhu acho ndo Kobani izeleche ndolendole kwa Nguluwi,
lelo, hailinguganigwa kahi kumtanza mhaza wa heye au mayake.
Ahi ndo vyomlingubeza ulonzi wa Nguluwi kwa mbuli ya ulanguso womlingibochelela. Kahi mwangudita mbuli nyinji kota zino.”
Hamba Yesu nakaluchema lula lung'hongola lwa wanhu, kawalonjela, “Mnyhulichize mweng'ha, namvizele.
Kuduhu chinhu chilingwinjila mgati mwa munhu kulawa kunze chilingumdita munhu mwavu. Ila chilingulawa mgati mwa munhu ndo chilingumdita munhu mwavu.”
Nayawele na makutu gakuhulika, nayahuliche!
Loyalulechile lula lung'hongola lwa wanhu nakwinjila mng'handa, walanguswa wa heye nawamuuza yawagubulile nhelo ila.
Yesu, nakawalonjela, “Ndaze, na hemwe hamvizelele? Ndaze, hamvizelele kota chinhu chilingumwinjila munhu kulawa kunze, hachimdita munhu yawe mwavu.
Kwa vila hachilingumwinjila munhu mnhumbula, ila kumunda, na hamba cholavigwa kunze kucholo?” Kwa kulonga hino Yesu nakavikundiza vilyo vyeng'ha.
Nakalutilila kulonga, “Chilingulawa mgati mwa munhu ndo vilingumdita munhu yawe mwavu.
Mina kulawa mgati, mnhumbula ya munhu mwangulawa majesa gehile, ung'hondwa na uhizi, na kuboka,
ubuhu na wihe na udesi na upoka na maya na kidaya na uhesi na maligo.
Aga gesa, gangulawa mgati mwa munhu, ndo galingumdita munhu mwavu.”
Hamba Yesu nakoka aho, nakaluta wilaya ya Tilo. Ako nakenjila hali ng'handa imwe na haganile munhu yavizele, ila nahawezile kivisa.
Mdala yumwe yali na mwana mhinza yawele na chijeni chihile, kahulika mbuli za Yesu. Lelo, nakoya kamfugamila nakitoza kumwando kwa magulu ga Yesu.
Mdala nayali Mgiliki yaleleche Silofoinike muisi ya Siliya, nakamlanda Yesu yamlavye mwanage chijeni chihile.
Yesu nakalonga, “Tandi wana wegute, kwa vila hainojile kuhola chilyo cha wana na kutozela mibwa.”
Ila ayula mdala kedichila kalonga, “Kukomya, Mkulu, ila na mibwa wone jikale hasi ha chisaga jiwaga jilya usanyangwa wa wana.”
Yesu nakamlonjela ayula mdala, “Kwa mbuli ya ulonzi awo, ulute kaye. Chijeni chimlawa mhinza wa hegwe!”
Lelo, nakaluta kaye, kamfika mwanage yawasile mchinhanda mkomu, chijeni chimlawile.
Yesu nakoka wilaya ya Tilo, nakakolela Sidoni, nakafika kuli ilamba lya Galilaya, kakolela Mji wa Dekapoli.
Wanhu nawamigala munhu yohambe yalonje na kuhulika, wamlanda Yesu yamuwichile moko gake mtamwa.
Yesu kamhola kaluta naye kutali na wanhu, kahola chidole kenjiza mu makutu, nakatema mite kamibata umyango.
Hamba Yesu kalola kilanga, yolanda kwa Nguluwi aku yogugumila, nakamlonjela ayula munhu “Efata,” Mina “Ugubuche.”
Baho du makutu ga heye gagubuka na umyango wa heye ugonzoka na kaluka kulonga goya hela.
Yesu nakawalonjela wanhu waleche kumlonjela munhu. Ila vyoyawalemeze kuwalonjela wanhu hewo ndo kota kawasonza kuwalonjela wanhu goyodita.
Wanhu weng'ha nawahuliche nawali wabubuwale, wolonga, “Kangudita geng'ha goya, kanguwagubula meho wohambe walole, na wohambe walonje, wangulonga!”
