“Na wone mzenguwagana wala walinguwagana hemwe yeng'ha, mopegwa choni? Haduhu. Kwa vila na wehile nawo wanguwagana wala walinguwagana hewo.
Kahi wone mzenguwaditila ganojile wala wali nguwaditila hemwe ganojile mopegwa choni? Wehile nawo waditaga hiho.
Na wone muwaziche wala mlingona wokuhilusilani lelo mopegwa choni? Wehile nawo wawazikaga wali na gehile wayawo wogana wahilusilwe hihila.

Hebu, ila hemwe muwagane wang'honyo wa hemwe, na muwaditile ganojile, muwaziche mleka kugana kuhilusilwa na baho chila chompegwa chowa chikulu mowa wana wa Nguluwi mkulu yali kuchanya ng'hatu. Kwa vila heye kana isungu na wala wohambe wamtogole na wanhu wehile.
Muwe na isungu kota Nguluwi wa hemwe vyoyawele na isungu.
“Mleche kuwatagusa wanhu wanji, namwe hamtagusigwa na Nguluwi, mleche kuwatagusa kwa wihe wanhu namwe hatagusigwa kwa wihe. Muwalechele wanji kwa gowaditile namwe molechelwa.

Muwape wanji gowawele ngugana, hemwe namwe mopegwa. Mobochela chipimo chinojile chimemile, chobamandizwa na kusunyunyiza sunyunyiza mbaka kubohoka. Kwa vila chipimilo chichila chomulinguwapimila wanji na heye Nguluwi kopimila chichila.”
Na baho Yesu kawalonjela nhelo imwe, wone muhnu yohambe yalole komlongoza myage hambe yalole? Weng'ha weli wokwinjila mli ikulubila.
Mlanguswa hambe yamsinde mlangusa, ila yalingulanguswa wone yasinde, kanguwa kota mlangusa wa heye.
“Ila kochona ndaze chibanzi chiwele miziho lya mng'holozo, ila uleka kuchona ching'hanzi chiwele miziho lya hegwe.

Kodaha ndaze kumlonjela mng'holozo, ‘Mng'holozangu, Bete ndikuse chibanzi chiwele miziho lyako,’ Na kuno hambe uchone ching'hanzi chiwele miziho lya hegwe? Kwa mdesi hegwe! Tandi use chibanzi chiwele miziho lyako aho kodaha kulavya ching'hanzi chiwele miziho lya mng'holozo.
“Igodi linojile halilelaga mafuza gehile, na hiho igodi lihile halilelaga mafuza ganojile.
Chila igodi lyozeleka kwa mafuza gake. Yangoneka wanhu hawabawaga masada kuli migodi jili na miwa, kahi hawabawaga ububu kulawa kuli mikwangwasale.
Munhu yanojile kangulavya ganojile, gawichigwe mnhumbula mwa heye, na munhu yehile kangulavya gehile kulawa mnhumbula ya heye, kwa vila munhu kalongaga kulawa gala gamemile mnhumbula ya heye.
“Lekachoni mwangunhyema, ‘Mkulu, Mkulu’ Na kuno hambe mdite gondilonga?
Munhu yoneche yokuya kwa heni na kunyhulichiza na kugadita.

Ayo kehwana na munhu yazenjile ng'handa, yula yabawile msisi wa heye mchanya hali italawe na kuzenga ng'handa ya heye baho, nhonya ng'hulu na itowa mazi menji na gamema, lukolola lwa mazi luitowa ila ng'handa, ilemwela kutigasika, lekachoni, naizenjigwa goya yimile.

Ila munhu yoneche yawelenguhulika aga gondilonga ila hambe yadite chinhu, ayo kehwana na munhu yazenjile ng'handa hali sangalaza, habawile msisi. Lulawa lwanda lumemile, lutowa ng'handa ila, igwa luu! Itugunika yeng'ha.”
Yesu loyalonjile gala goyaganile wanhu wahulichize, nakaluta Kapanaumu.
Ako kwali na mkulu wa wamizi mloma, yali na chitumagwa yomgana lukami. Yula chitumagwa wa heye yaliyotamika behi ya kubagama.
Yula mkulu wa wamizi wa Loma loyahuliche mbuli za Yesu kawalonjela wakulu wamwe wayahudi wakamlonjele yoye yamusile utamwa yula mpogozi.
Lowafichile kwa Yesu, wamdedeza ng'hatu, wolonga, “Munhu ayu imgana yaditilwe mbuli ayo.
Mina heye yuye kanguwagana wanhu wa hetwe na isi ya hetwe, na ndo yatuzenjele ila ng'handa ya kusalila.”
Yesu nakaluta hamwe na hewo. Hoyali behi kwinjila kaye ha yula mkulu wa wamizi Mloma, kawalajiza wala weganaga wakamlonjele Yesu, “Mkulu siganigwe winjile mng'handa ya heni.
Ndo mina siwene ndanguganigwa mbuye kouli hegwe, ila ulonje ulonzi hela, chitumagwa wa heni kowa mkomu.

Mina, na heni nani, nda munhu mbichigwa hali ludali lwa wanji, ndanawo wamizi hasi ha heni. Ndangumlonjela yumwe, ‘Ulute!’ Na heye kanguluta, na yunji, ‘Uye!’ Na heye kanguya, na chitumagwa wa heni, ‘Udite chinhu chino,’ Na heye kangudita.”

Yesu loyahuliche ago, nakabubuwala, kamtogola yula mkulu. Hamba kawagalamchila wala wali womuwinza, kalonga, “Ndanguwalonjelani, sinamona munhu yawele na makundo kota aga, mli isi yeng'ha ya Izilaeli.”
Wala wanhu lowafichile kaye wamfika yula chitumagwa yotamika yawele mkomu.
Hamba Yesu nakaluta honhu hamwe hawele nguchemigwa Naini, na wala walanguswa na wanhu wanji, newelongoza.
Hoyali behi na lwizi lukulu lwa kwinjila hali honhu, walawila wanhu wawele wamholile msongolo yumwe yajile, mwana yaganigwe na mamo yumwe yalechelelwe. Wanhu wenji wahala wali hamwe na ayo mamo.
Mkulu loyamuwene ayo kamonela isungu, kamlonjela, “Uleche kulila.”
Hamba kazakuchidoliza chinhanda chili na munhu yabagame, wala wali wamholile wema. Hamba kalonga, “Msongolo! Ndangukulonjela, winuche!”
Yula yajile kenuka, kekalisa, kaluka kudamla. Hamba Yesu kamhola kamgala kuli maiwake.
Wanhu weng'ha wazangudumba, wazangumtogola Nguluwi wolonga, “Mloli mkulu wa Nguluwi kalawila hotuli. Nguluwi koya kuwalohola wanhu wa heye.”
Mbuli azo zenela Yudeya kweng'ha na isi ya habehi.
Wala walanguswa wa Yohani wamlonjela mbuli zeng'ha zilonjigwe zilingumlapa Yesu. Heye Yohani nakawachema weli mwa wala walanguswa wa heye kawalonjela,
walute kwa Mkulu wamuuze, “Hegwe ndo yula yalinguya, au tumbete munhu yunji?”
Wala weli yawalanguse lowafichile hali Yesu wamlonjela, “Yohani Mbatiza katulonjela tuye kwa hegwe tukuuze, ‘Hegwe ndo yula yali nguya, au tumbeteze munhu yunji?’”
Muhela awo, Yesu yaliyowosela matamwa wanhu wenji walingugazigwa na matamwa, wali na vijeni vihile, na wanhu wenji wohambe walole wazangulola.

Yolawa Yesu kawalonjela, “Mlute mkamlonjele Yohani gala gomgahuliche na kugona, wali wohambe walole wangulola, wali na magulu gaziliche wangujenda. Wali na uswema wangwela, wohambe wahuliche wanguhulika, wafile katali wanguzilipuka, wazunwa wangudamlilwa Mbuli Inojile.
Kabweda yula munhu yohambe yandeme heni na gala gondilingudita!”

Aho watumigwa na Yohani lowochile, Yesu kaluka kuwalonjela wanhu wenji wamemile, gala gomlapa Yohani, “Lomlutile kumlola Yohani kugunuche, na mijesa yawele munhu wachi? Hambi na mijesa kowa kota isoli litigaswa na mbeho?
Lelo, namluta kulola munhu yali ndaze? Namluta kumlola munhu yavalile goya? Hebu! Wanhu wawele nguvala goya na wali na ukomu unojile wangikala mli ng'handa za wandewa!
Lelo mndonjele hambi namluta kumlola munhu wachi? Namluta kumlola mloli wa Nguluwi? Ena! Ndanguwalonjelani hemwe, ila nammona mng'hangala kusinda Mloli wa Nguluwi.
Nguluwi kangulonga, ayu Yohani ndo yawele ngulonjigwa mli Maandiko Matakatifu, ‘Ulole heni ndangumigala msenga yakugololele nzila ya hegwe.’
Yesu kasinda kwa kulonga, ndangukulonjelani, wanhu weng'ha haduhu yawele mkulu ng'hatu kusinda Yohani Mbatiza. Ahyo, yula yali mdodo ng'hatu kuli Undewa wa Nguluwi, ndo mkulu kusinda heye.”
Wanhu weng'ha, na wakongoza kodi lowahuliche ago, nawatogola kunoga kwa Nguluwi ahyo nawakunda kubatizigwa na Yohani.
Ila Mafalisayo na wala wavizelele goya Malajizo ga Musa, nawalema kumhulichiza Nguluwi, kwa vila nawalema kubatizigwa na Yohani.
Yesu nakalonga, “Ulelo awu ndiuwhanize na chinhu chachi? Ndo wanhu wali ndaze?
Kota wasongolo wawele wekalise kuli soko wochichema na kilonjela, ‘Tuwatowelani mluli ila hamvinile! Twimba nzimbo za chililo, ila hamlilile.’
Yohani Mbatiza nakoya kazanguwoha na hang'hwele ujimbi, hemwe mlonga, ‘Kana chijeni!’
Heye mwana wa munhu koya, kazangulya na kung'hwa, hemwe mlonga, ‘Mloleni, mlya chila chinhu ayu mgalaji, kangigana na wakongoza kodi, na wehile.’
Ila luhala lwa Nguluwi loneka lunoga kwa wala weng'ha walinguikunda.”
Mfalisayo yumwe nakamchema Yesu kaye koyekalaga kulya ndiya ya hamihe hamwe na heye. Aho Yesu nakaluta kuli ng'handa ya Mfalisayo, na kekalisa kulya ndiya.
Kuli ula mji hali mamo yumwe yawele na gehile. Loyahuliche Yesu kamng'handa ya ayo Mfalisayo, nakahola chupa ya alabasta iwelenguguzigwa kwa sendi nyinji imemile mafuta galingunhunhyilila ng'hatu.

Koya kema habehi hali magulu ga Yesu, kalila, na mahozi gake gaza gumlagalila Yesu mmagulu. Ayo mdala kaza kubagusa magulu ga Yesu kwa mnvili zake. Hamba kamnonela magulu na kumbakaliza gala mafuta gawelengunhunhyilila.
Yula Mfalisayo yamchemile Yesu yawene ahyo, kazangijesa mnhumbula, “Wone munhu ayu na yawe Mloli wa Nguluwi, yahavizelele mdala ayu yamdolize, kandaze, kana gehile!”
Yesu kamlonjela ayo Mfalisayo, yamchemile, “Simoni ndina chinhu cha kukulonjela.” Heye Simoni nakamlonjela, “Ena mlangusa undonjele.”
Yesu kaluka kulonga, “Wanhu weli wamwaziche munhu sendi, yumwe yali yamwaziche sendi zihejile msahala wa mhela umwe na nusu, na yunji sendi denali miya zihano zihejile msahala wa mwezi umwe na nusu.
Lowalemwelile kumhilulila gowaziche ayo munhu, nahawadaile weng'ha weli, awo weli yalikohi yomgana lukami munhu yula yawaziche?”
Simoni nakedichila, “Ndangijesa ndo Yula yalechelwe sendi nyinji zoyawele ngudaigwa.” Yesu nakamlonjela “Goya.”

Hamba kagalamka kwa yula mdala kalonga, “Simoni kwangumona ayu mdala?, Heni honyinjile aha haluga hako humphele mazi ga kuhovujila magulu gangu, ila mdala ayu kanhyovuga magulu gangu na mahozi gake na kumbagusa na mnvili za heye.
Hegwe hundamse kwa kunonela, ila ayu myago mdala kulawa nhyinjile hano yali yoganonela magulu gangu.
Hegwe hulajile isungu lyako kwa kumbakaliza mafuta ga ngulingunhunhyilila mmutwi, ila ayu myago mdala kadita ahyo kambakaliza magulu gangu.
Ahyo ndangukulonjela, ayu mdala kangungana ng'hatu, na ndo koselwa gehile ga heye menji. Ila munhu yoselwe gehile mado kangugana mado.”
Na baho Yesu kamlonjela yula mdala, “Kusilwa geng'ha gehile gouditile.”
Aho wala wali hamwe mchisanya wazangiuza, “Munhu ayu kandaze kangumusila munhu gehile goyaditile?”
Heye Yesu kamlonjela yula mdala, “Makundo ga hegwe gakulohola, ulute goya.”
Ago logapulute, Yesu nakakola mwesa yowadamlila Mbuli Inojile ya Undewa wa Nguluwi. Wala kumi na weli nawelongoza hamwe.
Na wadala wamwe wala Yesu nayawosele chijeni na matamwa, nawelongoza hamwe. Awo wali Maliya yachemigwe Madelena, yula nayosigwe vijeni vihile saba,
na Yohana mdala wa Kuza, mkola mijito mng'hangala wa Helodi. Wadala wali hamwe na Yesu ndo achina Susana na wadala wanji. Awo wadala wali wamditila Yesu kwa lufufu lwao hewo.
Mihela jimwe chilundo cha wanhu chali chimema, na wanhu wali womuyila Yesu kulawa chila honhu. Heye kawalonjela nhelo ayi.
“Mnyalaji nayaliyomiza azo nhyadikwa, zimwe nazigwa mnzila, wakola nzila wazibiga, videje vya kuulanga vilya.
Zinji nazigwa hali maganga, lozotile zikala lozisowile mazi.
Zinji nazigwa hali migodi jiwele na miwa. Jila migodi ja miwa jikula, nyhadikwa lozotile zipilinjilwa.
Zinji nazigwa hali misanga jinojile zota na zilela veduu!” Loyalonjile ahyo, kachemeleza lizi, kalonga, “Lelo mhuliche, yawele na makutu ga kuhulika nayahuliche!”
Walanguswa nawamuuza Yesu, nhelo ayi yangutulangusa choni?

Heye kawalonjela, “Hemwe mpegwa kuzizela zila zivisigwe za Undewa wa Nguluwi, ila awo wanji hebu, leka hewo wangulonjelwa kwa kulanguswa, leka, wone wazengulola waleche kugona, na wone wahuliche waleche kuvizela.
“Lelo nhelo ayi yangulonga ahi, nhyadikwa ndo ulonzi wa Nguluwi.
Zila zigwile mnzila zangulajila wala wanhu wawelenguhulika ulonzi wa Nguluwi, hamba lyokuya Limazoga lyanguzusa mnhumbula za hewo, waleche kukunda waloholigwe.
Zila zigwile hali italawe ndo wala walinguhulika awo ulonzi wanguubochela wasangalale. Ila kota zila nhyadikwa, ila wala wanhu wahela mizabi wangukunda hado hela, ila howojezigwa, wangugozola.

Zila zigwile mli igodi liwele na miwa, ndo zangulangusa wala wanhu wawelenguhulika ula ulonzi, hado hela, lowoluta wangubanigwa na kudumba, na vinhu vinojile vya isi, na hambe walele mafuza gakangale.
Na zila zigwile mli misanga jinojile, ndo wala wanhu wawelenguhulika ulonzi awo, wangibatilila mnhumbula, awo wangwimilila mbaka wangulela mafuza.
“Wanhu hawawesaga chenje na kuchigubika chidoto au kuwika mluvungu lwa chinhanda. Ila wawikaga kuli honhu ha kuwichila chenje wogana wanhu lowokwinjila mla mng'handa wazengulola chila chenje.
“Chila chinhu chivisigwe chogubuligwa na chila chinhu chigubikwe, chozeleka na kuwichigwa hazelu.
“Lelo milolele vyomuwelenguhulika, mina yawele na chinhu kokonjezelwa, ila yula yalihela chinhu, chila choyalingijesa kanacho choholigwa.”
Aho mamo na wang'holoze Yesu wamuyila, ila na walemwela kumhejelela habehi wanhu nawamema lukami.
Munhu yumwe nakamlonjela Yesu, “Mayako na wang'holozo wakunze wangugana wakone.”
“Ila Yesu kawalonjela wanhu, mayangu na wang'holozangu ndo wala walinguhulika luzi lwa Nguluwi na kibata.”
Izuwa limwe Yesu nakakwina mli itumbwi limwe hamwe na wala walanguswa, kawalonjela, “Tuloche ilamba mbaka kumwambu.” Waluka kuluta.
Lowali woluta mli itumbwi, Yesu nakebatigwa na usinjizi. Kawasa. Nhigu ya mazi ng'hangala yaluka kuputa, mazi galuka kwinjila mli itumbwi, kwaluka kwiha,
wala walanguswa wamlutila Yesu, wamwinula wolonga, “Mkulu, Mkulu! Tozangumala!” Yesu kenuka kaideuza ila nhigu na mbeho, baho vileka, kuwa tulu!.
Yesu kawauza, “Gakohi makundo ga hemwe?” Ila hewo wazangupulisa na kudumba kuno wochilonjela ayu ndo whaani? “Kanguilonjela nhigu na mbeho vyangumuhulika?”
Yesu nawalanguswa wa heye nawalutilila na majendo. Wafika mhwani ya isi ya Wagelasi ili kumwambu kwa ilamba lya Galilaya.
Loyali yodulika mhwani, munhu yumwe yawele na chijeni hala kulawa katali, ayo munhu hali yovala nguwo kahi yali hambe yochikala kaye ila nakekalaga kuwele na vilaga!
Loyamuwene Yesu ketoza hanyi hoyali Yesu na kulonga lizi likulu, “Hegwe Yesu Mwana wa Nguluwi Mkulu, yawele kuchanya ng'hatu, kuna choni na heni ndangukulanda uleche kungaza!”

Nakalonga ahyo Yesu yaliyochilonjela acho chijeni chihile mlawe munhu ayu. Chijeni acho chihile nachimuyilaga ayo munhu mala nyinji. Wanhu nawamuwohaga na minyololo na kumhindila, ila myao nakadoholaga vyowamuwohile kangubilimiswa na acho chijeni chihile mbaka honhu hagunuche.
Yesu kamuuza, itagwa lyako kwaani? Heye kedichila itagwa lyangu chilundo cha wamizi. Mina mimazoga minji ja mumu.
Avyo vijeni vimdedeza uleche kutugala kuli ikulubila.
Honhu hala hali na migubi minji jidimigwa mchidunda. Ahyo, avyo vijeni vilawe viwenjile. Baho Yesu kawakundiza.
Avyo vijeni vimlawa yula munhu, wazakwinjila kuli migubi, jila migubi jilawa jifiduka jizakwinjila kuli ilamba lya mazi jibagama.
Wala wadimi lowagawene ago geng'ha galawile nawabilima waza kuwalonjela wanhu mbuli azo kuli miji na kumigunda.
Wanhu woya kulola galawile, wamlutila Yesu Wamona yula munhu yalavigwe chijeni yekalise habehi na Yesu yavalile nguwo yawele na luhala lwake luhiluche, wanhu weng'ha wadumba.
Wala wanhu waliwene alyo lilawile wawasimila wayao, vila ayo munhu yawele na chijeni voyaloholigwe.
Wenyeng'haye wa isi ya Gelasi, nawadumba heko! Wazangumlonjela Yesu yoche, baho Yesu nakakwina kahi mli itumbwi, koka
Yula munhu yalavigwe vijeni kazangumdedeza Yesu walutase. Ila Yesu hakundile, ila kamlonjela
“Hiluche kaye kalonje geng'ha Nguluwi goyakuditile.” Yula munhu kaluta yodamla chila honhu hali muji ula gala geng'ha Yesu goyamditile.
Yesu loyahiluche nzingo iyage ya ilamba, wanhu wenji wambochela kwa mina wali wombeteza
Baho koya munhu yumwe yawele nguchemigwa Jailo, mkulu wa ng'handa ya kusalila, kafugama mmagulu ga Yesu kamlanda yalute kaye kwa heye,
Mina mwanage mdala yawele na miyaka kumi na mili, yali mtamwa lukami behi na kubagama.
Yesu loyali yoluta, wanhu waza kummemelela chila nzingo
Aho hali na mdala yumwe hali wala wanhu wamemile, yali na utamwa wa kulawa danda miyaka kumi na mili. Na heye nakalavya sendi nyinji kwa walaguzi yochiteleka, ila haduhuli yamlohole.
Ayo mdala nakamuwinza Yesu mmbele, nakadoliza lupembo lwa nguwo ya heye. Baho kaloholigwa utamwa wa heye wa kulawa danda.
Yesu kauza, “Yalikohi yandolize?” Weng'ha walonga haduhuli munhu yakudolize. Wanhu weng'ha walema ila Petili kalonga, “Mkulu wanhu wenji wakuzunguluta na kiminyangaminyanga.”
Ila Yesu kalonga, “Kakuko munhu yandolize, mina nambona mong'ho wa heni wa kulohola undawa.”
Yula mdala yawene hodaha kivisa kalawa yokakama kuno yodumba, ketoza mmagulu ga Yesu. Hala kamlonjela Yesu kumwando hali wanhu weng'ha chimwambuze kumdoliza Yesu na vyoyosigwe utamwa bahala.
Yesu nakamlonjela yula mdala, “Mhinza, makundo ga hegwe gakulohola. Ulute goya.”
Yesu loyali yang'hali yodawala, Jailo chilongozi wa ng'handa ya kusalila kegalilwa na chitumagwa nguto kulawa kaye. “Mina mhinza we hegwe nakabagama, lekachoni, uzengumgaza Mlangusa lukami.”
Yesu loyahuliche ago kamlonjela Jailo, “Uleche kudumba ukunde! Heye kowa mkomu.”
Loyafichile kaye kwa Jailo hamkundize munhu kwinjila mg'handa hamwe na heye, ila Petili yali yeng'ha. Yohani, na Yakubu na wahaza wa ayo mdala.
Wanhu weng'ha wali wowemba na kwimbilila. Ila Yesu kawalonjela, “Mleche kuwemba, yuno mwana habagame kawasa hela!”
Hewo wazangumseka mina nawavizela yula mwana kabagama.
Ila Yesu kambata moko kalonga, “Gomwana winuche!”
Muhe wa heye imuhiluchila, bahala kalilimka. Yesu kawalonjela mgalileni ndiya.
Wala wahaza wahuliche wabubuwala, ila Yesu kawalonjela waleche kumlonjela ne munhu ago galawile.
Yesu nakawachema hamwe walanguswa wa heye kumi na weli na kawapa mong'ho na ludali lwa kulavya vijeni na kuwosela wanhu matamwa.
Na baho kawalajiza walute kudamla mbuli ya Undewa wa Nguluwi na kuwosela wanhu matamwa.
Kawalonjela, “Lomkuka mleche kuhola chinhu choneche chila, mleche kuhola ng'hweku ne mhako ne ndiya ne sendi ne igwanda lya keli.
Chila ng'handa yoneche yomkwinjila na kubocheligwa, mikale mumo mbaka lomkuka kuli muji awo.
Na wanhu wone waleme kukubochelani mlawe aho honhu, namwe lomlawa mkung'hune nhimbwisi iwele mmagulu genu iwe ulolezi wa kuwapanjila hewo.”
Walanguswa waluka kuluta, na wakola mli vijiji wodamla Mbuli Inojile na kuwosela wanhu matamwa chila honhu.
Helodi mndewa wa Galilaya loyahuliche mbuli zeng'ha lozilawile, kadumba ng'hatu kwa vila wanhu wenji na wekala wolonga kota Yohani Mbatiza kazilipuka kulawa koyabagame.
Wamwe walonga Eliya kalawila na wamwe walonga yumwe wa waloli wakatali kazilipuka kulawa kowabagame.
Ila mndewa Helodi kalonga, “Yohani ndimdumula mutwi. Hambi! Zino zondihulika mbuli za heye yalihi?” Ahyo kagana yamone Yesu.
Wala watumigwa lowahuliche, wamlonjela Yesu chila chinhu chowaditile. Yesu kawahola waliyeng'ha, kaluta nawo mbaka chijiji chiwelenguchemigwa Betisaida.
Ila wanhu lowavizelele koyalutile, nawamuwinza. Yesu kawabochela, kalonga na hewo mbuli za Undewa wa Nguluwi na kawalohola wala waliwogana kuloholigwa.

Isanya lolyaluche kuzinga, walanguswa kumi na weli waluta na kumlonjela, “Walonjele wanhu walute kuli vijiji na migunda ja habehi, wekepalile chilyo na honhu ha kuwasa, kwa vila honhu aha twa kisolo.”
Ila Yesu kawedichila, “Muwape hemwe chilyo walye.” Hewo wamwidichila, “Hetwe twanajo mibumunda jihano na somba mbili. Mane twangona tulute twetwe tukawagulile ndiya wanhu weng'ha awa!”
Walume waliyeng'ha wali hala, wali elufu zihano. Yesu kawalonjela wala walanguswa, “Muwalonjele wanhu wekalise hasi chila honhu walume elufu zihano.”
Wala walanguswa wadita hihila, na wanhu weng'ha wekala hasi.
Baho Yesu kahola jila mibumunda jihano na zila somba mbili, kalola kuchanya kilanga, katambichiza, kamogola mibumunda na somba na kawapa walanguswa wa heye wawagawile wanhu.
Wanhu weng'ha walya, na weguta. Walokoteza usanyangwa uponile vimema vikowe kumi na vili.
Zuwa limwenga Yesu yali yomlanda Nguluwi yaliyeka. Walanguswa wamuyila na heye kawauza, “Hambi Wanhu wangulonga heni nda yalihi?”
Na Hewo wamwidichila, “Wamwe wangulonga hegwe Yohani Mbatiza, wamwe wangulonga hegwe Eliya, na wamwe wangulonga yumwe wa waloli wa Nguluwi wakatali yazilipuche kulawa kowabagame.”
Na heye kawauza, “Na hemwe mwangulonga heni nda whaani?” Petili kedichila, “Hegwe ndo Kilistu Mlohozi yahaguligwe na Nguluwi.”
Na baho Yesu kawalonjela waleche kumlonjela ne munhu chinhu chino.
Hamba kawalonjela, “Mwana wa munhu koganigwa kugazigwa ng'hatu na kulemigwa na walalile na watambika wakulu na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa. Kokomigwa, ila zuwa lya kadatu kozilipuka.”
Na baho kawalonjela wanhu weng'ha, munhu yoneche yogana kumbinza heni yeleme yuye, yahole msalaba wa heye yambinze.
Kwa vila munhu yoneche yogana kuulohola ukomu wa heye kowajiliza, ila munhu yali ngwajiliza ukomu wa heye kwa mbuli ya heni koulohola.
Ndaze, munhu yowa na chila chinhu mu isi yeng'ha, ila yowajiliza ukomu wa heye, munhu ayo kopata choni chinojile?
Wone munhu yambonele soni na gala gondilingulangusa, mwana wa munhu komonela soni ayo munhu mihela joyokuya mu ukulu wa heye na wa Mhaza na wahilisi wa kilanga welile.
Ndangukulonjelani ndikomya, wabahano wanhu hawobagama mbaka wawone Undewa wa Nguluwi.
Mazuwa nane kulawa loyalonjile mbuli azo, Yesu nakawahola Petili na Yohani na Yakubu, kaluta nawo kuchidunda kulanda.
Yesu Loyali yolanda, chihanga cha heye chigaluka na livalo liwa izelu chwee!
Na baho wanhu weli woneka wolonga na heye. Wanhu awo wali Musa na Eliya,
nawoneka wana ukulu wa kilanga, na wolonga na Yesu mbuli za heye zizangulawila ako Yelusalemu.
Petili na wayage wali wawasile, ila lowalilipuche, wawona ukulu wa Yesu na wanhu weli na wali wemile hamwe na heye.

Awo wanhu wala lowamlechile Yesu, Petili kamlonjela Yesu. “Mkulu, goya hetwe tikale hano! Leka tuzenje vibumuli vidatu, chimwe cha hegwe na chimwe cha musa na chimwe cha Eliya.” Petili na havizelele hebu choyaliyolonga.
Petili loyalutilile kulonga ago, ng'hungugu ilawila iwagubika, na ng'hungugu ila loiwoyele wala walaguswa nawadumba ng'hatu lowagubichwe na ng'hungugu ayo!.
Lizi ilonga kulawa mli ila ng'hungugu, “Ayu ndo mwana wa heni ndimhagule, muhulichize heye.”
Lizi loihulikwe, Yesu nakoneka yali yeng'ha. Walanguswa wanyamalila na hawamlonjele ne munhu mbuli ayo yowaiwene.
Mitondo yake, Yesu na wala walanguswa wadatu lowali wodulika kulawa kuchidunda, lung'hongola lwa wanhu wenji naluting'hana na Yesu.
Mumula mli wanhu wenji kalawila munhu kachemeleza lizi yolonga, “Mlangusa! Ndangukulanda umlole mwana wa heni, ka mwana yaliyeng'ha yonditumbila!
Chijeni chimgazaga, na chimditaga yanzenguyowa, chimditaga chinzilisa na ifulo lilawaga kumlomo, chilemaga kumleka na kumzuhulanga.
Nandiwalanda walanguswa wa hegwe wamlavye chijeni acho, ila walemwela.”
Yesu kedichila, “Hambi hemwe ulelo lulihela makundo, wajilile na uli na gehile! Ndochikala na hemwe mbaka nili?” Na baho kamlonjela munhu yula, “Ngalile msongolo wa hegwe hano.”
Msongolo yula loyezile, chila chijeni nachimgwisa hanyi chimzilisa. Yesu nakaching'hanuchila chila chijeni chihile na kumlohola yula, na baho kamhilusila mhaza wa heye.
Walanguswa weng'ha wekala wabubuwale kwa ukulu woyawele nawo Nguluwi.
Wala wanhu lowang'hali bahala wabubuwale mbuli zila zoyaditile, Yesu kawalonjela wala woyalinguwalangusa,
“Mhulichize chino cho ndikulonjelani! Mwana wa Munhu kanguzawichigwa mmoko mwa wanhu.”
Ila hewo hawauzelele hebu uviso wa ulonzi awo, kwa vila nauvisigwa kwa hewo waleche kuvizela hebu, na hewo wadumba kumuuza Yesu.
Wala walanguswa walikiuza hewo kwa hewo, yalihi yawele mkulu ng'hatu hali hetwe.
Yesu kagona majesa ga hewo, kamhola mwana mdodo, kamuwika habehi na hewo.

Na baho Kawalonjela, “Munhu yoneche yawele ngumbochela mwana mdodo ayu, kwa itagwa lyangu kangumbochela heni, na munhu yoneche yele ngumbochela heni, kangumbochela yula yanhumile. Kwa vila munhu yali mdodo homuli, ayo mkulu kusinda weng'ha.”
Yohani nakamlonjela Yesu. “Mkulu tumona munhu yolavya chijeni kwa itagwa lya hegwe. Tumlemeza kudita vila, kwa vila hetwe hatulikilongoza na heye.”
Ila Yesu kamlonjela Yohani na walanguswa wamwe, “Mleche kumlemeza! Kwa vila munhu yula yokulemele hegwe, kahamwe na hegwe.”
Mazuwa ga kuholigwa kwa Yesu kilanga louwele habehi, Yesu kagana kuluta Yelusalemu.
Kawalajiza walanguswa wamlongole, walute kuli chijiji chimwe chili muisi ya Samalia kumuwichila goya chila chinhu.
Ila wenyeng'haye wa hala, hawaganile kumbochela, kwa vila nawavizela kota yali yoluta Yelusalemu.
Walanguswa wa heye, Yohani na Yakubu lowagawene ago, wamuuza Yesu, “Mkulu, hambi kwangugana tuchilonjele chiluli chiwadulichile kulawa kilanga uwalakaze weng'ha?”
Ila heye kawagalamchila kawadeuza.
Na baho Yesu na walanguswa wa heye waluta kuli chijiji chiyage.
Lowali wokola mnzila, munhu yumwe kamlonjela Yesu, “Ndokuwinza koneche kouluta.”
Yesu kawalonjela, “Mibwa ja kisolo jina mhalika na videje vya kuulanga vina vimvulila, ila mwana wa munhu kahela honhu ha kuwasiliza mutwi na kwesela.”
Hamba Yesu kamlonjela munhu yumwenga, “Umbinze.” Ila munhu ayo kalonga, “Mkulu ung'hundize tandi ndute ndikamtile mhaza wa heni.”
Yesu kamwidichila, “Waleche wabagame wawatile wayao wabagame, ila hegwe ulute kadamle kuya kwa Undewa wa Nguluwi.”
Munhu yumwenga kamlonjela, “Ndokuwinza hegwe Mkulu, ila undeche ndikawalaje wang'holozangu kaye.”
Yesu kamlonjela, “Munhu yoneche yengibata ihuka kulima kumgunda, baho yolola kumbele, hambe yaganigwe kuli Undewa wa Nguluwi.”
Hamba, Mkulu nakawahagula wanhu wanji sabini na weli, kawalajiza weliweli, wamlongole chila honhu na chila chijiji hoyaganile heye kuluta.
Kawalonjela, “Mbeta nyinji, ila wakola mijito wachefu. Lelo, mumlande Mkulu yalajize wakola mijito wabene mbeta ya heye.
Mluteni, ndanguwalajiza hemwe kota wana ming'holo kuli mibwa ja kisolo
Mleche kuhola sendi ne mhako ne makwamba na mleche kwima na kumlamsa munhu yoneche mnzila.
Ng'handa yoneche yila yomkwinjila, mlongole na kuwalamsa ahi, ‘Mikale goya mng'handa ino.’
Wone kuwe baho na munhu yalingugana kikala goya, kikala goya kowa hamwe na heye, wone hebu kikala goya kowahiluchilani.
Mikale mli ng'handa yiyo, mulye na mung'hwe cheng'ha chila chowawichilani, kwa vila mkola mijito kangugana yapegwe sendi za heye. Mleche kulabajila kulawa ng'handa imwe kuli nyinji.
Wone mfiche kuli muji na wanhu wawabochelani, mulye chilyo chompegwa.
Muwosele matamwa wali ku muji awo, na muwalonjele, Undewa wa Nguluwi wa habehi na hemwe.
Ila wone mwinjile kuli muji na wanhu waleme kuwabochela, mlawe namwe lomkola mnzila za hewo, mlonje,
‘Na nhimbwisi za hakaye ha hemwe jeng'ha jing'hang'hanile mmagulu getu twangujikung'huna hali hemwe. Ila mvizele Undewa wa Nguluwi wa habehi na hemwe!’
Ndangulonga ndikomya, kuli zuwa lya utaguso, Nguluwi koutagusa muji ula vikulu kusinda yila ya wanhu wa Sodoma.

“Mane gwegwe, muji wa Kolazini! Kozakugaya! Hegwe muji wa Betisaida kozagaya! Kwa vila kota vinduzanduza vikoleke Tilo na Sidoni, wanhu wa hala wahavalile mivalo ja kulomboleza na kubakala mivu kulajila kota wamgalamchila Nguluwi.
Kuli zuwa lya utaguso Nguluwi kowatagusa hemwe vikulu kusinda yila ya Tilo na Sidoni.
Na hegwe Kapanaumu! Ndaze kogana kiinula mbaka kilanga? Hebu! Kozabiduswa mbaka kuli isi ya wabagame!”

Yesu nakawalonjela walanguswa wa heye, “Munhu yoneche yalinguwahulichiza hemwe, kangunyhulichiza heni, na yalingulema kuwabochela hemwe, kangundema heni. Na yula yalingulema kumbochela, kangulema kumbochela yula yanhumile.”
Hamba wala mkumi saba na weli nawahiluka wasangalale, wolonga, “Mkulu na vijeni vihile vituhulika lotuchemile itagwa lya hegwe.”
Yesu kawedichila, “Na ndilyona Limazoga lyolagala kulawa kilanga kota lumuli.
Ndiwapa ludali lwa kubiga mizoka na nyinje na mong'ho weng'ha wa kuwasumya wakwihileni, na kuduhu chinhu chiwalumiza.
Ahyo mleche kusangalala kwa vila lomuwene vijeni viwahuliche, ila msangalale kwa vila matagwa genu gandikwa kilanga.”

Muhela wuwula, Yesu kasangalala kwa Muhe Yelile ya Nguluwi. Na baho kalonga, “Ndangumtogola, Mhaza, Mkulu wa kilanga na muisi, na kuwavisa wali na luhala na wasomile mbuli azi, kuwagubulila wana wadodo. Ena Mhaza, ahyo ndo vouganile.”
Hamba kalonga, “Mhaza wa heni kanipa vinhu vyeng'ha. Kuduhu yamzelele Mwana ila Mhaza, na kuduhu yamzelele Mhaza ila Mwana, na yoneche yula Mwana yogana kumgubulila heye.”
Hamba kawahinduchila walanguswa wa heye na kulonga nawo chinyele, “Wabweda wanhu wala walinguvyona vinhu vyomlinguvyona hemwe!
Ndangukulonjelani ndikomya, waloli wenji na wandewa nawagana kugona aga gomlingugona hemwe, ila hawagawene, na kuhulika gala gomhuliche hemwe, hawagahuliche.”
Munhu yumwe yagazelele ng'hatu malajizo ga Musa koya kwa Yesu kumjeza, kamuuza, “Mlangusa, hambi ndite ndaze ndiuhole ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma?”
Yesu kamwidichila, “Malajizo gangulonga ndaze? Hegwe kugazela ndaze?”

Munhu yula kamwidichila, “ ‘Mgane Mkulu Nguluwi kwa nhumbula ya hegwe yeng'ha na kwa muhe wa hegwe weng'ha na kwa mong'ho wa hegwe weng'ha na kwa luhala lwako lweng'ha’ Na ‘Umgane youlingikalasa habehi kota, kota vyoulingigana gwegwe baho.’”
Yesu kamwidichila, “Kwidika goya, udite ahyo nagwe kozanguwa mkomu.”
Ila munhu yula yogana kiwona kanoga, aho nakamuuza Yesu, “Yali behi na heni kakohi?”
Yesu kamwidichila, “Kwali na munhu yumwe yalawile kulawa Yelusalemu kuza Yeliko. Loyali mnzila, kebatigwa na wahizi wamsukula vyeng'ha vyoyali navyo na kumtowa. Wamleka yawasile bahala kota yabagame.
Baho mtambika yumwe kakola kuli nzila ila loyamuwene munhu yula yatowigwe, kakola hafungo.
Vivila na Mulawi yumwe voyafichile hala na kumona munhu yatowigwe, na heye kakola hafungo.
Ila Msamalia yumwe loyaliyojenda, nakafika hala hoyali yula munhu yatowigwe, na heye loyamuwene, kamonela isungu.
Kamhejelela habehi, kambumba vilonda vya heye, na kuvibakaliza mafuta na Divai. Hamba kamkwiniza mchanya mwa idogowi lyake, kamigala mbaka kuli ng'handa ya wajenzi na kumwimilila.

Mitondo Msamaliya yula kalavya sendi denali mbili zihejile msahala wa mazuwa meli kamlechela mlolela ng'handa ya wajenzi kamlonjela, ‘Muguze ayu munhu, choneche chonzezeche kwa chuguzo, ndokuhilusila hondihiluka.’”
Hamba Yesu kamuuza munhu yula, “Hambi kuli wala wanhu wadatu, yalikohi yalajile kota munhu wa habehi na heye, yula munhu yatowigwe na wabokaji?”
Na Yula munhu yavizelele ng'hatu Malajizo ga Musa, kedichila, “Yula yamonele isungu.” Yesu kamlonjela, “Leka nagwe ulute kadite hiho.”
Yesu na walanguswa wa heye lowali woluta mnzila, wenjila mli chijiji chimwe. Mdala yumwe yali nguchemigwa Malita nakambochela hakaye hake.
Mdala yula yali kikala na mkulugwe yali nguchemigwa Maliya, ayu nakekalisa habehi na Mkulu. Na heye na kekala yohulichiza ulanguso wa Yesu.
Ila Malita yali yodita mbuli ziyage nyinji, kamlutila Yesu na kumuuza, “Mkulu hambi hulingona mng'holozangu voyandechile mbuli zeng'ha ndidita ndiliyeng'ha?, Mlonjele yoye yanhanze!”
Mkulu kamwidichila, “Malita, Malita! Kwanguhangawa na kugaya na vinhu vinji,
Ila Changuganigwa chinhu chimwe hano. Maliya kahagula chinhu chinojile, chili kuduhu munhu yomsukula.”
Zuwa limwe Yesu yali honhu hamwe yolanda. Loyasindile kulanda, mlanguswa wa heye yumwe nakamlonjela, “Mkulu, twangukulanda tulanguse kulanda kota Yohani Mbatiza voyawalanguse walanguswa wa heye.”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Lomlanda, mlonje hino,
‘Mhaza,
itagwa lya hegwe litogoligwe,
undewa wa hegwe uye.
Utugalile chila zuwa chilyo cha hetwe chotulingugana.
Utusile gehile getu,
kota hetwe votulinguwosela hewo weng'ha watuzudize.
Uleche kutwinjiza muli kujezigwa.’”
Hamba Yesu nakawalonjela walanguswa wa heye, “Tulonje yumwe wa hemwe kanguluta kaye kwa goloko wa heye nechilo na kumlonjela, ‘Goloko, ndangukulanda unyipe chilyo,
lekachoni goloko wa heni kakolela haluga hangu yolawa koyalutile, na heni ndahela ne chilyo cha kumha’
Na tulonje yula goloko yali mng'handa kangwidichila, ‘Uleche kunganza! Chihindilo mina chihindigwa, na heni na wanangu tuwasa. Hambe nhyinuche ndikupe chinhu choneche chila.’
Ndanguwalonjelani, leka wone hoyile kukupa lekachoni ni goloko wa heye, ila kwavila hulingona soni kulutilila kulanda, kokwinuka na kukupa chila choulanda.
“Ahyo ndanguwalonjelani, Mlande, namwe mopegwa, na mpale, namwe mochona, mhodize, namwe mochumulilwa.
Mina yoneche yolanda kopegwa, na yalingupala kachonaga na yohodiza lwizi, kochumulilwa.
Hino mhaza yalikohi wone mwana wa heye yamlande somba, heye komupa izoka? Wone yamlande libumunda, heye kompa iganga.
Au yalikohi wone mwana wa heye yamlande ifinga kompa nhyinje?
Wone hemwe hanga muwele wehile, mvizela kuwapa wana wa hemwe vinhu vinojile, ndangukomya Mhaza wa hemwe wa kilanga kodita vikulu ng'hatu, kowapa Muhe Yelile wala walingumlanda?”
Zuwa limwe Yesu yali yolavya chijeni chihile chilingumudita munhu yumwe yaleche kulonga. Acho chijeni lochilawile, yula munhu kaza ngulonga. Wanhu wenji wabubuwala ng'hatu.
Ila wanhu wamwenga bahala walonga, “Kangulavya vijeni kwa ludali lwa Belizebuli, mkulu wa vijeni.”
Wanhu wamwe nawagana kumjeza Yesu, ahyo yawalajile ulajilo kulawa kilanga.
Ila Yesu nakavizela chowochijesa mnhumbula za hewo, kawalonjela, “Undewa weng'ha wula ugawanuche vilundo vilingitwanza, havilutilila ng'hatu. Kahi lukolo lyochitowa lyosumigwa.
Wone Limazoga lizengugawanuka lilyo, hino undewa wa heye wokwima ndaze? Ndangulonga hino kwavila hemwe mwangulonga heni ndangulavya vijeni kwa ludali lwa Belizebuli.
Wone heni ndilingulavya vijeni kwa ludali lwa Belizebuli, lelo wala wana wa hemwe walavyaga vijeni kwa ludali lwani, lwa Limazoga? Hebu! Ahyo, wana wa hemwe wokunda kuwatagusa hemwe kota mwiha.
Ila wone heni ndanguwinga vijeni kwa ludali lwa Nguluwi, mvizele kota Undewa wa Nguluwi mina ukuyilani hemwe.
“Munhu yali na ludali yokwamila ng'handa ya heye kwa migoha, vinhu vya heye vya goya.
Ila wone munhu yali na ludali lung'hangala ng'hatu yoye kumtowa, komsukula migoha jeng'ha yawele kidaila, na kuhola vinhu vya heye vyeng'ha na kuvitaganga.
Yoneche yohambe yebande na heni, kangundema, na yoneche hambe yekungajize hamwe na heni, kangusambalula.
“Chijeni chihile lochiwinjigwa kwa munhu, chibemhelaga honhu hagunuche, chipala honhu ha kwesela. Wone hachipatile, changulonga, ‘Ndohiluka kaye kwa heni.’
Lochihiluka na kuchifika chigoda cha heye chihovugwe na kunoligwa,
choluta kuvihola vijeni vinji saba vihile kusinda heye. Na hevyo vyeng'ha vyoluta na kikala aho. Ahyo ayo munhu kowa yogazigwa ng'hatu kusinda aho hamwande.”
Yesu loyali yolonga ago, mdala yumwe hala hali wanhu wamemile kalonga kwa lizi likulu, “Kabweda mdala yakulelile na kukonyeza!”
Yesu nakedichila, “Wabweda wala weng'ha walinguhulika ulonzi wa Nguluwi na kudita vila vyouwaganile kukola.”
Wanhu wenji lowali wommemelela Yesu, heye kalutilila kuwalonjela, “Lulelo alu ndo lulelo lwihile lulingugana ulajilo! Kuduhu munhu yowapa ulajilo ila ulajilo wa Yona.
Kota vila Yona vyoyali ulajilo kwa wanhu wa Ninawi, ndo hihyo Mwana wa Munhu kowa ulajilo kwa wanhu wa lulelo alu.

Malikiya wa kusini kulawila mhela wanhu awo howotagusigwa kwa wihe, na heye kowatagusa kwa wihe. Mina heye nakajenda kulawa isi ya kutali, nakuya kuhulichiza ulonzi wa luhala wa Solomoni, na hanga hano kuwele na chikulu kusinda Solomoni.

Wanhu wa Ninawi wolawila mhela wa kutagusigwa kwa wihe, na hewo wochitagusa lulelo alu kota luna wihe. Mina Waninawi nawamgalamchila Nguluwi kwa mbuli ya kudamla kwa Yona, na hano hana chikulu kusinda Yona!
“Haduhu munhu yawelenguwesa chenje na kuvisa awu kugubika na chidoto. Ila chenje chiwikagwa honhu ha kuwichila chenje leka wanhu wokwinjila wazengulola lumuli.
Iziho lyako ndo chenje cha lukuli lwa hegwe. Wone iziho lyako liwe lilola, lukuli lwako lweng'ha lowa na lumuli. Ila liziho lyako wone liwe hambe lilole, na lukuli lwako lweng'ha lowa hatitile.
Lelo wilolele, lumuli louwele nalo mgati luleche kutita.
Ahyo wone lukuli lwako lweng'ha luna lumuli, na haduhu honhu hatitile, baho lumuli lowa chila honhu, kota vila chenje lochikumwemwesela lumuli lwake.”
Yesu loyasindile kulonga, Mfalisayo yumwe nakamlanda yalute haluga hake yalye ndiya hamwe na heye. Ahyo Yesu kaluta, kekalisa kulya ndiya.
Mfalisayo ayo kabubuwala loyawene Yesu yolya ndiya nekuhovuga moko.
Mkulu kamlonjela, “Hemwe Mafalisayo mwanguhovuga chizombe na luhelo kwa kunze, ila mgati mwa hemwe mmema ubuhu na ubokaji na wihe.
Mwawapoka hemwe! Hino heye yalumbile kunze si heye yula yalumbile mgati?
Ila muwape wazunwa vinhu mlinavyo, na Nguluwi kosangalala ng'hatu na chila chinhu chomdita chowa chelile.

“Mochona hemwe Mafalisayo! Lekachoni mwangulavya zaka za vinhu kota vila chizanga na tangawizi, na mboga ziyage zinji za mahamba, ila mwanguleka mbuli zilingutagusa goya na mwanguleka kumgana Nguluwi. Ahi ndo vyomlinguganigwa kudita ne kusemwa zila zinji.
“Mochona hemwe Mafalisayo! Lekachoni mwangugana kikalisa mli vigoda vya kumwando kuli ng'handa za kusalila, na kulamsigwa kwa ukulu kuli masoko.
Mochona hemwe kwa vila mfanda kota vilaga vilihela vilajilo, wanhu wangujenda mchanya hake nekuvizela.”
Yumwe wa wala wavizelele ng'hatu Malajizo ga Musa nakamwidichila Yesu, “Mlangusa, vyoulonga ayo kwangutuliga hetwe!”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Na hemwe walangusa wa Malajizo mochona! Mwanguwadwika wanhu mhomolo zohambe ziholeche, kuno hemwe mwemwe hambe muwatanze ne kwa chidole hela.
Mochona hemwe! Mwanguzenga vilaga vya waloli wa Nguluwi, na waloli wawo wa Nguluwi nawakopoligwe na wasekulu wa hemwe.
Na hemwe sambi mwangulavya ulolezi kwa chila chowaditile wasekulu wa hemwe, mina hewo nawawakopola waloli, namwe mwanguzenjela vilaga.
Ahyo kwa mbuli ino, luhala lwa Nguluwi lwangulonga ahi, ‘Ndowegalila waloli na watumigwa, wowakopola wamwe na kuwagaza wamwe.’
Ahyo wanhu wa lulelo alu lotagusigwa kwa kuwakopola waloli weng'ha kulawa isi loilumbigwe,
kulawa kukopoligwa kwa Abeli mbaka kukopoligwa kwa Zakalia, yula nawamkopole hagati ha alitale na honhu helile. Ena, ndanguwalonjelani, lulelo alu logazigwa kwa kuwakopola awo weng'ha.
“Mochona hemwe walangusa wa malajizo! Mwanguvisa chichumulilo cha lwizi lwa ng'handa ya luhala. Hemwe mwemwe hamkwinjila, na mwanguwalemeza wanji kwingila.”
Yesu loyaliyolawa hala, wala Mafalisayo na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa nawaluka kumpinga, na wakamchokoza kwa kumuuza mbuli nyinji,
wogana wamgwilize luzi loyolonga kota kawifya.
Muhela ula, wanhu wenji lukami nawamema mbaka nawazangibiga. Yesu nakaluka kuwalonjela walanguswa wa heye tandi, “Milolele na ulanguso wihile wa Mafalisayo ulinguwahada.
Chinhu choneche chigubikwe chogubuligwa, na chila chivisigwe chozeleka.
Ahyo chila chomlonga kutitu, wanhu wochihulika hali lumuli, na chila chomlonga kwa kupwepwa mliyeng'ha mchihengo, chodamlwa mchanya mli ng'handa.
“Ndangukulonjelani hemwe tuwele ngigana, mleche kuwadumba wawele ngukopola lukuli, hamba howodaha kudita chinhu chinji chihile.
Ndokulajilani yula yalinguganigwa kudumbigwa. Mdumbe Nguluwi, wone yakopole munhu, kana ludali lwa kumtaga muli chiluli cha Jehanamu. Ndangulonga, mdumbeni ayo.
“Ndaze, semembe wahano haviguzwa kwa sendi mbili? Ila kuduhu na chideje nechimwe chisemigwa na Nguluwi.
Lelo hata mvili za mitwi jenu ziwazigwa zeng'ha. Mleche kudumba, lekachoni hemwe mganigwa kusinda videje!
“Ndangukulonjelani ndikomya, munhu yoneche yalikung'hunda hali wanhu, Mwana wa Munhu na heye komkunda hali wahilisi wa kilanga wa Nguluwi.
Ila munhu yoneche yalingundema hali wanhu, Mwana wa Munhu na heye komlema hali wahilisi wa kilanga wa Nguluwi.
“Munhu yoneche yawelengulonga luzi lwa kumbeza Mwana wa Munhu kolecheligwa, ila munhu yoneche yalingumkovula Muhe Yelile holecheligwa hebu.
“Lowowagala hemwe kuli ng'handa za kusalila na kumwando kwa wakulu na vilongozi, mleche kuwa na lunhwinhwi ndaze vyomchigombela na vyomkwidichila.
Mina Muhe Yelile yokulangusani mihela jijo chila chomganigwa kulonga.”
Munhu yumwe muli wanhu wala wamemile nakamlonjela, “Mlangusa, mlonjele mng'holozangu tiigawile vinhu vyoyalechile mhaza wa hetwe.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Hegwe, yalikohi yambichile heni ndiwe ndiwamulila au mgawaniza wa vinhu vya hemwe?”
Hamba Yesu nakawalonjela weng'ha, “Milolele na ubuhu, mina ukomu wa munhu hauwele kuli vinhu loyawele navyo!”
Kahi Yesu nakawalonjela nhelo, “Kwali na munhu yali na lufufu na yali na mgunda ulelile lukami.
Ayo munhu kazangijesa mnhumbula ya heye, 'Lelo ndodita ndaze? Ndahela honhu ha kuhega kuwika chilyo cha heni.
Hamba kelonjela, ‘Ndodita ahi, ndobomola ng'hano za heni na kuzenga zinji zili ng'hangala ng'hatu. Mumo hondiwika chilyo na vinhu vya heni vyeng'ha.
Hamba ndoilonjela nhumbula ya heni, lelo ndiwichila vinhu vya kulya vinojile mihela na mihela. Ahyo wesele, widile, wing'hwele na usangalale!’
Ila Nguluwi nakamlojela, ‘Mpoka hegwe! Lehano nechilo muhe wa hegwe yoholigwa! Vinhu vyeng'ha vyowilundile vyowa vyaani?’”
Kahi Yesu nakasinda kwa kulonga, “Ahyo ndo vyoiwa kwa munhu yawelengilundila lufufu kwa heye, na hambe yewichile lufufu kwa Nguluwi”.
Hamba Yesu nakawalonjela walanguswa wa heye, “Na ahyo ndangukulonjelani, mleche kijesa kwa mbuli ya chilyo yomgana leka mikale, na nguwo zomgana mvalize ng'huli za hemwe.
Kwa vila ukomu unoga kusinda chilyo, na lukuli lunoga kusinda nguwo.
Mjilole ajo mibondwa, havilingunyala nyhadikwa, havilingubeta nyhadikwa kahi jahela ng'hano, leka ahyo Nguluwi Mhaza wa hemwe wa kilanga kanguwahombela. Hemwe mnoga ng'hatu kusinda videje.
Ndaze, hagati ha hemwe kuna munhu kwa mbuli ya lunhwinhwi yoweza kuhejeza ne saa imwe ya kikala muisi?
Lelo wone mlemwa kukola mbuli ndodo kota ayo, iwandaze mwangutochela azo mbuli zinji?
Mlole uluwa vyoulingutitima. Hagalingukola chinhu cha kiditila mibadu. Ndangukulonjelani, na heye Solomoni na lufufu lwake lweng'ha, nahavalile goya kota uluwa umwenga kuli uluwa umwenga.
Nguluwi yalingugana mahamba gawe na mibadu, na misolo lehano jangutitima na mitondo janguvunda na kujisoma mchiluli! Ndaze, howaditilani hemwe mzidi? Hemwe wanhu muwele na makundo mado!
“Ahyo mleche kugayila choni cho mulya na choni cho mung'hwa, na mleche kudumba.
Mina ago geng'ha wanhu hawamzelele Nguluwi wangugagayila. Mhaza wa hemwe wa kilanga, kavizela kota mwangugana vinhu avi.
Ahyo mijeseni tandi Undewa wa Nguluwi, na vinhu avi mopegwa.
“Mleche kudumba, hemwe walanguswa wa heni, lekachoni Mhaza wa hemwe wa kilanga kangugana kuwapa hemwe undewa.
Mguze vinhu vyomlinavyo, muwagalile sendi wazunwa. Miditile mihako johambe jilale, na kiwichila ng'hano kilanga, ako hambe imale. Ako wahizi hambe wahize, na mifukuzi hambe jiwifye.
Kwa vila hala ng'hano ya hegwe hoyili, ndo na nhumbula ya hegwe hoiwa.
“Miwiche goya kwa chila chinhu chilawila, na vyenje vya hemwe viwe vikwaka.
Muwe kota wanhu wali ngubeta mkulu wa hewo yahiluche kulawa kuli mvina ya kuhesa. Loyohiluka na kudumiza lwizi, bahala walute wamchumulile.
Wosangalala ng'hatu wala wahilisi wa kilanga mkulu wa hewo loyohiluka kowafika wobeteza! Ndangukulonjelani ndikomya, ahyo mkulu kochiwopa isali mchuno, wochikalasa hali ndiya na kowakolela mijito.
Wosangalala ng'hatu wone yoye nechilo hagati au kuzangucha kowafika wali meho.
Mvizele hino, wone yawele na ng'handa nayavizele mhela hoyokuya mhizi, nahalileka ng'handa ya heye ibenigwe na mhizi.
Na hemwe hihyo miwiche goya, mina Mwana wa Munhu kokuya saa yohamuizelele.”
Petili nakamlonjela, “Mkulu, hino nhelo awo wangutulonjela hetwe yeng'ha au wanhu weng'ha?”
Mkulu nakedichila, “Hino yalikohi chitumagwa wa kitumbila na yawele na luhala, yula mkulu wa heye yozangumuwika mchanya mwa vitumagwa wanji, na yawape wanhu chilyo kwa mhela wuwula?
Kobweda yula chitumagwa wone mkulu wa heye loyohiluka komfika yodita ahyo.
Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, komuwika chitumagwa ayo yalolelaje lufufu lwake lweng'ha.
Ila ayo chitumagwa wone yazengulonga mnhumbula ya heye, 'Mkulu wa heni hambe yahiluche hima. Hamba kaluka kuwatowa vitumagwa wayage, walume na wadala, na kwaluka kulya na kung'hwa mbaka kugala.
Mkulu wa heye kohiluka zuwa lyohejesile na kuli saa yohaizelele mpogozi. Na heye komgaza na kumuwika hamwe na wala walihela makundo.
“Yula chitumagwa yavizelele choyogana mkulu wa heye, ila nahewichile goya kudita choyaganigwe kudita na mkulu wa heye, chitumagwa ayo kotowigwa lukami.

Ila yula yalingudita galingulapa kutowigwa ne kuvizela, kotowigwa hado. Munhu yapeligwe vinhu vinji, kodaigwa vinhu vinji, na munhu yoneche yapeligwe vinhu vinji ng'hatu, kodaigwa vinhu vinji ng'hatu.
“Mbuya kubwinha chiluli isi yeng'ha, na ndangugana ndiwe mbesile katali!
Ndanawo ubatizo wa kugazigwa ndilinguganigwa kuupapa, na heni ndangugaya lukami mbaka imale!
Hino mwangijesa mbuya kigala kikala goya muisi? Nehado! Siwuyile kigala kikala goya ila kibagula.
Na tangia sambi, wanhu wa ivyazi lya wanhu wahano wochibagula, wadatu kwa weli na weli kwa wadatu.

Mhaza kochibagula na wana wa heye wasongolo, na wana wasongolo wochibagula na mhaza wa hewo. Mamo kochibagula na wahinza wa heye na mhinza kochibagula na mamo wa heye. Mkweye mdala kochibagula na mkweye, na mkwe kochibagula na mkweye mdala wa heye.”
Yesu nakawalonjela kahi wala wanhu wamemile, “Lomuyona ng'hungugu ilawila kolizinjilaga izuwa, bahala mwangulonga, ‘Nhonya yotowa,’ Na mwangukomya yangutowa.
Na lomkona mbeho ya ilawila kusini, mwangulonga, ‘Kowa na ivuche,’ Na kwanguwa hiho.
Hemwe wahadi! Mvizela kumeho kwa isi na ulanga, iwandaze hambe mvizele mina ya mihela aji?
“Lekachoni mwangulemwela kwamula mbuli zinojile za kudita?

Mina wone munhu yakulonjeleze yakugale kuli ng'handa ya kutagusila, yali goya hegwe mihanyise na heye mung'hali mluta mnzila. Leka yaleche kukugala kuli mtagusa, na heye mtagusa kokugala kwa wamizi, na hewo wokwinjiza mchinweng'ho.
Hulawa ako kuchinweng'ho, ndangukulonjela, mbaka housinda kulavya sendi ya mwiso ya zila zoulingudaigwa.”
Mhela wuwo, wanhu wamwe nawamlonjela Yesu mbuli za wanhu wa Galilaya wala Pilato nayawakopole mihela lowali womlavila Nguluwi nhambiko.
Heye Yesu nakawalonjela, “Hino hemwe mwangijesa Wagalilaya awo wali wehile ng'hatu kusinda Wagalilaya wanji kwa vila wechona ahyi?
Nehado! Ndanguwalonjelani, wone na hemwe hamumgalamchile Nguluwi, mobagama kota wawo.
Au mwangijesa wala wanhu kumi na wanane wala nawagwililwe na muhonyo kula Siloamu wabagama, wali wehile kusinda wanhu weng'ha wawele Yelusalemu?
Nehado! Ndanguwalonjelani, wone na hemwe hamumgalamchile Nguluwi, mobagama kota wawo.”
Hamba Yesu nakawalonjela nhelo ayi, “Munhu yumwe yali na igodi wa mafuza ya tini kumgunda wa heye wa zabibu. Ayo munhu kaluta kubawa mafuza, ila kalifika halilelile ifuza ne limwe.
Kamlonjela yawelengulolela mgunda, ‘Mlolele! Kwa mihela midatu ndali ndikuya ndigana mbawe mafuza kuli igodi ali, na heni sambulile ne chinhu. Uteme! Lekachoni uzenguifya misanga hela?’
Ila ayo yawelengulolela mgunda nakedichila, ‘Mkulu, uleche mhela awu yeng'ha, na heni ndiuhalile na kuuwichila midohe.
Wone ulele, goya! Ila wone haulelile, koutema.’”
Kuli zuwa lya kwesela, Yesu yali yolangusa mli ng'handa ya kusalila.
Na aho hali na mdala yumwe yali na chijeni chihile chimditile yawe mtamwa miyaka kumi na minane. Na heye yali na chiduhi, na yali yolemwela kwima yagoloche.
Yesu loyamuwene, kamchema, kamlonjela, “Mamo, utamwa wouwelenawo wusigwa!”
Hamba Yesu kamuwichila moko yula mamo, na bahala yula mamo kagoloka, kaluka kumtogola Nguluwi.

Ila chilongozi wa ng'handa ya kusalila nakazudila lekachoni Yesu kamusa munhu utamwa zuwa lya kwesela. Ahyo kawalonjela wala wanhu wamemile hala, “Mwanago mazuwa sita ga kukola mijito. Kuli mazuwa ago, muye musilwe matamwa genu, ila mleche kuya kuli zuwa lya kwesela.”
Ahyo Mkulu nakamwidichila, “Hemwe wahadi! Hino kuna munhu yoneche kuli hemwe hali dohola isenga au idogowi lya heye kulawa mli ng'handa yaligale kung'hwa mazi kuli zuwa lya kwesela?
Lelo hano kabaho mhinza wa Ibulahimu, na heye nakawohigwa na Limazoga miyaka kumi na nane. Lelo hainojile kumdoholela kuli zuwa lya kwesela?”
Yesu loyasindile kulonga ago, wala weng'ha wamwihile wazangona soni, ila wanhu nawasangalala kwa vinduzanduza vyoyaditile Yesu.
Yesu nakauza, “Hambi Undewa wa Nguluwi wa ndaze? Hambi ndiuhwane na choni?

Lufanda kota nyhadikwa ndodo kusinda zeng'ha ilinguchemigwa haladali, yaiholile munhu na kuinyala mumgunda wa heye. Nyhadikwa ayo yota, hamba liwa igodi ikulu mbaka videje vya kuulanga vizenga vimvulila mli nhagala zake.”
Kahi Yesu nakauza, “Hambi Undewa wa Nguluwi ndiuhwanize na choni?
Ufanda kota nungo yaiholile mamo yumwe na kahanza na utimbo vijemo vidatu, mbaka utimbo weng'ha ufuluma.”
Yesu nakalutilila na majendo kuluta Yelusalemu. Loyali mzila, nakakolela kuli miji na vijiji aku yowalangusa wanhu.
Munhu yumwe kamuuza, “Mkulu, hambi wanhu woloholigwa wado?”
Yesu nakawedichila,
“Mikangaze kukolela kuli lwizi luzisili, mina ndangukulonjelani, wanhu wenji wojeza kwinjila, ila howodaha.
Mihela jokuya yali na ng'handa kokwima na kuhinda lwizi, namwe mokwima kunze na kudumiza lwizi mlonga, 'Mkulu, tuchumulile lwizi. Ila heye kowalonjela, ‘Siwazelele hemwe na komlawile kohi’
Namwe molonga, ‘Tudile na kung'hwa hamwe na hegwe, na hegwe nakulangusaga muli muji wa hetwe.’
Ila heye kolonga kahi, ‘Sivizelele hemwe mlawa kohi. Muche kumwando kwa heni, hemwe mweng'ha mlingudita gehile!’
Aho ndo homuwa mlila na kujejeda mizino, aho momona Ibulahimu na Isaka na Yakubu, na waloli weng'ha wawele hali Undewa wa Nguluwi, na hemwe mtozigwa kunze!
Wanhu wokuya kulawa kolilawilaga isanya na kula kolizinjilaga isanya, kulawa kasikazini na kusini, wochikala na kulya hali Undewa wa Nguluwi.
Ena, wala wawele wa mwiso wowa wa mwaluko, na wala wawele wa mwaluko wowa wa mwiso.”
Mihela jijo Mafalisayo wamwe nawamlutila Yesu, wamlonjela, “Uche hano ulute honhu hanji, lekachoni Helodi kangugana yakukopole.”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Mlute mkalilonjele alyo libwa lya kisolo ahi, ‘Lehano na mitondo ndanguwinga vijeni na kuwosela wanhu matamwa, haucha ndosinda mijito ja heni.’
Ahyo ingana lehano na mitondo na haucha, ndokwinulila majendo, lekachoni haiwa goya mloli wa Nguluwi yakopoligwe hanze ha Yelusalemu.

“Yelusalemu! Gwa Yelusalemu! Kwanguwakopola waloli na kuwatowa kwa maganga wala watumigwe kwa hegwe. Lwa kalinga njeza kuwakungajiza wana wa hegwe kwa heni kota vila ng'huku vyoilingukungajiza vinziya vya heye hasi hali mbawa za heye, ila hegwe nahuviganile!
Mlole! Mlechelwa ng'handa ya hemwe! Na heni ndangukulonjelani ndikomya, hammbona kahi mbaka homlonga, ‘Yatambichizwe ayo yalinguya kwa itagwa lya Mkulu.’”
Zuwa limwe lya Kwesela, Yesu nakaluta kulya ndiya ha kaye ha mkulu yumwe wa Mafalisayo. Wanhu wali aho wali womlola kwa kumtegela.
Munhu yumwe yoyali na safula nakamlutila Yesu.
Yesu nakawauza walangusa wa Malajizo na Mafalisayo, “Hino Malajizo ga hetwe gangutukundiza hetwe kumusila munhu utamwa zuwa lya kwesela au hebu?”
Ila hewo wekala wenyamalile. Yesu kamibata ayo mtamwa, kamusila utamwa, nakamlonjela yalute.
Hamba kawalonjela, “Yali kohi hemwe mwanage au isenga lya heye wone linjile hali izimbo zuwa lya kwesela halikulilavya bahala?”
Ila hewo walemwela kwidichila chinhu.
Yesu loyawawene wala walalikwe vowali wohagula kikala kuli vigoda vya kumwando, nakawalonjela weng'ha kwa nhelo ayi;
“Wone munhu yakulaliche kuli mvina ya kuhola, uleche kikalisa kuli vigoda vya kumwando. Leka munhu yunji mkulu kusinda hegwe koweza kuya,
na munhu yawalaliche weng'ha kokuwiyila na kukulonjela, ‘Mlechele ayu honhu aha.’ Baho kodeula na kuluta kikala kuli vigoda vya kumbele.

Ila wone hegwe uchemigwe honhu, kekale kumbele, leka munhu yula yakulaliche loyokuyila, yakulonjele, 'Goloko, winuche uye wikale kuno kuli na vigoda vya kumwando, baho kotogoligwa hali wanhu weng'ha wekalise hamwe na hegwe.
Kwa vila munhu yoneche yochikwiniza, koduliswa, na munhu yoneche yawele liholile kokwinizwa.”

Hamba Yesu nakamlonjela yula yamlaliche, “Wone kowalalika wanhu kulya chilyo cha nemisi au cha nechilo, uleche kuwalalika womiganaga au wang'holozo au wanhu wa habehi na haluga hako wali na lufufu. Kwa vila wone udite ahyo, hewo nawo wokulalika hakaye hawo, na ahyo wokuhilulila chila chouwaditile.
Ila wone loudita mvina, walaliche wali wazunwa na waziliche lukuli na wali chete na wali hambe walole
na hegwe kowa utambichizwe na Nguluwi. Mina wawo wali hela chinhu cha kukuhilusila. Nguluwi kokuhilusila kuli zuwa wanhu wanojile howozilipuligwa.”
Yumwe wa wala wanhu wekalise hamwe na Yesu loyahuliche ago, nakamlonjela, “Kabweda munhu yozangulya ndiya mu Undewa wa Nguluwi.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Munhu yumwe nakadita mvina ng'hulu kawalalika wanhu wenji,
Mhela wa kulya loufichile, kamlonjela chitumagwa wa heye yakawalonjele walalikwe, ‘Muye, chila chinhu cha goya’
Ila weng'ha nawalema, chila munhu yali na mbuli ya kukola. Munhu wa mwaluko nakamlonjela yula chitumagwa, ‘Ngula mgunda, ahyo ndangugana ndikaulole. Ndangulanda undeche.’
Munhu yunji nakalonga, ‘Ngula misenga kumi ja kulimila kumgunda, lelo ndamnzila ndute ndikajijeze. Ndangulanda undeche.’
Yunji nakalonga, ‘Ndimhola mdala, ahyo ndolemwela kuya.’

“Ayo chitumagwa kahiluka, nakamlonjela mkulu wa heye ayo mbuli. Na heye loyahuliche ago, kazudila, nakamlonjela yula chitumagwa, ‘Lute himahima nzila ng'hulu na nzila ndodo za miji, ukawalonjele wanhu wali wazunwa, na waziliche lukuli, na wohambe walole, na wali chete woye.’
Hamba yula chitumagwa nakalonga, ‘Mkulu, ago goulajize mina gakoligwa, ila na sambi honhu hanji hang'hali hanamema.’
Yula mkulu nakamlonjela chitumagwa wa heye, ‘Lute kuli nzila ng'hulu na mbakane uwakole wanhu lupichi woye wenjile leka ng'handa ya heni imeme.
Mina ndangukulonjelani, haduhu ne yumwe kuli wala walalichigwe yolya chilyo kuli mnvina ya heni!’”
Aho wanhu wenji lowali womuwinza Yesu, Yesu nakawagalamchila, kawalonjela,
“Munhu yoneche howa mlanguswa wa heni, wone hanganile heni ng'hatu kusinda vyoyalinguwagana mhaza wa heye na mamo wa heye na mdala wa heye na wanage na wang'holoze na walumbuze.
Munhu yoneche wone hapapile msalaba wa heye na kumbinza, kolemwela kuwa mlanguswa wa heni.
“Mina yalikohi munhu yumwe homuli, wone yagane kuzenga ilingo, holongola kikalisa yalole kana vinhu vikwila kugomanjiza mijito ya heye?
Kwa vila wone kokwaluka kubawa msisi, na wone yalemwele kugomanjiza, wanhu womseka.
Hamba wolonga, ‘Munhu ayu nakaluka kuzenga, ila kalemwela kugomanjiza mijito ya heye!’
“Au mndewa wachi wone yagane kuza kitowa na mndewa yunji, hochikalisa hasi tandi yejese kokwimilila kwa wamizi wa heye elufu kumi kitowa na mndewa yali na wamizi elufu makumi meli?
Wone yone hokwimilila, kowalonjela vitumagwa wa heye wakamdedeze yula mndewa yang'hali kutali waleche kitowa wekale goya.
Na hemwe namwe hihyo, wone munhu halechile chila chinhu choyali nacho hodaha kuwa mlanguswa wa heni.
“Mwino unona, ila wone uwe haunonile, wonojezwa na choni mbaka uwe unonile kahi?
Hambe ikole ne chinhu kuwika kuli mgunda wala kuhanza na midohe, wanhu woitaga kunze. Yali na makutu ga kuhulichizila, nayahuliche!”
Zuwa limwe wakongoza kodi na wanhu wenji wawelengudita gehile nawaluta kumuhulichiza Yesu.
Mafalisayo na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa wazakung'ung'uta, “Mlole munhu ayu! Kanguwabochela wadita gehile, kahi kangulya na hewo!”
Yesu nakawalonjela nhelo ayi.
“Wone, munhu yawele na ming'holo miya imwe, wone yone limwe lyajilile, kodita choni? Kojileka jila makumi tisa na tisa mviwala, na kanguluta kupala lila lyajilile mbaka yalyone.
Na wone yalyone, kosangalala na kolipika mmayega,
na kumuhilika haluga. Hamba kanguwachema wali ngigana na wanhu wa habehi na heye na kuwalonjela, ‘Tusangalale hamwe, kwa vila ndilyona lila ling'holo lyangu nalyajilile.’
Kahi ndangukulonjelani, kowa na kusangalala ng'hatu kilanga kwa mdita gehile yumwe kumgalamchila Nguluwi, kusinda wanhu makumi tisa na tisa watanganiche wohambe wagane woselwe gehile.
“Au mwangona ndaze? Mdala yumwe yali na migwala kumi, wone yajilize imwe, kangudita choni? Kobwinha chenje, kofajila ng'handa na kupala mholemhole mbaka yayone.
Wone yayone, kanguwachema weganaga na wanhu wa habehi na heye, yolonga, ‘Msangalale hamwe na heni, kwa vila ndilyona ligwala lya heni nalyajilile’
Hihyo ndangukulonjelani, wahilisi wa kilanga wa Nguluwi wosangalala kwa yali na gehile yumwe yalingumgalamchila Nguluwi.”
Yesu nakalutilila kuwalonjela, “Kwali na munhu yumwe yali na wana weli wasongolo.
Yula mdodo nakamlonjela mhaza wa heye, ‘Mhaza, nyipe uhalizi wa vinhu vya heni sambi.’ Ahyo mhaza yula kawagawila lufufu lwa heye lweng'ha wala wana weli.
Logakolile mazuwa mado, yula mdodo munhu kaguza vinhu vyeng'ha vyoyahalizwe na mhaza wa heye, hamba koka na kuluta isi ya kutali. Ako nakawifyanga sendi za heye chakachaka.
Loyasindile kidila chila chinhu, nailawila nzala ng'hulu isi ila, na heye kaluka kugaya.
Ahyo nakaluta kukola mijito kwa munhu yumwe yali mwenyeng'haye wa isi ila, na heye kamuhilika kuli mgunda wa heye yawe yohombela migubi.
Kazangugana kulya chilyo jiwele ngulya migubi, ila haduhu munhu yampele.
Nyhala lozaluche kuhiluka, nakelonjelela, ‘Kula kuluga kwa mhaza wa heni kuna wakola mijito wenji wawele kulya na kulechelela. Iwa ndaze heni hano ndagubagama kwa nzala?
Ndokuka na kuluta kwa mhaza wa heni ndimlonjele, 'Mhaza, ndita gehile kwa hegwe, na ndita gehile kilanga na kwa hegwe Nguluwi.
Hambe nganigwe kuchemwa mwana wa hegwe kahi, ndite kota yumwe wa vitumagwa wa hegwe.’
Ahyo keyinula kaluta kwa mhaza wa heye.
“Ila loyali yang'hali kutali, mhaza wa heye kamona. Kamonela isungu, kambilimila, kamlamsa kwa kumkumbatiza na kumnonela.
Yula mwana nakamlonjela, ‘Mhaza, mbifya kilanga na kwa hegwe Nguluwi na ndita gehile kwa hegwe. Hambe nganigwe kuchemigwa nda mwana wa hegwe.’
Ila mhaza wa heye nakawalonjela vitumagwa, ‘Himahima! Migale nguwo inojile mumvalize. Mvicheni pete mchidole cha heye na makwamba mmagulu ga heye!
Hamba mkome lila lisenga ilogota lihatile, tulye na tudite mnvina ng'hangala!
Kwa vila ayu mwana wa heni yali yabagame ila lelo kazilipuka, nakajilila ila lelo koneka’ Ahyo waluka kudita mvina.
“Mvina voyali ilutilila, yula mkulugwe yali kumgunda. Loyali yohiluka na kuwa behi na haluga, kahulika nzimbo na wanhu wovina.
Kamchema chitumagwa yumwe, kamuuza, ‘Hana choni?’
Yula chitumagwa nakamlonjela, ‘Mng'holozako kahiluka haluga, na mhaza wa hegwe kakoma isenga ilogota lihatile loyamuwene yawele mkomu.’
“Ayo msongolo mkulu kazudila ng'hatu, kalema kwinjila mng'handa. Mhaza wa heye kalawa kunze na kumdedeza yenjile mng'handa.

Ila heye nakedichila, ‘Wijese, mihela jeng'ha heni nandikukolela mijito kota chitumagwa, na silemile kuhulichiza ilajizo lya hegwe ne zuwa limwe. Kumha choni? Humhele ne kamhene kamwe kadodo ndite mvina na wotiganaga!
Ila ayu mwanago yawifile vinhu vya hegwe chakachaka na wang'hondwa loyoile kumchinjila isenga ilogota lihatile!’
Mhaza wa heye nakamwidichila, ‘Gomwana wa heni, mihela jeng'ha wali wikale na heni, na chila chinhu chondali nacho nachali cha hegwe.
Ila itugana tudite mvina kwa vila ayu mng'holozako yali yabagame, lelo kamkomu, yali yajilile lelo koneka.’”
Yesu nakawalangusa wala walanguswa, “Muhu yumwe yali na lufufu, yali na mkola mijito. Wanhu nawamlonjela ayu mkola mijito wa hegwe kangulya chaka vinhu vya yula yamuwichile,
Yula yali na lufufu kamchema kamlonjela, ‘Mbuli zachi za hegwe zondili nguhilika? Undajile choukolele lufufu lwa heni? Mina hegwe huza nguwa chitumagwa kahi.’
Yula chitumagwa kejesa, Ayu mkulu kangumbusa kuli kumwandichila, ndodita ndaze kuluta kumgunda siweza, kuluta kulanda kota wali hela chinhu, ndangona soni.
Ndivizela lya kudita, aho hoyombinga wanhu waze ngunhyema kowekalaga.
“Yolawa kawachema weng'ha walinguganigwa na yula yali yowandichila yumweyumwe, kamlonjela yalongole, ‘Zilinga uli ngudaigwa mkulu wa heni?’
Heye nakedichila mibiga ja kutelechela mafuta miya na imwe ga mzeituni. ‘Yula nayandikaga kamlonjela. Hole ai iwele ngulajila voili ngudaigwa, kalise himahima wandiche hamsini.’
Kahi kamuuza munhu yunji yalingudaigwa, ‘Hegwe kangukudai zilinga?’ Heye nakedichila migunila miya ja uhemba. ‘Hole ayi ilingulajila voulingudaigwa, wandiche samanini.’
“Ila yula mkulu kamtogola ayo yandikaga voyali wakitumbila yali yakolile luhala, mina wanhu wa ayi isi wana luhala na mbuli za hewo zihile kusinda wanhu wa lumuli.”
Heye Yesu kazangulonga, “Heni ndangukulonjelani migane na wanhu kulawa kuli lufufu lwihile lwa isi, lozimala mobocheligwa na hewo, mozangikala mazuwa gose ne kuduma.
Munhu yoneche yalinguganigwa muli mbuli ndodo. Kowa yaganigwe muli mbuli ng'hangala. Ila munhu halingukundigwa kuli mbuli ndodo, howeza kukundigwa kuli mbuli ng'hulu.
Wone hemwe wanhu wohambe wakukundeni kuli lufufu lwihile lwa amu muisi, munhu yachi yokupani lufufu lwa kukomya?
Na wone hambe mkundigwe kuli lufufu haluwele lwa hemwe, munhu yachi yokupani lufufu luzeleche?
“Haduhu chitumagwa yokola mijio kwa wakulu weli, kwa vila ama komzudila yumwe na kumgana yunji, au kochilongozaga na yula yumwe na kumbeza ayo yunji. Homfugamila Nguluwi na lufufu.”
Ila Mafalisayo lowahuliche ago geng'ha, ila hewo wali wogana lukami lufufu, wambeza Yesu.
Aho nakawalojela, “Hemwe mwangilola mnoga hali wanhu, ila Nguluwi kavizela mnhumbula ya hemwe. Mina chila chilingoneka chikulu hali wanhu, Nguluwi kochona acho chiha.
“Mizilo na gala gandichigwe na waloli gali mbaka mihela ja Yohani Mbatiza. Kulawa aho Mbuli Inojile ya Undewa wa Nguluwi wangutagusigwa, na chila munhu kangwinjila kwa ludali.
Ila isi yeng'ha na kilanga vyokusigwa chimdawalo hela kusinda helufi imwe ya malajizo gandichigwe kusigwa.
“Yoneche yamleche mchewake na kuhola yunji, mng'hondwa, na yoneche yali kumhola mdala yalechigwe mng'hondwa.
“Kwali na munhu yumwe yali na lufufu, yali yovala mivalo ja sendi nyinji ng'hatu na kitani chinojile na kudita mvina chila yokwinuka.
Kahi kwali na munhu yumwe yali nguchemigwa Lazalo, yula yali na vilonda lukuli lweng'ha yali womigala mli lwizi lwa yula yali na lufufu.
Nakaganaga yalye usanyangwa uwele ngulagala kulawa mli mchisanya ya yula yali na lufufu, na ganji, mibwa jali jikuya jimyanga vilonda vya heye!
“Lelo yula munhu yali hela chinhu kaholigwa na Nguluwi, mhilisi wa kilanga nakamhola, kekala habehi na Ibulahimu na yula yali na lufufu kaga, nakatiligwa.
Na yula yali na lufufu yawele yogazigwa kula kuli isi ya wabagame, kenula meho ga heye, kamona Ibulahimu kwa kutali na Lazalo yekale hafungo.
Hamba kachema kwa lizi, ‘Mhaza Ibulahimu, mbonele isungu, mlonjele Lazalo yadolize chidole cha heye mli mazi yahoze umyango wa heni mina ndangugazigwa kuno kuli chiluli.’
“Ila Ibulahimu nakedichila, ‘Kumbuche mwanangu hegwe na kupegwa ganojile lowali uchikala muisi, na Lazalo nakabochela gehile. Lelo heye kanguhozigwa na hegwe kwangugazigwa.
Ila na ago geng'ha, hotuli hetwe na komli hemwe hawichigwa ikulubila ikulu, ili wawele ngugana kuya kumuli kulawa kuno walemwele, na wawele komuli walemwele kuya kuno kotuli.’
Ayo yali na lufufu nakalonga, ‘Lelo mhaza Ibulahimu ndangukulanda umlajize yalute kaye kuli ng'handa ya mhaza wa heni.
Mina ndina wang'holozangu wahano yalute yawakanye waleche kuya kuno kuli kugazigwa.’
“Ila Ibulahimu nakamlonjela, ‘Wang'holozo wanago Maandiko Matakatifu ga Musa na waloli wanji wa Nguluwi wowalonjela ago, waleche wawahulichize hewo chowolonga.’
Ila heye nakalonga, ‘Hebu mhaza Ibulahimu! Ila wone munhu yazilipuche kulawa wanhu wajile na kuwalutila, womgalamchila Nguluwi.’
Heye Ibulahimu nakalonga, ‘Wone hambe wagasome Gandichigwe ga Musa na waloli wanji wa Nguluwi, howojesa hebu! Wone yalute yazilipuche kulawa wanhu wabagame!.’”
Hamba Yesu nakawalonjela wala walanguswa wa heye, “Havileka kulawila vinhu vilingujeza wanhu kudita gehile, ila kochona yula yojeza.
Naigana yafunjigwe iganga likulu lya lwala msingo na kutozigwa mli mlwanda, kuleka heye kumwambuza munhu yumwe wa awa wadodo kuwifya.
Milolele! Wone mng'holozo yakuditile gehile mdeuze, wone yakunde kumgalamchila Nguluwi, yamgalachile.
Kahila wone yakuzudize mala saba kwa izuwa limwe na yohiluchila kouli yolonga, ‘Ndimgalamchila Nguluwi,’ goya yakundile.”
Wala watumigwa nawamlonjela, “Mkulu tonjezele makundo.”
Heye mkulu nakawedichila, Wone makundo ga hemwe na gawe mado kota nhyule ndodo ya haladali, mwahajezile kulilonjela ali igodi lya Mfolosadi ng'holeche ukenjile mli lwanda, nawo wawahuliche.
“Tulonje hemwe munhu yumwe kana chitumagwa yali ngukola mijto ya kumgunda au kangudima ming'holo lelo yohiluka kulawa kumgunda, komlonjela ayo chitumagwa himahima uye ulye ndiya?
Hebu! Komlonjela nhelechele ndiya wikale ung'holela mijito mbaka londisinda kulya na kung'hwa, ndo nagwe ulye.
Homnonela ayo mpogozi kwa vila nakakola goyalonjelwe.
Na hemwe namwe wone mdite gomlonjelwe, mlonje, ‘Hetwe wapogozi wohambe tupegwe chinhu, tukola gala gotulonjelwe tukole hela.’”
Yesu loyali yojenda kuza Yelusalemu nakakola mmbaka mwa Samaliya na Galilaya.
Loyali yokwinjila mli chijiji chimwe, naketing'ha na wanhu kumi wali na uswema, wemile kutali.
Wachemeleza lizi wolonga, “Yesu mlangusa tonele isungu!”
Loyawawene nakawalonjela, “Mlute mkelajile kwa watambika.” Lowaliwoluta, nawona kuhovujigwa.
Myawo yumwe yonile nakoselwa mayamwa, kahiluka kamtogola Nguluwi kwa lizi ing'hangala.
Ketoza kumwando kuli magulu ga Yesu kuno yomnonela. Ayo yali Msamalia.
Aho Yesu nakalonga, “Nandisile matamwa mwali kumi? Wala tisa wakohi?
Haduhuli yunji yahiluche kumtogola Nguluwi ila ayu mjenzi yaliyeng'ha?”
Yesu nakamlonjela yula munhu, “Winuche, ulute, makundo gako gakulohola.”
Mhela umwe Mafalisayo nawamuuza Yesu, “Undewa wa Nguluwi wokuya nili?” Heye nakawalonjela, “Undewa wa Nguluwi haukuya ukoneka.
Kahi haduhu munhu yolonga, wahano, au wahala. Lelo Undewa wa Nguluwi wa mgati mwenu.”
Hamba kawalonjela walanguswa, “Mazuwa ganguya moza ngugana kulola izuwa limwe lya mwana wa munhu, ila hamyona.
Na wanhu wokulonjelani, ‘Mlole ka hala!’ Au ‘Mlole ka hano!’ Ila hemwe mleche kulawa kahi mleche kuwawinza.
Mina kota hila lumwemwesa lwa limlungu ne kulonga lumwesa kilanga nzingo imwe mbaka iyage, ndo voiwa zuwa alyo Mwana wa Munhu loyokuya.
Ila ago gang'hali, kogazigwa lukami na kulemigwa na lulelo alu.
Kota vyonaiwele mhela wa Nuhu ndo vyoiwa hoyokuya Mwana wa Munhu.
Wanhu nawalyaga na kung'hwa wohola na kuholeka mbaka mhela ula Nuhu loyenjile mli itumbwi ling'hangala. Mazi metemete logalawile na kuwakopola weng'ha.
Yowa kota voilawile mhela wa Loti. Wanhu wazangulya na kung'hwa, kugula na kuguza, kunyala nhyadikwa na kuzenga.
Ila izuwa Loti loyochile sodoma, maganga ga chiluli nagalawila gazangutowa kota nhonya kulawa kilanga na kuwakopola weng'ha.
Ndo vyoiwa zuwa alyo Mwana wa Munhu loyogubuligwa.
“Zuwa alyo, wone munhu yawe mswiswili mli ng'handa, yaleche kudulika yahole vinhu vya heye vili mng'handa yali kumgunda yaleche kuhiluka koyalawile.
Mkumbucheni mchewake Loti.
Munhu yalingugana kululohola lukuli lwa heye kolwajiliza, na munhu yolwajiliza kolulohola.
Ndangukulonjelani, izuwa alyo wanhu weli wowa wawasile hamihe, yumwe koholigwa na yunji kolechigwa.
Wadala weli wowa wotwanga ndiya hamwe. Yumwe koholigwa na yunji kolechigwa.”
Wanhu weli wowa kumgunda, yumwe koholigwa na yunji kolechigwa.
Wamuuza kohi Mkulu? Kawalonjela, “Hawele na mtufi, ndo hojimema mikungule.”
Hamba Yesu nakawasimila walanguswa wa heye nhelo ayi, imgana munhu yaze kumlanda Nguluwi ne kugozola.
Nakalonga, “Kuli honhu hamwe kwali na mtagusa yumwe yali yomuwinza Nguluwi, kahi nahamjesaga ne munhu.
Na honhu aho, kwali na mamo yumwe yalechelelwe, nakamlutilaga ayo mtagusa yomlanda yamtagusile goya kulawa kwa munhu yali ngumhwihilwa.
Mihela minji ayo mtagusa nahaganaga kumlewela ayo mamo, ila mwiso kazangulonga, ‘Wone hambe ndimjese Nguluwi na wanhu,
Ila ayu mdala kanguya yongaza, ndomleweleza wone siditile ahyo kozanguya hano mwiso konhosa lukami.’”
Mkulu nakawalonjela, “Muhulika vyoyalonjile ayo mtagusa yehile.
Lelo Nguluwi howalewela wala yawahagule, wala wali ngulanda nemisi na nechilo? Koleka kuwahulichiza?
Ndangukulonjela kowalewela himahima. Kahi, kowa kuduhu makundo amu muisi mhela Mwana wa Munhu loyokuya?”
Hamba Yesu nakawalonjela kahi nhelo kota hino, wala wanhu nawewonaga watanganika na kuwabeza wayawo wanji.
“Nakalonga, Wanhu weli nawaluta mluga lwa ng'handa ya Nguluwi kuza kulanda Nguluwi, yumwe Mfalisayo, na yunji mkongoza kodi.

“Ayo mfalisayo kema hafungo na kumlanda Nguluwi mnhumbula, ‘Gwa Nguluwi, malumbo, heni siwele kota wala wawele wadesi, wawele wabuhu na wang'hondwa na walinguboka. Malumbo, heni siwele kota ayu mkongoza sendi.
Ndangwesela kulya mazuwa meli, ndangulavya imwe ya kumi ya lufufu londiwele kupegwa.’

“Ila yula mkongoza sendi, yali yemile kwa kutali henule ne meho gake kilanga, ila nakebata chipambaga kuno yesinzile kulajila kana masinzo, kalonga, ‘Gwa Nguluwi mbonele isungu heni ndiwele na gehile!’
Ndangukulonjelani,” “Ayu mkongoza sendi kahiluka kaye yawele yakundigwe na Nguluwi kusinda yula Mfalisayo. Mina, chila yalingikwiniza koduliswa, na yoneche yawele liholile, kokwinizwa.”
Wanhu wamigalila Yesu wana wadodo yawawichile moko. Walanguswa wawawene nawawang'hanuchila.
Ila Yesu nakawachema hoyali yolonga, “Muwaleche awo wana wadodo woye kwa heni, mleche kuwalemeza, mina Undewa wa Nguluwi wanguwagana wanhu kota awa.
Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya ng'hatu, munhu yohambe youbochele Undewa wa Nguluwi kota mwana mdodo, hokwinjila kuli undewa awo.”
Mkulu yumwe wa Wayahudi nakamuuza Yesu, “Mlangusa yanojile, ndite ndaze leka mhegwe ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma?”
Yesu nakamuuza, “Lekachoni kwangundonjela noga? Haduhu munhu yanojile ila yumwe, Nguluwi yaliyeng'ha.
Kujizela mizilo, ‘Uleche ung'hondwa, uleche kukopola, uleche kuhiza, uleche kumwimilila munhu udesi, uwahulichize mhaza na mayako.’”
Heye nakalonga, “Ago geng'ha ndigabata kulawila londali msongolo.”
Yesu loyahuche ago kamlonjela, “Kwanguganigwa kudita chinhu chimwe, uguze chila chinhu, wagawile wanzunwa, na hegwe kowa na ng'hano kilanga, hamba uye umbinze.”
Ila ayo munhu loyahuliche ago, yawele na masinzo, kwa vila, yali na lufufu lwinji.
Yesu loyamuwene kangugana ahyo, nakalonga, “Kota voiwa nongwa kwa wali na lufufu, wolemwela kwinjila kuli Undewa wa Nguluwi!
Ahi ndo yowa ubewe kwa Ngamiya lyoweza kukola mlinanga ya chihomo kusinda yali na lufufu kwinjila kuli Undewa wa Nguluwi.”
Wala wanhu wahuliche ago, nawalonga, “Yalikohi yoloholigwa?”
Yesu kawalonjela, “Gali ngulemweligwa kwa wanhu. Kwa Nguluwi zoditikwa.”
Heye Petili nakamuuza, “Na hetwe ndaze? Tuleka geng'ha natukuwinza!”
Yesu nakawalomjela, ndangukulonjelani ndikomya, “Munhu yalechile ng'handa ama mdala ama mkulugwe ama wamlelile na wana kwa Undewa wa Nguluwi,
Kobochela menji ng'hatu mhela awu wa sambi, na mhela ukuya ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma.”
Yesu nakawahola hafungo wala walanguswa, kawalonjela, “Mhulichize! Twanguluta Yelusalemu na ako chila chinhu chandikwe na waloli gomlapa Mwana wa Munhu, gowa gakoligwe.
Mina kowichigwa mmoko mwa wanhu hawawele Wayahudi, na hewo womditila gehile na kummizila mite.
Womtowa na ng'hobwa, womkopola, ila zuwa lya kadatu kulawa loyabagame, kozilipuka.”
Ila hewo nahawavizelele mbuli ne imwe, nawavisigwa ulonzi awo, nahawavizelele choni chilingulonjigwa.
Mhela Yesu loyali habehi kwinjila Yeliko, kwali na munhu yumwe hambe yalole yekalise mnzila yolanda,
Yahuliche wanhu wokola kauza, “Hana choni?”
Wamlonjela, “Yesu wa Nazaleti kangukola hano.”
Heye nakachemeleza lizi yolonga, “Yesu Mwana wa Daudi, umbonele isungu!”
Kwangugana ndikuditile ndaze? Wala wanhu walongole wamdeuza wamlonjela nyamalile ila heye hahuliche kaza nguchemeleza lizi, “Mwana wa Daudi, umbonele isungu.”
Yesu kema kawalonjela wamigale hoyali. Yula munhu yohambe yalole loyoile habehi, Yesu nakamuuza,
“Kwangugana ndikuditile choni?”
Nakedichila, “Mkulu ndangulanda ndizengulola kahi.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Ulole! Makundo ga hegwe gakulohola.”
Bahala yula yawele yohambe yalole kazangulola. Kamuwinza Yesu kuno yomtogola Nguluwi. Wala wanhu weng'ha lowawene ago, wamtogola Nguluwi.
Yesu nakenjila mujini Yeliko, loyali yokola mnzila za honhu aho.
Kalawila munhu yumwe, itagwa lyake Zakayo. Ayo nayali chilongozi wa wakongoza sendi na kahila yali munhu yali na lufufu.
Kagana kulola Yesu munhu wachi, lelo wanhu wali wenji lukami, ila heye yali chifude na kalemwela kumona.
Ahyo! Nakabilima kumwando, kakwina mchanya mli ikuyu leka wamone Yesu, mina yali yokolela aho.
Yesu loyafichile honhu hala, nakalola mchanya kamlonjela, “Zakayo, uduliche hasi himahima, mana lelo hano ndogana nsinde haluga hako.”
Zakayo kedulika himahima, kambochela yasangalale.
Wanhu weng'ha lowawene ago, waluka kulonga longa, “Kaluta kikala na munhu yawele na gehile.”
Ila Zakayo kenuka nakamlonjela Yesu, “Hulichize Mkulu! Heni ndowapa wali hela vinhu nusu ya vinhu vya heni na wone ndimlande munhu chinhu, ndomhilusila kota acho mala zine.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Lehano ulohozi uya ng'handa ayi, mina ayo na heye mwana wa lukolo lwa Ibulahimu.
Mina Mwana wa Munhu koya kupala na kulohola wajilile.”
Mhela wanhu lowang'hali wohulichiza ago, Yesu nakawalangusa kwa nhelo yolonga, aho yalibehi na Yelusalemu, na wanhu wavizela mhela wuwu, Undewa wa Nguluwi wokwiza.
Aho nakawalonjela, “Kwali na munhu yumwe yatanganiche na kadita majendo kuluta isi ya kutali yakabochele undewa, hamba yahiluche.
Yang'hali kuka kawachema wala watumagwa kumi, kampa chila munhu sendi zihejile msahala wa miyezi jidatu na kuwalonjela, ‘Mgulile vinhu mzenguguza mbaka londihiluka.’
Ila wanhu wanji nawamwihilwa na wawalajiza watumagwa walute wakalonje! ‘Tumlema ayu yaleche kuwa mndewa wa hetwe.’
“Aho munhu loyapeligwe undewa nakahiluka, bahala kalonga wala watumagwa wapeligwe sendi wachemigwe. Yogana yavizele chila munhu zilela zilinga.
Yula yalongoligwe kupegwa kalawila kalonga, ‘Mkulu zoumhele, ndizonjeza mala kumi.’
Heye kamlonjela, ‘Goya,’ Hegwe kwa chitumagwa unojile! Kunoga kuli mbuli ndodo, kowa ulongoza miji kumi!,
Chitumagwa wa keli koya, nakalonga, ‘Mkulu, nguza zonjezeka mala zihano ya zila zoumhle!’
Heye nakamlonjela, ‘Nagwe kowa mkulu wa miji jihano.’
“Chitumagwa yunji koya, kalonga, ‘Mkulu, uhole sendi zako, nandizivisa goya mchibende,
nandumba hegwe kwa munhu yang'ang'ale, kwangusa chohuwichile, na kubeta cho hunyalile.’
Heye nakamlonjela, ‘Vyoulonjile ahyo ndokutagusa kwa mlomo wa hegwe, hegwe kwa chitumagwa wihile! Nakuvizela heni nda munhu yang'ang'ale, ndangubeta vyosinyalile.’
Lekachoni huwichile sendi kuli wanhu walingonjeza londikuya nyhole na zila zonjezeche?
“Aho nakawalonjela wala wali hala, ‘Msukuleni alyo igwala limwe, na mumhe yula yawele na zila zonjezeche mala kumi.’
Hewo anwamlonjela, ‘Ila Mkulu heye kanazo zonjezeche mala kumi!’
‘Heye nakawalonjela,’ ‘Chila yawele na chinhu, kokonjezelwa chiyage, ila yula yawele hela chinhu, chila chidodo choyawele nacho, choholigwa.
Na sambi, wala wohambe wagane ndiwe mndewa wa hewo, muwagale aha, muwakopole nani ndilola.’”
Yesu nakalonga ago, yolawa nakalongola kumwando kuza Yelusalemu.
Hoyali habehi na Betifage na Besania, behi na chidunda cha Mizeituni, nakawalajiza walanguswa wa heye weli.
Nakawalonjela, “Mlute hali chijiji chiwele kumwando kwa hemwe. Lomuwa mukwinjila mchijiji, molifika mwana idogowi liwohigwe halina kwinigwa na munhu, mdohole mligale hano.
Wone munhu yawauze, lekachoni mlingulidohola, mlonje ‘Mkulu kangumgana.’”
Wolawa waluta wafika kota Yesu voyawalonjele.
Lowali wolidohola lila lidogowi, hewo wawauza, “Lekachoni mlingulidohola ali idogowi?”
Hewo nawawalonjela, “Mkulu kangumgana.”
Wolawa waligala lila idogowi kwa Yesu. Wolawawahola nguwo za hewo watambalika hamgongo mwa idogowi, wamkwiniza Yesu mchanya wa alyo idogowi.
Yesu kazanguluta yawele mchanya mli idogowi. Na wanhu nawazanza nguwo za hewo mbalabala.
Loyali behi na Yelusalemu, hali mduliko wa chidunda cha Mizeituni, walanguswa wa heye na wanhu wenji wazakwimba na kumtogola Nguluwi kwa lizi ling'hangala kwa mbuli ng'hulu zowaziwene;
Wazangulonga, “Yamtambichize Mndewa yokuya kwa itagwa lya Mkulu. Kikala goya kuchanya kilanga, na ukulu ng'hatu kwa Nguluwi!”
Aho Mfalisayo wamwe wala wali hala hali wanhu wamemile, nawamlonjela, “Mlangusa,” “Walonjele walanguswa wa hegwe wanyamalile!”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Ndangukulonjelani wone awa wenyamalile, ago maganga gochemeleza lizi.”
Loyali habehi ng'hatu na kuwona muji wa Yelusalemu, Yesu nakaulilila,
yolonga, “Yaligoya hegwe nagwe lelo hano mbuli ilingigala makundo! Ila, lelo gavisigwa mmeho gako.
Mina zuwa lyanguya wakwihilwe wokuzungulusila lugagala, wokuzunguluta na kukibata kulawa nzingo zeng'ha.
Wokukopola hegwe na wanhu walingikala amo, howokulechela ne iganga likwima mli iganga liyage, kwa vila, hauzelele ula mhela Nguluwi hoyokuyila kukulohola.”
Yesu nakenjila mli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, kaluka kuwawinga kunze wanhu walinguguza vinhu.
Nakawalonjela, “Yandichigwa, ‘Ng'handa ya heni yowa ng'handa ya kulandila.’ Ila hemwe muigalula mhalika ya wabokaji!”
Chila izuwa Yesu kazanguwalangusa ng'handa ya Nguluwi. Watambika wakulu na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na wakulu wa wanhu nawagana kumkopola,
Ila hewo hawaliwene lya kudita, mina wanhu weng'ha wali wekale tulu womhulichiza chila luzi.
Zuwa limwe, Yesu yali yawalangusa wanhu honhu ha kusalila na kuwatagusila Mbuli Inojile, watambika wakulu na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na wakulu wamwe nawoya,
Walonga, “Tulonjele! Kwangudita mbuli azi kwa ludali lwachi, ama yalikohi yakupele ludali luno?”
Yesu nakawalonjela. “Na heni ndowauzani,
ludali lwa Yohani lwa kubatiza nalulawa kilanga kwa Nguluwi ama kwa wanhu?”
Ila hewo nawalonga ahi, “Wone tulonje nalulawa kilanga, kotuuza, ‘Mbona hamumkundile?’
Na wone tulonje nalulawa kwa wanhu, wanhu weng'ha wa hano wotutowa na maganga, mina weng'ha nawakunda kota Yohani yali mloli wa Nguluwi.”
Nawamlonjela, “Hatuvizelele alo ludali nalulawa kohi.”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Na heni siwalonjela ndangudita mbuli zino kwa ludali lwachi.”
Yesu kazangulangusa wanhu yolonga kwa nhelo ayi, “Munhu yumwe nakalima mgunda wa zabibu, nakawabasila walimi, heye nakaheluka isi ya kutali, kekala ako mihela minji.
Mhela wa kubeta, ayo munhu kemigala chitumagwa kwa wala walimile yakahole kumgunda gojilelile mizabibu. Ila wala walimile wamsubula ayo chitumagwa na kumhilusa ne chinhu.
Yula munhu nakamigala chitumagwa yunji, ila hewo kahila wamtowa ayo chitumagwa na kumbasa soni na kumhilusa ne chinhu.
Kahi kamigala wa kadatu, heye ayo lowamlumize, wamuwinga.
Yula yawele na mgunda nakejesa, ‘Ndodita choni? Ndomgala mwana wa heni ndimganile, yolonga heye womhulichiza.’
Wala walingulima lowawene, wazangilonjela, ‘Ayu ndo yohalila. Tumkopole leka kuhalila kwa heye kuwe kwa hetwe.’
Lelo, Nawamlavya hafungo mwa mgunda wa mizabibu. Wamkopola.?”
Yesu nakauza, “Yula yawele na mgunda kowadita ndaze wala walimi?”
“Kokuya kuwabagamiza awala walingulima, na kowapa walimi wanji awo mgunda wa zabibu.”
Wanhu lowahuliche yolonga ahyo, nawalonga, “Hebu haiwa ahyo!”
Ila Yesu kawalola, nakawalonjela gano, “Maandiko Matakatifu gana mana yachi?
‘Iganga lilemigwe na walinguzenga,
lelo liwa iganga likulu lya msisi!’
Wone munhu yogwa mchanya mwa iganga alyo, kobeneka pasapasa na wone iganga limgwile munhu yoneche, lyomhondanga.”
Walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na watambika wakulu nawavizela, yaliyowalangusa kwa nhelo ayo yowalangusa hewo, wazangugana wambate bahala, ila nawadumba wanhu
Wazangupala mhela unojile. Wapala wanhu wazengidita wanoga, kumuuza. Aho wali wogana wambate na kumgala kuli ludali lwa chilongozi.
Wala wapelembi nawamlonjela, “Mlangusa, tuvizela hegwe kwangulangusa na kulonga aku wokomya, tuvizela hambe umbagule munhu, kwangulangusa nzila za Nguluwi.
Lelo tulonjele iwa goya kumpa mndewa wa Loma kodi?”
Yesu nakavizela aho wangumjeza, nakawalonjela,
“Mndajile sendi ayo. Ndaze mutwi na itagwa ali ndo lya whaani?”
“Mutwi wa Kaisali.” Nawedichila.
Yesu nakawalomjela, “Goya, mmigalile Kaisali gawele ga Kaisali na mmigalile Nguluwi gawele ga Nguluwi.”
Aho hali wanhu walemwela kumgwiliza, wekala tulu wochijesa vyoyawalonjele.
Wala Masadukayo, nawawele walonga kuduhu uzilipuko kwa wabagame, woya hali Yesu, wazangulonga.
“Mlangusa, Musa nakatwandichila, ‘Wone mng'holozo yumwe yaje ne kulela mwana, yogana munhu yumwe wa lukolo lwenu yamhalile ayo mdala, yamlelele wana mng'holoze.’
Lelo mhela umwe kwali na wanhu saba wa lukolo lumwe. Yula yalongole kamhola, hamba nakabagama ne kulela mwana.
Mng'holoze wa keli nakamhola yula mdala mlekwa, naye kahi nakabagama.
Na wakadatu hiho. Wazanguluta hiho mbaka weng'ha saba nawabagama haduhu yalechile mwana kuli yula mdala.
Logadumile, yula mdala na heye nakabagama.
Lelo zuwa lya wabagame kuzilipuka mdala ayo kowa mdala wa yalikohi? Weng'ha saba na wali wamhesile.”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Walume na wadala wa mihela aji wanguhola na kuholeka,
Ila wala Nguluwi yowawika mbaka mhela wa kuzilipuka, howohesa ne kuhesigwa hebu.
Awo howobagama kahi, kwa vila, wowa kota wahilisi wa kilanga wa Nguluwi. Na ndo wana wa Nguluwi mina hewo walawa kuli wanhu wabagame.

Ila kuzilipuka kwa wabagame, Musa kahi nakakunda mbuli azo kuli gandichigwe gelile. Yolajila hala honhu hali chisosolo lochali chikwaka chiluli, kangumchema Mkulu kota Nguluwi wa Ibulahimu na Nguluwi wa Isaka na Nguluwi wa Yakubu. Lelo, heye hawele,
Nguluwi wa wanhu wabagame, ila Nguluwi wa wanhu wakomu, mina wala yawachemile kowali, wangikala na heye.”
Walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa nawalonga, “Mlangusa kwidichila goya ng'hatu.”
Mina huganile kumuuza kahi chinhu chinji.
