Yesu nakauza, “Lekachoni wanhu walingulonga Kilistu Mlohozi ndo mwana wa Daudi?
Mina yuye Daudi kangulonga mlichitabu cha heye cha zabuli,
‘Mkulu, nakamlonjela Mkulu wa heni,
kalise nzingo ya heni ya kudilo,
mbaka ndiwawiche wang'honyo wa hegwe, wawe
chigoda cha kuwichila magulu ga hegwe.’
Daudi na kamchema ahyo heye, ‘Mkulu’, Yowa ndaze lelo, Kilistu Mlohozi yawe mwana wa Daudi?”
Yesu nakawalonjela walanguswa hali wanhu weng'ha,

“Milolele na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa hewo waganaaga kukola wavalile kanzu, wangana kulamsigwa na wanhu watanganiche kuli masoko. Na kikalisa kumwando mli ng'handa za kusalila na kuhola vigoda vya kumwando hali mnvina.
Wanguwabunza wadala walekwa na wangihada hewo wanoga kwa kulanda kwa sala zihejile. Izuwa Nguluwi loyowazapa wanhu, wotagusigwa kwa wihe lukami ng'hatu!”
Yesu nakalola kweng'ha, kawona wanhu wali na lufufu wojela ndolendole zowegale mli isanduku lya ndolendole kuli ng'handa ya Nguluwi,
kahi nakamona mamo yumwe mlekwa mzunwa yolavya mumo migwala mili midodo.
Nakalonga, “Ndangukulonjelani ndikomya, mamo ayu mlekwa nakalavya nyinji ng'hatu kusinda wanhu weng'ha.
Mina wanhu wawele na lufufu nawalavya ndolendole kulawa kuli lufufu nalowawele nawo. Ila ayu mamo kwa uzunwa wa heye, kalavya chila chinhu choyawele nacho.”
Walanguswa wamwe wali wolonga mbuli za Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, vyoizenjigwe na maganga ga sendi nyinji, na vinhu vyowalavile kwa Nguluwi. Yesu nakalonga,
“Aga geng'ha go mgona izuwa likuya haduhu iganga nelimwe lya ng'handa lisigala mchanya mwa iganga liyage, chila chinhu chowifigwa.”
Wanhu nawamuuza Yesu, “Mlangusa, mbuli azo zolawila nili? Choni chowa ulajilo wa mbuli azo zahabehi kulawila?”

Yesu nakawalonjela, “Milolele, mleche kubadigwa, mina wanhu wenji wokuya kwa kukolela itagwa lya heni wolonga, ‘Heni nda Kilistu Mlohozi yahaguligwe na Nguluwi, Mhela wa habehi. Ila hemwe mleche kuwawinza!’
Lelo, lomhulika mbuli za ngondo na kugazigwa, mleche kutigasigwa, mina ago golongola kulawila, ila kuduma kwa geng'ha kung'hali.”
Yesu nakalutilila kulonga, “Isi imwe yochitowa na isi iyage, na undewa umwe wochitowa na undewa uyage.
Chila honhu howa na jimachinyina mikulu, kowa na nzala na matamwa ga kulecheza. Kowa na vinduzanduza vya kudumbigwa na ulajilo mkulu kilanga.
Ila logowa gang'hali kulawila ago geng'ha, wokubatani, wokugazani na kuwagalani mli ng'handa za kusalila na kuwawika mchinweng'ho. Mohilikwa kuli wandewa na vilongozi kwa chiwalo cha itagwa lya heni,
leka mlavye ulolezi kwa hewo.
Ila hemwe mleche kuwa na lunhwinhwi ndaze vyomchigombela.
Kwa vila nene ndokupani ulonzi wa kulonga na wanhu wakwihileni howoweza kiziganila na hemwe kahi howoibeza.
Molemigwa na wakulu wa hemwe na wang'holozenu na wanhu weng'ha womiganaga. Nawo wowakopola wamwe wa hemwe.
Wanhu weng'ha wokulemani kwa nongwa ya kumbinza heni.
Ila nemnvili imwe haikwajilila mmitwi ja hemwe.
Kwa kwimilila kwa hemwe, molohola ukomu wa hemwe.
“Lomuuwona muji wa Yelusalemu uzumgulutwe na wamizi, mvizele kuwifigwa kwake kwa habehi.
Aho wawele Yudeya wabilimile kuchidunda, wala wawele mli muji walawe na wala wawele kumgunda waleche kwinjila kuli muji awo.
Mazuwa ago ndo mazuwa ga kugazigwa, leka geng'ha gandikwe galawile.
Mane wawo wala wawele na himila na walingonyeza zuwa azo! Mina muli isi mowa na nongwa ng'hulu ng'hatu na ng'halazi ya Nguluwi yowoyela wanhu awa.
Wamwenga wakopoligwa kwa ipanga, wamwenga wochibatigwa woholigwa mli isi zeng'ha, na muji wa Yelusalemu wobijigwa na isi zinji, mbaka mhela houkuya.
“Kowa na vinhu vyokoneka kuli izuwa na nyelezi na nondwe. Wanhu weng'ha muisi wozangugaya kwa chiwalo cha kudumba mtigasiko wa nigu za bahali.
Wanhu wozilika kwa kudumba, wololela mbuli ziza ngulawila muisi, mina mong'ho ubatilile vinhu avyo vyeng'ha wotigaswa,
Hamba womona Mwana wa Munhu yokuya kuli ng'hungugu. Yali na ludali na ukulu lwinji.
Mhela mbuli azo lozikwaluka kulawila, mwinuche na kwinula mitwi jenu mchanya, mina kugomboligwa kwa hemwe kwa habehi.”
Hamba nakawalangusa yolonga kwa nhelo, “Mlole ikuyu na migodi jinji jeng'ha.
Wone mone galuka kuzuka mahamba, mvizela mhela wa nhonya wa habehi.
Namwe hihyo, homkona mbuli azo zilawila, mvizele Undewa wa Nguluwi wa habehi.
“Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, lulelo alu halubagama gang'hali ago geng'ha kulawila.
Ulanga na isi zopuluta, ila ulonzi wa heni haupuluta hebu.
“Muwe meho nhumbula za hemwe zileche kuganilila kuli vinhu vinji vya ukomu awu, kudita kuli mbuli zihile na mijito ja amu muisi. Izuwa alyo lyokuyilani ne kuvizela.
Mina chokuyilani kota chinhu chitejigwe, wanhu weng'ha wali ngikala muli isi.
Milolele, mze ngulanda leka muwe na ludali lwa kukola mli mbuli azo zeng'ha zilawila, na kwima kumwando kuli Mwana wa Munhu.”
Izuwa alyo, nemisi, Yesu yali yowalangusa wanhu Mng'handa ya Nguluwi ila hamihe nakalutaga kuli chidunda cha Mizeituni na kikala ako.
Wanhu weng'ha nawalutaga hali Ng'handa ya Nguluwi kung'hali lufuku. Wazengumhulichiza.
Mnvina ya mibumunda hajisasile, ilinguchemigwa Pasaka, yali habehi.
Watambika wakulu na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa wazangupala nzila ya kumkopola Yesu, ila nawawadumba wanhu.
Na baho Limazoga limwinjila Yudasi yalinguchemigwa Isikalioti, yumwe wa wala walanguswa kumi na weli.
Ahyo nakaluta kwa wakulu wa watambika na walolezi wa ng'handa ya Nguluwi, nakalonga nawo vila vyoyomuhinduchila Yesu.
Na hewo wasechelela nawalagana kumha sendi.
Yudasi nakakunda na kazangupala mhumhu ya kumhinduchila Yesu ne wanhu kuvizela.
Zuwa lya mnvina ya mibumunda hajisasile wali habehi. Ahyo ndo vyoili mwanaing'holo kolavigwa nhambiko ya Pasaka.
Yesu nakawalajiza Petili na Yohani kawalonjela, “Mlute mkatugongomanyile mnvina ya Pasaka tulye.”
Hewo nawamuuza, “Kohi kotuluta kugongomanyila ndiya?”
Nakawedichila, “Mhulichize! Lomuwa mluta mjini, moting'hana na mlume yawele yedwichile chiya cha mazi. Mumuwinze mbaka ng'handa yoyokwinjila.
Na mumlonjele yawele na ng'handa, ‘Mlangusa kanguuza, chilikohi chihengo cha wajenzi choyodila Pasaka hamwe na walanguswa?’
Na heye kokulajilani chihengo chikulu cha mchanya mina chiwichigwe goya, mgongomanyile mumo.”
Nawaluta wona hihila kota Yesu vyoyawalonjele. Na hewo nawawika goya ndiya ya Pasaka.
Mhela loufichile, Yesu kawahola watumigwa wa heye na kikala na hewo mchisanya.
Nakawalonjela, “Ndangugana kulya hamwe na hemwe mnvina ayi ya pasaka nding'hali kugazigwa!
Kwa vila ndangukulonjelani, silya kahi mbaka kuli Undewa wa Nguluwi.”
Hamba kahola chizombe cha divai, katambichiza, kalonga, “Mbochele chino mung'hwe mweng'ha.
Ndangukulonjelani kulawa sambi sing'hwa divai kahi mbaka undewa wa Nguluwi houkuya.”
Hamba kahola ibumunda, katambichiza na kamogola, kawapa walanguswa wa heye yolonga, “Alu ndo lukuli lwa heni, loulavigwa kwa mbuli ya hemwe. Mdite hino lomng'humbuka heni.”
Kahi hiho na chizombe, loyadile kalonga, “Chizombe chino cha ilagano lya sambi lilingulajila kwa danda ya heni yoibohoka kwa mbuli ya hemwe.
“Ila loleni! Munhu yula yongalamka kabahano kangulya hamwe na heni!.
Mwana wa Munhu kanguluta kukopoligwa kota voyaganile Nguluwi, ila mane munhu yula yamuhinduche.”
Aho wazangiuza wawo yeng'ha yalikohi yodita mbuli ayo.
Nakulawila kitwanza hali walanguswa yalikohi yozanguwa mkulu ng'hatu hali hewo weng'ha.
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Vilongozi wa isi walongozaga wanhu kwa lupichi na hewo wochichema ‘Watanza wanhu.’
Ila hemwe ileche kuwa ahyo, yali mkulu hali hemwe imgana yawe mdodo kusinda weng'ha, na yawele mkulu imagana yawe kota chitumagwa.

Kwa vila yalikohi yali mkulu? Yula yalingikalisa mchisanya na kulya, au yula yali chitumagwa? Hebu! Yowa yula yalingikala mcchisanya na kulya ndiya! Ahyo, heni nda hano hagati ha hemwe kota mkolamijito.
“Hemwe ndo mponile na heni, mhela weng'ha wa kujezigwa kwa heni.
Kota mhaza wa heni voyangalile heni undewa wuwula. Na heni nani, ndangukupani hemwe undewa.
Molya na kung'hwa mchisanya ya heni kuli undewa wa heni na kikalisa mvigoda vya undewa na kutagusa nhanzi kumi na mbili za Izilaeli.
“Simoni, Simoni! Hulichize! Limazoga lyangugana kuwabetani hemwe kota munhu yobeta uhemba.
Ila heni ndokulandila kwa Nguluwi leka makundo ga hegwe galeche kuwa mado. Wone uhiluche kuli heni wasindamize nhumbula wang'holozo.”
Petili nakalonga, “Mkulu, heni ng'hunda kuluta na hegwe mchinweng'ho na kuli kubagama.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Ndangukulonjela Petili, lehano izogolo ling'hali kwika, kombela kadatu kota hunzelele heni.”
Hamba Yesu kawauza walanguswa wa heye. “Hala ndiwalajize mli hela sendi ne mhako ne makwamba, namwisilwa chinhu?”
Nawamwidichila, “Hatwisilwe ne chinhu hebu!”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Ila sambi yoneche yula yalihela mhako wa sendi yahole. Na yali na mhako yadite hiho! Na yali hela ipanga, yaguze ikoti lyake yagule umwe.
Kwa vila Maandiko Matakatifu galonga, ‘Na heye kohanzwa hamwe na wehile,’ Ndanguwalonjelani, geng'ha gandichigwe mbuli ya heni, ganguza kuduma.”
Walanguswa nawalonga, “Mkulu ulole hano hana mipanga mili.”
Nakawalonjela, “Ikwila!”
Yesu koka na kuluta kuli chidunda cha Mizeituni kota vyoyazowele, walanguswa wa heye na hewo wamuwinza.
Loyafichile ako nakawalonjela, “Mlande leka mleche kwinjila kuli kujezigwa.”
Na baho kawaleka, kaluta honhu hatali hado ha munhu kutoza iganga, kafugama, kalanda.
“Mhaza wone ulingugana, umbusile chino chizombe cha kugazigwa kwa heni, ila haiwele vyondigana heni, leka kota vyoulingugana hegwe gakoleke.”
Aho mhilisi kulawa kilanga kalawila kaza kumtanza.
Yawele mli usungu ukulu, kakobanya kulanda ng'hatu, na chituguti chiwele kota danda, kizangulagala hasi.
Loyasindile kulanda, kawahiluchila walanguswa wa heye, nakawafika wawasile, kwa vila nawali na masinzo lukami.
Nakawalonjela, “Lekachoni muwasile? Mwinuche mlande mleche kwinjila kuli kujezigwa.”
Yesu loyali yolutilila kulonga, lung'hongola lwa wanhu, welongoze na yula nayachemagwe Yudasi, yumwe wa wala kumi na weli. Yudasi kumlamsa Yesu kwa kumnonela.
Ila Yesu nakamlonjela, “Yudasi! Kwangumlavya Mwana wa Munhu kwa kumnonela?”
Walanguswa nawekale hamwe na Yesu, lowawene mbuli zila zilawile, nawauza, “Mkulu tuwahenje na mipanga?”
Na myao yumwe kamtowa kwa ipanga chitumagwa yumwe wa mtambika mkulu, nakamdumula ikutu lya kudilo.
Baho Yesu nakalonga. “Leka ayi ikwila!” Kalidoliza lila ikutu na kumlohola.
Hamba Yesu nakawalonjela watambika wakulu na walolezi wa ng'handa ya Nguluwi woyile kumibata. “Muya na mipanga na nyimbati kundibata kota heni nda mbokaji?
Londali hamwe na hemwe chila zuwa na ndikala hamwe na hemwe mli ng'handa ya Nguluwi, hambichile hali ludali lwa hemwe hebu. Ila saa ino ya hemwe, na undewa wa kutitu.”
Wambata Yesu na kumhola, waluta naye kuli ng'handa ya mtambika mkulu. Petili kazangumuwinza kumbele yali kutali.
Nawawesa chenje hagati hali luga, wekalisa hamwe, Petili na kekalisa hamwe na hewo.
Chitumagwa yumwe mdala loyamuwene Petili yekalise behi na chenje, kazangumlola na kalonga, “Munhu ayu yali hamwe na Yesu.”
Ila Petili nakabela mbuli ila yolonga, “Mdala hegwe, simzelele yuno youmlonga!”
Hamba munhu yunji nakamona Petili, kalonga, “Na hegwe nagwe kwa yumwe wa hewo!”
Ila Petili kedichila kalonga, “Mkulu, hebu! Siwele heni!”.
Baho saa imwe hamwande, munhu yumwe kakangaza yolonga, “Ndangukomya, munhu yuno yali hamwe na Yesu kwa vila heye naye nakalawa Galilaya.!”
Ila Petili kedichila, “Munhu hegwe, sivizelele ne choulingulonga!”
Na baho loyali yang'hali yolonga, izogolo nalika.
Mkulu kahinduka kamlola Petili. Petili nakakumbuchila gala gonayamlonjele Yesu. “Lehano izogolo halina kwika kombela mala zidatu kota hunzelele.”
Petili kalawa kunze, nakalila lukami.
Wala wanhu wali womlolela Yesu wazangumtowa na kumbeza.
Wamuwoha chibende kumeho, wazangumuuza, “Tulagulile lelo, yalikohi yakutowile?”
Wazangumlonjela mbuli nyinji za kumliga Yesu.
Loifichile mitondo, balaza lya wasekulu, watambika wakulu na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa nawating'hana hamwe mchitala na kumchema Yesu.
Nawalonga, “Tulonjele! Hegwe kwa Kilistu Mlohozi yahaguligwe na Nguluwi?”
Yesu nakawedichila, “Wone ndikulonjeleni hamkunda,
na wone ndikuuzeni, hamkwidichila hebu.
Ila kulawa sambi na kulutilila, Mwana wa Munhu kowa yekalise kudilo kwa Nguluwi yali na mong'ho weng'ha.”
Weng'ha nawamuuza, “Hambi hegwe kwa Mwana wa Nguluwi?”
Na heye kawedichila, “Hemwe mwangulonga heni nda mwana wa Nguluwi.”
Wazangulonga, “Hambi topala chinhu chachi kahi? Hetwe baha tuhulika yolonga kwa mlomo wa heye du!”
Hamba, wanhu weng'ha wenuka, wamigala Yesu kwa Pilato.
Waluka kumlonjeleza wolonga, “Tumfika munhu ayu yowahada wanhu wa hetwe, yowalemeza kulavya kodi kwa mndewa wa Loma na kichema heye Kilistu Mlohozi yahaguligwe na Nguluwi.”
Pilato nakamuuza, “Hegwe kwa mndewa wa wayahudi?”
Yesu kedichila kamlonjela, “Hegwe kulonga.”
Pilato nakawalonjela watambika wakulu na wala wanhu wamemile, “Sichiwene chinhu cha kumtagusa munhu yuno.”
Ila Hewo wang'ang'anila walonga, “Nakanguwasonjeleza wanhu vibi wetowe na undewa wa Loma kwa ulanguso wa udesi muli isi yeng'ha ya Yudeya, kaluchila Galilaya na sambi ka hano.”
Pilato loyahuliche ago, nakawauza, “Munhu ayu mwenyeng'haye wa Galilaya?”
Loyavizelele Yesu yali hasi ha ulongozi wa mndewa Helodi, kamgala kwa Helodi, mhela awo yali Yelusalemu.
Helodi loyamuwene Yesu kazangusechelela ng'hatu. Kwa vila nakagana kumona kulawa mazuwa menji. Nakahulika mbuli za heye, na kagana yamone yodita vinduzanduza.
Lelo, kamuuza Yesu mbuli nyinji kwa mhela uhejile, ila Yesu hedichile ne chinhu.
Watambika wakulu na walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa, wema wamlonjeleza Yesu kwa lupichi.
Helodi hamwe na wala walingulolela wazangumbasa soni Yesu na kumbeza, wolawa wamvalisa nguwo ya chiundewa, wamhilula kwa Pilato.
Helodi na Pilato, wala aho katali wali wehilwe, kulawa zuwa lilila wazangigana.
Pilato nakawachema watambika wakulu na vilongozi na wanhu.
Baho nakawalonjela, “Mmigala munhu ayu kwa heni, mlonga kota yali yowahada wanhu. Lelo mhulichize! Na heni ndizipelemba mbuli za heye, ila sonile ne chinhu choyawifile kuli mbuli azo zomumlonjeleze.
Si nene yeng'ha, na heye Helodi hachiwene ne chinhu choyawifile munhu ayu chilingumgana yakomigwe.
Ahyo ndangugana yazapigwe ng'hobwa hamba ndomlechela.”
Kwa vila kaganigwa yamlechele munhu yumwe kwa wala wawele mchinweng'ho kuli mnvina ya Pasaka.
Ila lung'hongola lweng'ha lwa wanhu wachemeleza hamwe, “Mkopoleni munhu ayo na utuchumulile Balaba!”
Balaba yali yahindilwe kwa kwambuza wanhu kuhinduka kuli muji na kukopola.
Pilato nakagana kumlechela Yesu, yolawa kalongana nawo kahi,
ila hewo wachemeleza, “Muwambeni mumsalaba, muwambeni mumsalaba.”
Pilato nakawalonjela lwa kadatu, “Kadita choni chihile? Hambe ndichone chinhu chimwambuza yabagame, ndolajiza yasubuligwe ng'hobwa, hamba ndomlechela.”
Ila hewo waza nguchemeleza lukami ng'hatu twangugana Yesu yawambigwe mumsalaba, hamba lizi lyawo lihulikwa hamba wakundizwa chowaganile.
Pilato nakalonga iditigwe kota vyowalingugana.
Kachumula kamlavya yula walingumgana, yula yawohigwe kwa kwambuza kuhinduka na kukopola wanhu, yolawa kamlavya Yesu wamditile vowogana.
Lowali womgala wating'hana na munhu yumwe yali nguchemigwa Simoni mwenyeng'haye wa Kilene, yali yolawa kumgunda. Wamibata wamdwika ula msalaba yauhole kumbele kwa Yesu.
Lung'hongola lwa wanhu lwali lumuwinza, wali mumo wadala womlilila na kumuwembela.
Yesu kagalamka nakawalonjela, “Hemwe wadala wa Yelusalemu! Mleche kundilila heni, ila mililile mwemwe na wana wa hemwe!
Kwa vila mazuwa ganguya mozangulonga, ‘Wabweda wala wali mhende, hewo hawalelile na hambe wonyeze wana!’
Baho wanhu wokwaluka kuvilonjela vidunda, ‘Tugwile!’ Na vidunda, ‘Tugubicheni!’
Kwa vila wanhu wangudita vinhu avi kuli igodi idodi, ahyo yowa ndaze kwa igodi likalile?”
Wanhu wanji weli wehile na wegaligwa bahala, wakopoligwe hamwe na Yesu.
Lowafichile honhu hamwe hali nguchemigwa, “Izeje lya mutwi”, Baho wamuwamba Yesu mumsalaba hamwe na wala wabokaji, yumwe kudilo na yumwe kumoso.
Yesu nakalonga, “Mhaza uwalechele kwa vila hawavizelele hebu chowalingudita.”
Wahola nguwo zonayavalaga kwa kuzitowela simbi.
Wanhu wema wazanguwalola. Wakulu wa Wayahudi wazangubeza wolonga, “Kawalohola wanhu wanji, lelo yelohole yuye wone heye yawele Kilistu Mlohozi yahaguligwe na Nguluwi!”
Wamizi nawo wazangumbeza, waluta wampa divai izazame.
Wolonga, “Wilohole uliyeka wone hegwe ndo uli Mndewa wa Wayahudi.”
Mchanya ha msalaba wa heye, na wandika mbuli ino, “Yuno ndo Mndewa wa Wayahudi.”
Yumwe wa wala wabokaji wawambigwe hamwe na Yesu nakamliga Yesu kalonga, “Hambi hegwe hauwele Kilistu Mlohzi!? Wilohole gwegwe na hetwe.”
Ila yula mbokaji yumwe, kamdeuza myage, yolonga, “Hegwe hambe umdumbe Nguluwi hebu? Hegwe nagwe mbona kwa mumo kuli kutagusigwa kwa wihe hihyo.
Hetwe, twangutagusigwa hano kwa mbuli zihile zotuditile. Ila ayu munhu haditile ne chinhu chihile.”
Hamba kamlonjela Yesu, “Yesu! Ung'humbuche loukwinjila Undewa wa hegwe.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Ndangukulonjela ndikomya lelo hano kowa hamwe na heni kuli lubehelo kuchanya kwa Nguluwi.”
Yali iwele saa sita nemisi; jiza ligubika isi yeng'ha mbaka saa tisa
na ipaziya lya honhu helile ng'hatu kuli ng'handa ya Nguluwi lidejeka vibende vili.
Yesu nakalila kwa kuchemelela, “Mhaza mmoko wa hegwe ndanguwika muhe wa heni.” Na loyalonjile hino, nakatwesemka lwa mwiso.
Mkulu wa wamizi wa Loma, loyawene gogalawile, kamtogola Nguluwi yolonga, “Kakomya, ayu yali munhu yanojile.”
Na wanhu weng'ha wali aho wamemile wololela mbuli ayo, vyowawene ago galawile wahiluka kuluga wotowa vipambaga kwa kulajila masinzo.
Wala wanhu weng'ha wamzelele Yesu na wala wadala wamuwinzile Galilaya, wema kutali wolola vinhu avyo.
Kwali na munhu yumwe itagwa lya heye Yusufu, Mwenyeng'haye wa chijiji chimwe cha Wayahudi chilinguchemigwa Alimataya. Nayali munhu yanojile yodita galinguganigwa na Nguluwi.
Nakekala yobeteza kuya kwa Undewa wa Nguluwi, ila heye yali munhu wa Alimataya muji umwenga wa Wayahudi, yumwe wa wakulu wa kutagusa, hakundile chila chowadile wayage.
Heye kaluta kwa Pilato, kalanda yapegwe lukuli lwa Yesu.
Kaludulisa hasi, kaugubichiza sanda inojile ng'hatu, kauwika mchilaga chihongoligwe mmitalawe na hachinawichigwa ne lukuli mgati.
Zuwa alyo lyali Ijumaa, lya kiwika goya zuwa lya kwesela gali gokwaluka.
Wala wadala nawelongoze hamwe na Yesu kulawa Galilaya nawamuwinza Yusufu, wahona hala honhu hali chilaga na wawona lukuli lwa Yesu houwichigwe.
Na baho wahiluka kuluga, waza hola mafuta ga kunhunyhilila na Malihamu ga kulukumbika lukuli lwa Yesu.
Kuli zuwa lya kwesela, nawesela kota Malajizo ga Musa vyogalingugana.
Jumapili kung'hali lufuku ng'hatu, wadala wahola mafuta ga kunhunyhilila gowawichile na waluta kuli chilaga.
Walifika lila iganga lowadinyile chilaga, lihejele kutali na lwizi lwa chilaga.
Wenjile mgati mchilaga hawauwene lukuli lwa Mkulu Yesu.
Wang'hali wabubuwale na mbuli ayo, bahala wanhu weli wavalile nguwo nzelu chweya! Wema behi na howali.
Wadala wazangudumba ng'hatu na wenamiza hanyi. Ila wala wanhu wawalonjela, “Lekachoni mwangumpala yali mkomu kuli wanhu wabagame?
Yesu haduhu hano, nakazilipuka. Mkumbuchile vyonayakulonjeleni loyali kula Galilaya,
‘Mwana wa Munhu kolavigwa kulimhoko ga wanhu wehile, hewo womgaza na kumuwamba mumsalaba, ila zuwa lya kadatu kozilipuka.’”
Baho wala wadala wakumbuchila mbuli ila yoyawalonjele.
Lowahiluche kulawa kuchilaga, wawalonjela mbuli yila wala walanguswa kumi na yumwe na wanhu weng'ha.
Walonjile mbuli azo kwa watumigwa wali, Maliya Madelena na Yohana na Maliya mayake Yakubu na wadala wanji wawele hamwe kuli chilaga.
Watumigwe na wona mbuli azo kota hazitanganiche, nahawakundile.
Ila Petili kalawa hala na kubilima mbaka kuli chilaga. Loyafichile, kenamiza na kusunjilila mgati, baho kayona ila sanda. Kahiluka kaye aku yabubuwale kwa gala galawile.
Kuli zuwa lilila, wanhu weli walwele walanguswa wa Yesu wali woluta kuli chijiji chilinguchemigwa Emau, utali wa chilomita kumi na imwe kulawa Yelusalemu.
Wazangulonga mbuli zila za vinhu vyeng'ha lozilawile.
Lowaliwolonga na kiuza, heye Yesu nakalawila, kaza kilongoza na hewo.
Wazakumona na meho ila hawali womzela kota ndo Yesu.
Yesu nakawauza, “Mbuli zachi zino zomlonga kuno mjenda?”
Wema tulu, wakwisuche kumeho kuno wesinzile.
Yumwe yalinguchemigwa Kiliopasi, nakamlonjela, “Hegwe kwa mjenzi hano Yelusalemu, hugazelele galawile ako mazuwa gano?”
Yesu nakawauza, “Mbuli zachi?”
Na hewo nawamwidichila, “Mbuli zimlawile Yesu wa Nazaleti, heye yali mloli wa Nguluwi, yadahile kulangusa mbuli zeng'ha hali Nguluwi na hali wanhu weng'ha.
Watambika wakulu na wakulu wa hetwe wamigala kwa wakulu wa Loma yatagusigwe kwa wihe kubagama, na hewo wamuwamba mumsalaba.
Hetwe natukunda kota heye ndo yawagombole Waizilaeli. Lelo kwa ago geng'ha lehano zuwa lya kadatu kulawa lovilawile vinhu avyo.
Vivila wadala wamwenga kulawa mchilundo cha hetwe watinuswa ng'hatu. Mitondo kung'hali lufuku nawaluta kuli chilaga.
Ila hawaluwene lutufi lwake. Wahiluka walonga walawilwa na wahilisi wa kilanga walonjelwa ka mkomu.
Wanhu wamwenga kulawa mchilundo cha hetwe, waluta kuli chilaga, na hewo wona kota wadala wala vyowalonjile, ila heye hawamuwene.”
Na baho Yesu nakawalonjela, “Lekachoni mli wapoka ahi na nhumbula za hemwe hambe zikunde geng'ha galonjigwe na waloli wa Nguluwi?
Haimganile Kilistu Mlohozi yahaguligwe na Nguluwi kugazigwa, na hamba yenjile mli ukulu wa heye?”
Na Yesu kawagubulila mbuli zeng'ha zilingumgana heye kuli Maandiko Matakatifu, kwaluchila chitabu cha Musa mbaka gandichigwe na waloli wa Nguluwi weng'ha.
Lowali behi na chijiji chowaliwoluta, Yesu kedita kota kangulutilila na majendo kumwando.
Ila hewo wamlanda wolonga, “Wikale hamwe na hetwe kwa vila zuwa liswa, chilo changwinjila.” Baho kenjila wekala hamwe.
Loyali yekalise hamwe na hewo kulya ndiya, kahola ibumunda, katambichiza kamogola kawapa.
Bahala meho gawo gagubuligwa na wamzela ndo Yesu, ila heye na kajilila hawamuwene kahi.
Wazangulonga hewo kwa hewo, “Nhumbula za hetwe ha zali zimweka mgati mwa hetwe loyali yolonga na hetwe mnzila na kutudamlila goya Maandiko Matakatifu?”
Bahala hihila woka, wahiluka Yelusalemu, kula wawafika wala watumigwa kumi na yumwe, wehanzile na wanhu wanji.
Walonga ng'hatu, “Mkulu kazilipuka kamlawila Simoni.”
Wala watumigwa weli nawawalonjela wayao mbuli zeng'ha zowalawile mnzila, na vyowamzelele Mkulu kwa kumogola ibumunda.
Bahala lowali wochilonjela ago. Yesu kema hagati howali, nakawalonjela, “Mikale goya.”
Watinuka na wazangudumba na wejesa kota wangulyona ilaika
Na heye kawalonjela, “Lekachoni mwangisinza? Na mmemile majesa Mnhumbula za hemwe?
Ila Mlole moko na magulu ga heni nda yuye. Mbateni mndole, mina ilaika lyahela lukuli na mizeje kota vyommbona.”
Na loyasindile kulonga ago, kawalajila moko na magulu.
Lowali wekale wabubuwale aku hambe wakunde kwa kusangalala, nakawauza, “Hano mwanacho chinhu cheng'ha chila cha kulya?”
Wampa somba ibanichigwe.
Yesu kahola na kalya weng'ha womona.
Hamba nakawalonjela, “Ahino ndokota vonandikulonjeleni londali hamwe na hemwe. Goye geng'ha ga heni, mizilo ja Musa na gandichigwe kuli vitabu vya waloli na zabuli.”
Na baho Yesu kawagubulila luhala yogana wavizele Maandiko Matakatifu
Nakawalonjela, “Yandichigwa hino, Kilistu Mlohozi kogazigwa na zuwa lya kadatu kozilipuka.
Na baho iganigwa kwa itagwa lya heye isi zeng'ha kulawa Yelusalemu zidamuligwe mbuli zinojile kota wanhu wanguganigwa kumgalamchila Nguluwi na Nguluwi kowosela gehile ga hewo.
Na hemwe mokwimilila mbuli azo, na azo ziganigwa mkazilavile ulolezi.
Na Heni baha ndowegalila yula Mhaza nayalagane na hetwe komlajiza, ila mbeteze mbaka homchigalilwa mong'ho kulawa kilanga.”
Yolawa kawalongoza hafungo ha muji mbaka Besania, na heye kenula mhoko gake kuchanya na kawatambichiza.
Loyawawichile moko na kuatambichiza, kawaleka, kaholigwa kuluta kilanga.
Na hewo wamfugamila wahiluka Yelusalemu, wawele wasangalale ng'hatu,
Wekala kuli luga lwa ng'handa ya Nguluwi womtogola Nguluwi, mhela weng'ha.
Aho mwaluko kwali na yumwe yochemigwa Luzi, na heye luzi yali hamwe na Nguluwi, na heye Luzi yali Nguluwi.
Kulawa mwaluko Luzi yali hamwe na Nguluwi.
Kwa kukolela heye, vinhu vyengha navilumbigwa. Kuduhu chinhu ne chimwe chilumbigwe kuduhu heye.
Heye nayali mwaluko wa ukomu, na auno ukomu wali lumuli lwa wanhu.
Na lumuli alo lwangumwesela kutitu, na ako kutitu kulemwela kuusuma.
Nguluwi nakamlajiza munhu yumwe, itagwa lyake Yohani.
Ayo nakoya yawalonjele wanhu weng'ha mbuli za alo lumuli, wanhu weng'ha wahuliche ulonzi wa heye na wakunde.
Heye hawele alo lumuli, ila nakoya hela kuwalonjela wanhu mbuli ya alo lumuli.
Alu ndo lumuli lwa kukomya ng'hatu, lumuli lulinguya kuli isi na kuwamulichila wanhu weng'ha.
Lelo Luzi yali mu isi, na kukolela heye Nguluwi nakalumba isi, ila wanhu wa isi nahawamkundile heye.
Nakoya hali isi ya heye yuye, ila wanhu wali hali isi hake hawambochele.
Ila wala wanhu wambochele na wamkundile, nakawapa ludali lwa kuwa wana wa Nguluwi.
Hawali wana wa Nguluwi kwa nyhala za chiwunhu, kahi kwa ludali lwa lukuli na ligano lya munhu, ila kwa heye yawaditile wana wa Nguluwi kwa danda ya heye.
Na heye luzi kawa munhu na kikala kwa hetwe. Na hetwe tuwona ukulu wa heye, ukulu wa heye yawele Mwana yaliyeka wa Mhaza, kamema isungu na kukomya.

Yohani nakawalonjela wanhu mbuli ya heye, nayali yochemelela yolonga, “Ayu ndo ndalindilonga hala hondonjile, ‘Kanguya munhu yumwe hambele hangu, yawele mkulu kwa heni, kwa vila nayalibaha heni sinavumbuka.’”
Kwa winji wa isungu lyake, hetwe tweng'ha tubochela kunoga kwa heye.
Nguluwi katupa Malajizo kukolela Musa, ila Yesu Kilistu katugalila kunoga kwa heye na kukomya.
Kuduhu munhu yamuwene Nguluwi mhela woneche ula. Mwanage yaliyeka, yewhanile na Nguluwi, yawele hamwe na Mhaza, ayo ndo yatuditile tumzele Nguluwi.
Na awu ndo ulolezi Yohani nayaulavile mhela vilongozi wa Wayahudi kula Yelusalemu loyawalajize watambika wa Walawi kwa heye wamuuze, “Hegwe kwa whaani?”
Yohani nahalemile kwidichila goyauzigwe, ila heye kalonga yodamla, “Heni siwele Kilistu Mlohozi.”
Baho wamuuza, Lelo, hegwe kwa whaani? Hegwe uli Eliya?
Kawedichila, Hebu. Heni siwele Eliya!
Wamuuza, Lelo hegwe kwa Mloli?
Heye kedichila, Hebu!
Ahyo wamuuza, “Lelo kwa whaani? Kwangulonga ndaze kwa hegwe gwegwe? Tulonjele leka tuwahilusile ko kowutulajize goukwidichila.”
Yohani kawedichila, “Heni ndo yula mloli Isaya yalonjile mbuli za heye kuta,
‘Lizi lya munhu lyanguhulikwa hagunuche,
mgongomanyileni Mkulu nzila ya heye!’”
Awo wanhu wali watumigwa na chikundi chichemigwe Mafalisayo.
Hamba wamuuza Yohani, “Wone hegwe huli Kilistu Mlohozi na huwele Eliya na huwele mloli wa Nguluwi, lelo Iekachoni kwangubatiza wanhu?”
Yohani nakedichila, “Heni ndangubatiza kwa mazi, ila hali hemwe kabaho yumwe yo hamzelele.
Kulawa heni kanguya yunji hambele hangu, na heni siganigwa hebu kudohola ng'hweso za makwamba ga heye.”
Geng'ha aga nagalawila akula Besania, kumwambu kwa lwanda lwa Yolodani, Yohani koyali yobatiza wanhu.
Mitondo iyage, Yohani nakamona Yesu yokuya koyali, kata, Mlole, “Mwanaing'holo lya Nguluwi, yalingusa gehile ga wanhu wa isi yeng'ha!
Ayu ndo munhu nandonjile mbuli za heye hala hondonjile, ‘Kanguya munhu kumbele kwa heni, yawele mkulu kwa heni, kwa vila nayalibaha heni sinavumbuka!’
Heni hano nasimzelele, ila mbuya kuwabatiza kwa malenga leka wanhu wa Izilaeli wamzele.”
Yohani kalavya ulolezi wa heye kalonga, “Nandimona Muhe Yelile yodulika kota ng'hunda kulawa kilanga ikwima kumutwi kwa heye.

Heni nasimzelele, ila yula Yanhumile heni ndiwabatize wanhu kwa malenga nakandonjela, ‘Munhu yula youmona Muhe Yelile yomlagalila kulawa kilanga na kikala mchanya hake, ayu ndo yobatiza kwa Muhe Yelile.’
Heni ndimona na kukunda kuta ayu ka Mwana wa Nguluwi.”
Hamitondo, Yohani yali yemile na Walanguswa wa heye weli.
Vyowamuwene Yesu yokola, kalonga, “Mlole! Ayu ndo Mwanaing'holo wa Nguluwi!”
Awala walanguswa weli nawamhulika Yohani yolonga ago, wamuwinza Yesu.
Lelo Yesu nakahinduka, na loyawawene awo walanguswa womuwinza heye, kawauza, “Mwangupala choni?”
Hewo nawedichila, “Labi, kwangikala kohi?” (Labi mina yake mlangusa).
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Muye, na hemwe mohona.” Hewo walanguswa wamuwinza, wahona honhu hoyali ngikala, wawasa na heye zuwa alyo. Yali ifichile saa kumi matinazo.
Andeleya, mng'holoze Simoni Petili, yali yumwe wa awo weli wamhuliche Yohani yolonga ago, ahyo wamuwinza Yesu.
Andeleya vyoyamfichile mkulugwe, Simoni, kamlonjela, “Tumona Kilistu Mlohozi.”
Hamba kamwigala Simoni kwa Yesu.
Na heye Yesu kamlola Simoni, nakamlonjela, “Itagwa lyako ni Simoni mwana Yohani. Ila kulawa sambi kochemigwa Kefa.” Chigiliki itagwa Petili lilinguzeleka kota italawe.
Zuwa liyage Yesu nakalapa yalute Galilaya. Kamfika Filipo nakamlonjela, “Umbinze.”
Filipo yali mwenyeng'haye wa Betisaida, muji yoyalingikala Andeleya na Petili.
Na heye Filipo nakamfika Natanaeli, nakamlonjela, “Natumona munhu Musa yamwandiche mchitabu cha Malajizo, na waloli, Yesu mwana wa Yusufu, wa Nazaleti.”
Natanaeli kamuza Filipo, “Ahi chinhu chinojile choweza kulawa Nazaleti?”
Filipo kamwidichila, “Uye ulole.”
Yesu vyowamuwene Natanaeli yokuwa kwa heye, kasima mbuli za heye zeng'ha, nakawalonjela, “Mlole, ayu ndo Muizilaeli ng'hatu, kuduhuli udesi mgati mwake.”
Natanaeli kamuuza Yesu kalonga, “Kunzela ndaze heni?”
Yesu nakamwidichila, “Nandikona ahala nalowikale hasi hali igodi lya msada, lonaung'hali chemigwa na Filipo nandikona.”
Natanaeli kedichila, Mlangusa, hegwe ndo Mwana wa Nguluwi! Kahi uli Mndewa wa Izilaeli.
Yesu nakamlonjela Natanaeli kalonga, “Kwangukunda kwa vila ndikulonjela nandikona hasi hali igodi lya msada? Kogona makulu kusinda aga.”
Yesu nakalutilila kuwalonjela hewo kalonga, “Ndanguwalonjela ndikomya, mokona kilanga kugubuka na wahilisi wa kilanga wa Nguluwi wokwina na kudulika ha Mwana wa Munhu.”
Zuwa lya kadatu kwali na mnvina ya munhu yohesa ako Kana Galilaya, na mayake Yesu yali baho.
Heye Yesu yali yalalikwe kuli mnvina ya kuhesa hamwe na walanguswa wa heye.
Divai vyoimalile, mayake Yesu kamlonjela mwanage kalonga, “Wahela divai.”
Yesu nakamwidichila mayake kalonga, “Mamo lekachoni ulingundonjela mbuli ino, mhela wa heni hainoya.”
Mayake Yesu nakawalonjela wakolamijito kalonga, “Choyowalonjela kukola, mkole hihyo.”
Baho kwali na mibiga sita ja maganga, ibiga limwe lyali lihega kuwika madebe meli au gadatu. Jali jiwichigwe aho kwa mbuli ya kihendo cha Wayahudi cha kihovuga.
Yesu nakawalonjela awala wanhu wali wotanza ahala honhu kalonga, “Mjele malenga aji mbiga jimeme.” Wawika malenga mli mibiga mbaka jimema.
Hamba kawalonjela, “Lelo deheni mumgalile mkulu wa mvina aino.”
Mkulu wa mnvina nakagajeza ago malenga gagaluche kuwa divai. Heye nahavizelele koilawile, ila wala vitumagwa wadehile gala malenga nawavizela. Mkulu wa mvina kamchema mkasano,
nakamlonjela, “Chila munhu kagugongomanya Divai inojile ilongole, na wone wanhu wawe wagalile, ndo kangulavya aila ihile. Leka hegwe kuwika ujimbi inojile mbaka sambi!”
Yesu nakadita ulajilo awu wa mwaluko ako Kana, mli isi ya Galilaya. Ako nakalajila ukulu wa heye, na walanguswa wa heye wamkunda.
Ago logapulute, Yesu nakadulika hamwe na mamo wa heye, wang'holoze na walanguswa wa heye. Waluta Kapanaumu, kula nawekala kwa mazuwa mado.
Mnvina ng'hulu ya Pasaka ya Wayahudi yali habehi. Ahyo Yesu nakaluta Yelusalemu.
Loyenjille mli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, nakawafika wanhu woguza misenga na ming'holo na ng'hunda, na kwali wanhu wanji wali wovunza sendi wachikale muli visanya jawo.
Baho kabota ng'hobwa ya isali, kaluka kuwawinga wanhu weng'ha na misenga na ming'holo jawo hanze ha Ng'handa ya Nguluwi. Kagwisa visanya ja awala wavunza sendi na kuboholanga sendi zawo.
Nakawalonjela wala waweleguza ng'hunda kalonga, “Muuse vinhu avi aha. Mleche kugalula ng'handa wa Mhaza wa heni kuta soko!”
Awala walanguswa wakumbuchila Maandiko Matakatifu gangulonga, “igano lyangu kwa ng'handa ya hegwe kong'hopola.”
Wayahudi wamwe nawamuuza Yesu, “Kodita chinduza nduza chachi, kutulajila kuta kwanayo hachi ya kudita aga?”
Yesu nakawedichila kawalonjela, “Beneni ng'handa ino ya Nguluwi na heni ndoizenga kwa mazuwa gadatu.”
Wayahudi nawalonga, “Ng'handa ayi ya Nguluwi naizenjigwa kwa mihela makumi gane na sita. Hegwe koizenga ndaze kwa mazuwa gadatu hela?”
Ila ng'handa yali yolonga Yesu yali lukuli lwake.
Loyazilpuche kulawa koyatiligwe, awala walanguswa wakumbuchila nagoyalonjile Yesu. Ahyo nawakunda Maandiko Matakatifu na luzi loyalonjile Yesu.
Yesu loyalutile Yelusalemu kuli mnvina ya Pasaka, wanhu wenji nawamkunda wawene ulajilo wa vinduzanduza vyoyaditile.
Ila Yesu hali yowakunda kwa vila nakawazela weng'ha.
Nahaviganile kulonjelwa choneche kuli mbuli za wanhu kwa vila nakagazela goya galimgati mwa nhumbula za hewo.
Kwali na Mkulu yumwe wa Wayahudi, itagwa lyake lyali Nikodemo. Mkulu ayu nayali mli chilundo cha Mafalisayo.

Nechilo imwe nakaluta kwa Yesu na kumuuza, “Mlangusa, tuvizela kota hegwe uli mlangusa yatumigwe na Nguluwi, kwa vila kuduhu munhu yolajila viduzanduza kota vyoudita hegwe wone hawele na ludali lya Nguluwi.”
Yesu nakedichila, “Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, kuduhu munhu yowona Undewa wa Nguluwi mbaka yavumbuche lwa keli.”
Nikodemo nakauza, “Yowa ndaze munhu mkulu yavumbuche lwa keli? Hambi koweza kwinjila kuli munda wa mayake ndo yavumbuche lwa keli!”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, kuduhu munhu yokwinjila kuli Undewa wa Nguluwi wone havumbuche kwa malenga na kwa Muhe Yelile.
Munhu kovumbuka chilukuli na Mhaza wa heye na mayake, ila kovumbuka kwa Muhe Yelile.
Uleche kijesa vyondikulonjele kota igana mvumbuche lwa keli.
Mbeho iputaga kweng'ha kota vyoilingugana, hegwe kohulika lizi vyoidita, ila kowa huvizelele kota kohi koulawila na kohi kouluta. Ahi ndo vyoili kwa munhu yaleligwe kwa Muhe Yelile.”
Nikodemo nakamuuza, “Mbuli azi zowa ndaze?”
Yesu nakedichila, “Hegwe uli mlangusa mkulu ahano Izilaeli ila hugazelele agano?
Ndangukulonjela ndikomya, twangulonga agala tugazelele na twangulonga ulolezi kwa agala tugawene, ila kuduhu munhu yowakola lupichi kubochela aga tutumigwe.
Wone hamkundile hondiwalonjele mbuli za isi ino, hambi mokunda ndaze hondiwalonjela mbuli za kilanga?
Kuduhu munhu yalutile kilanga ila heye Mwana wa Munhu, yaduliche kulawa kilanga.”
Kota vila Musa vyowenule izoka lya shaba akula kugunuche, hiho yowa kuli Mwana wa Munhu kokwinuligwa kuchanya,
leka munhu yoneche yomkunda yawe na ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma.
Nguluwi nakawagana wanhu wa isi, mbaka kamigala Mwanage yaliyeng'ha leka chila munhu yomkunda yaleche kubagama ila yawe na ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma.
Nguluwi hamwigale Mwanage kuli isi leka yawataguse wanhu, ila kamigala yawalohole.
Munhu yoneche yamkundile Yesu kahela utaguso, ila munhu yohomkunda, mina katagusigwa, kwavila kalema kumkunda Mwana yaliyeng'ha wa Nguluwi.
Utaguso awo ndo uno. Lumuli luya kuli isi yeng'ha ila wanhu nawagana kutitu woleka lumuli, kwa vila madito gawo geha.
Chila munhu yalingudita gehile kangulema lumuli, nahokuya kuli lumuli mina halingugana gehile ga heye goneche.
Leka munhu yoneche yalingudita ga kukomya galingumnojeza Nguluwi koyaga kuli lumuli, leka madito ga heye goneche gaditigwa kwa kumtogola Nguluwi.
Kumala kwa ago, Yesu nakafika mkoa wa Yudeya hamwe na walanguswa wa heye. Nakekala ako hamwe na hewo hado, yowabatiza wanhu.
Yohani na heye yali yobatiza wanhu ako Ainoni, behi na Salemu, mina ako kwali na malenga menji. Wanhu nawaluta kwa heye, na heye nakawabatiza.
Muhela awo Yohani nayang'hali hindilwa mchinwengho.
Kitwanza nakulawila hagati kwa wamwe wa walanguswa wa Yohani na Myahudi yumwe kuli chihendo cha kihovuga leka wamlande Nguluwi.

Walanguswa awo nawamlutila Yohani na kumlonjela, “Mlangusa, yula munhu yawele hamwe na hegwe kumwambu kwa Yolodani, na hegwe ulonjile mbuli za heye, sambi na heye kangubatiza, na wanhu weng'ha wanguluta kwa heye!”
Yohani nakamlonjela, “Munhu howeza kuwa na chinhu wone hapeligwe kulawa kilanga.
Na hemwe namwe moweza kulavya ulolezi kota nandonga, ‘Heni siwele Kilistu Mlohozi, ila nhumigwa leka ndimlongole!’
Mkasano wa heye mzenjele, ila mganwa wa mzenjele, yalingwima na kuhulichiza, kasechelelaga hoyohulika mzenjele yolonga. Ndo usangalalo wa heni vyowenele.
Imgana heye yazidi kuwa na ukulu, na heni ndiwe mdodo.”
Munhu yawele nguya kulawa kilanga ka mkulu kwa weng'ha, yalingulawa kuli isi ndo wa isi, na hulongaga mbuli za isi. Ila yalinguya kulawa kilanga mkulu kusinda weng'ha.
Heye kalongaga gala goyawene na kugahulika, ila kuduhu ne munhu yalingukunda usenga wa heye.
Ila munhu yoneche yalingukunda usenga wa heye kangukangaza kuta Nguluwi kangukomya ng'hatu.
Yula yatumigwe na Nguluwi kangulonga ulonzi wa Nguluwi, mina Nguluwi kampaga munhu Muhe wa heye kulihela mmbaka.
Mhaza kangumgana Mwana wa heye na kangumpa vinhu vyeng'ha mmoko mwake.
Yalingumkunda Mwana kanawo ukomu wa mazuwa gose, yohambe yamkunde Mwana howa na ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma, na heye kopona kuli kuzudila kwa Nguluwi.
Mafalisayo nawahulika kota, Yesu kangikala yowapata na kuwabatiza walanguswa wenji kusinda Yohani.
Heye Yesu nayali hambe yabatize wanhu, walanguswa ndo wali wobatiza wanhu.
Yesu vyoyahuliche ago gowaliwolonga wanhu, koka Yudeya nakahiluka Galilaya.
Loyali yoluta mnzila naimgana yakolele Samaliya.
Lelo loyafichile Sukali, muji umwe wa Samaliya, habehi na mgunda wa Yakubu nayampele mwanage Yusufu.
Honhu aho hali na ideho lya Yakubu. Yesu vyoyali yatochile kujenda, kekalisa hanyi hafungo ha ideho. Yali iluta saa sita nemisi.
Baho koya mdala wa Samaliya kudeha malenga. Yesu nakamlonjela, “Umhe malenga ning'hwe.”
Mhela awo walanguswa wa heye nawaluta kuli muji kugula ndiya.
Yula mdala Msamalia nakalonga, “Hegwe kwa Myahudi na heni nda Msamaliya, iwa ndaze kwangundanda malenga ga kung'hwa?” Kwa vila Wayahudi na wasamaliya hawahangaga vinhu.
Yesu nakamwidichila, “Hegwe na uvizele choyokupa Nguluwi, na munhu wachi yalingukulanda malenga, na wahamlandile heye malenga galingigala ukomu nayahakupele.”
Mdala yula kamuuza, “Mkulu, hegwe kwahela chinhu cha kudehela malenga, na ideho liluta hasi lukami, kogapata kohi malenga ga ukomu?
Hambi hegwe kwa mkulu kusinda mhaza wa hetwe Yakubu yatupele ideho lino, heye kang'hwa malenga gano na wanage na misenga jake?”
Yesu nakedichila, “Wanhu weng'ha walingung'hwa malenga aga, woza ngona ng'halu kahi,
ila munhu yong'hwa malenga ga heni hokona ng'halu ne hado. Malenga gowa nzasa imwigalila malenga ga ukomu. Kahi gompa ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma.”
Ayula mdala kamlonjela Yesu, “Mkulu, umhe heni ago malenga ndeche kuyona ng'halu iyage na ndoleka kuya ahano kudeha malenga.”
Yesu nakamlonjela ayula mdala, “Ulute kamcheme mlume wa hegwe uye naye ahano.”
Ayula mdala nakamwidichila, “Ndahela mlume.”
Yesu nakedichila, “Nakukomya vyoulonjile kwahela mlume.
Nakuholigwa na walume wahano, na mlume ulingikala naye sambi hawele mlume wa hegwe. Goulonga kukomya.”
Yula mdala nakamlonjela, “Mkulu, ndangukona hegwe kwa mloli wa Nguluwi.
Wasekulu wa hetwe wali wotambichiza Nguluwi kuli chidunda chino, ila hemwe Wayahudi mwangulonga Yelusalemu ndo honhu ha kutambichiza Nguluwi.”
Yesu nakamlonjela yula mdala, “Mdala ukunde gondilonga, mhela wanguya wanhu howomtambichiza Nguluwi kuli chidunda chino au kula Yelusalemu.
Hemwe Wasamaliya hamzelele yalikohi wa kumtambichiza, ila hetwe Wayahudi tumzela yalikohi wa kumtambichiza, kwa vila ulohozi wolawa kwa Wayahudi.
Ila mhela wanguya nawabaha ufika, walingutambichiza wokomya, womtambichiza Mhaza wolongozwa kwa Muhe Yelile na kukomya.
Nguluwi ndo Muhe. Ahyo wanhu walingumtambichiza, wamtambichize kwa kulongozwa kwa Muhe na kukomya.”
Mdala nakamlonjela Yesu hino, “Ndivizela kota Masiha yochemigwa Kilistu Mlohozi kokuya. Hoyokuya, kotulonjela hetwe mbuli zeng'ha.”
Yesu nakamwidichila, “Heni ndo nene ndilingulonga na hegwe!”

Baho du, walanguswa nawahiluka, wabubuwala vyowamfichile Yesu yolonga na mdala. Ila kwali kuduhu ne yumwe yamuuzile ayula mdala kota, “Kwangugana choni?” Nakumuuza Yesu, “Ndaze kwangulonga na ayu mdala?”
Hamba ayula mdala nakaleka chiya cha malenga, kahiluka kuluga kuwalonjela wanhu,
Muye mlole, munhu yandonjele heni geng'ha gong'holile, kowa yawele Kilistu Mlohozi?
Baho wanhu nawoka kuli muji nawaluta koyali Yesu.
Mhela wuwo walanguswa wali womdedeza Yesu, “Mlangusa, ulye chilyo.”
Ila heye nakawedichila, “Ndina chilyo cha kulya cho hamchizelele hebu.”
Walanguswa nawaluka kiwuza hewo waliyeka, “Hambi kwali na munhu yamigalile chilyo?”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Chilyo cha heni chowa kudita vyoyaganile heye yanhumile na kukola mbuli zoyalajize.
Vyomzowele kulonga, ‘Jinghali miyezi jine hela mhela wa mbena.’ Ila ndangukulonjelani mlole goya kuli migunda, vilyo vikangala goya kubenigwa.
Ayula yokola mijito ya mbena, kowa yopegwa sendi, na kukungajiza chilyo kuli ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma, yumwe yonyala na yumwe yobena, weng'ha wowa wosechelela hamwe.
Kwa vila ulonzi awu ukomya, yumwe konyala na yumwe kobena.
Ndiwalajiza hemwe mkabene kuli migunda johamkolile mijito, wanji wochitunya hala na hemwe mohola hela.”
Wasamalia kuli muji ula nawamkunda Yesu kota ayula mdala vyoyawalonjele, “Kandonjela geng'ha gonditile.”
Wasamalia vyowoyile kwa Yesu, nawamdedeza yekale na hewo. Yesu kekala na hewo mazuwa meli.
Wanhu wenji ng'hatu nawakunda kwa mbuli ya usenga wa Yesu.
Wamlonjela ayula mdala, “Hetwe hambe tukunde hela kwa mbuli ya ulonzi wa hegwe, ila hetwe twetwe tumhulika na tuvizela kota ayu ndo Mlohozi wa isi yeng'ha.”
Lowekale mazuwa meli, Yesu koka aho kaluta Galilaya.
Kwa vila Yesu nakatawiza, “Mloli hatogolagwa hebu kuli isi ya heye.”
Lelo, vyowafichile Galilaya, wanhu ahala wambochela, kwa vila nawo nawaluta kuli mnvina ya Pasaka, nawagona geng'ha gowaditile ako Yelusalemu kuli mnvina ila.
Yesu nakafika kahi ako Kana iwele Galilaya, konayagalule malenga gawa divai. Kwali na mkulu wa wamizi mloma, yali na mwana mtamwa ako Kapanaumu.
Lelo, mkulu ayo wa isi loyahuliche Yesu koya yolawila Yudeya mbaka Galilaya, kaluta kumlanda yamlohole mwanage msongolo yawele mtamwa lajilaji.
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Kuduhu munhu ne yumwe, yokunda mbaka yavyone vinduzanduza na ulajilo.”
Ayula mkulu wa undewa wa isi nakamlonjela Yesu, “Mkulu, dedede, tulute himahima mwanangu hanabagama.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Ulute kaye komfika mwanago yawele mkomu.”
Ayula munhu nakakunda goyalonjile Yesu, koka kaluta kaye.
Vyoyali yoluta mnzila kuza kaye, kating'hana na vitumagwa wa heye, nawamlonjela, mwanago mkomu.
Heye nakawauza, wali mhela wachi?
Nawamlonjela, “Yali ifichile saa saba nemisi, utamwa lowaluche kumlechela.”
Baho ayula mkulu nakakumbuchila yali ndo mihela jijila Yesu vyoyamlonjele kota, “Mwanago kowa mkomu.” Baho ivyazi lyake nawakunda goyalonjile Yesu.
Achi chali chinduzanduza cha keli Yesu yalajile vyoyalawile Yudeya kuluta Galilaya.
Vyogamalile ago Yesu nakaluta Yelusalemu. Na ako kwali na mnvina ya Wayahudi.
Ako Yelusalemu habehi na chihindilo chikulu luchemigwa Chihindilo cha ming'holo, kwali na izimbo na hafungo hake hali na vibumuli vihano, waebulaniya wali wochema Betizata.
Na mumo mvibumuli mwali na watamwa wenji wawasile habehi na hali vibumuli, vipofu na wali chete na waziliche lukuli, wekale wobeteza malenga gatiguligwe.
Kwa vila mhilisi wa Nguluwi kawaga yokuya na kwinjila mli malenga na kugatigulanga na heye yokwaluka kwinjila, kawaga yaloholigwe.
Baho kwali na munhu yumwe mtamwa, yekale yotamika mihela makumi gadatu na nane.
Yesu vyoyamuwene munhu ayula yatambalize baho, kavizeela kota yaliyokugula kulawa katali. Ahyo nakamuuza, “Ndaze, kwangugana uwe mkomu?”
Ayula mtamwa nakedichila, “Mkulu, ndahela munhu ahano wa kunyasula wanhumbuchize mchihengo cha izimbo malenga ho gatiguche. One njeze kwinjila, munhu yunji kangulongola.”
Yesu nakamwidichila, kamlonjela, “Winuche uhole mcheka wa hegwe ujende.”
Baho du, ayula mtamwa kawa mkomu, kahola mcheka wa heye kaluka kujenda.
Mbuli ayi na ikoleka zuwa lya kwesela.
Wayahudi wamwenga, wamlonjela yula munhu yaloholigwe, “Lehano ndo zuwa lya kwesela haiwa goya kupika lutenvu lwako.”
Munhu yaloholigwe nakawedichila, “Munhu yanditile hino kandonjela nyhole lutenvu lwangu njende.”
Wamuuza heye wata, “Yalikohi yakulonjele hegwe widwiche lutenvu lwako ujende?”
Heye nahamzelele munhu yamlohole, kwa vila Yesu yali yochile honhu hala, na baho kwali na lung'hongola lwa wanhu.
Hamba Yesu nakamfika ayula munhu yaloholigwe mli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, na kumlonjela, “Uhulichize sambi kwa mkomu, uleche kudita gehile kahi, uleche kufichigwa na mbuli ihile lukami.”
Hamba ayula munhu kaluta kuwalonjela wakulu wa Wayahudi, nakawalonjela Yesu ndo yaditile hino.
Hamba wakulu wa Wayahudi waluka kumonela fihi Yesu, kwa vila nakadita mbuli ayo kuli zuwa lya kwesela.
Yesu nakawedichila kawalonjela kata, “Mhaza wa heni kangukola mijito mazuwa gose, na heni ndangudita hiho.”

Kwa mbuli ya ulonzi awo, wakulu wa Wayahudi walutilila kupala nzila ya kugana kumkopola, hawali kwa vila nakabena mlongo weka wa zuwa lya kwesela, ila akula kulonga Nguluwi wali Mhaza wa heye, na ahyo kedita heye kota Nguluwi.
Yesu nakawedichila, “Ndangulonga ndikomya, Mwana hokola chila chinhu yaliyeka, koweza kudita chila choyodita Mhaza, kwa vila choyodita Mhaza, Mwana kodita hihila.
Mhaza kangumgana mwanage na komlajila chila chinhu chowodita Mhaza, kahi komlajila mbuli ng'hulu kusinda ayi, na mweng'ha mobubuwala.
Kota vila Mhaza vyoyowazilipula wabagame na kuwapa ukomu, hihyo na heye Mwana kowapa ukomu wala walingugana.
Mhaza homtagusa munhu yoneche, mbuli yeng'ha ya utaguso kamlechela Mwana,
leka wanhu weng'ha wamdumbe Mwana, kota vyowalingumdumba Mhaza. Heye wali hambe wamdumbe Mwana halingumdumba Mhaza yamtumile.
“Ndangulonga ndikomya, heye yohulika mbuli ya heni, na kukunda ga heye Yanhumile kowanawo ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma. Hotagusigwa hebu, kowa yalochile kulawa kuli kubagama kwinjila kuli ukomu.
Ndangulonga ndikomya, mhela wanguya na mina ufika, aho awala wabagame wohulika lizi ya Mwana wa Nguluwi, na hewo woihulika wowa na ukomu.
Kota vila Mhaza yawele kwaluka kwa ukomu, hihyo kahi vyoyomtogola mwanage yawele mwaluko wa ukomu.
Nakamwigalila mwanage ludali lwa kutagusa, kwa vila yawele Mwana wa Munhu.
Mleche kuta ndangudeta, mina mhela wanguya weng'ha wabagame woihulika lizi lya heye Nguluwi.
Na hewo wozilipuka kulawa kowabagame, na awala waditile ganojile, wozilipuka na kuwa wakomu, na awala waditile gehile wozilipuka na kutagusigwa.
“Heni sidaha kudita cheng'ha chila, ndangutagusa kota vyonyuliche kwa Mhaza, na utaguso wa heni unoga, kwa vila silingudita vyondigana heni, ila vyoyogana heye Yanhumile.”
“Wone ndichinojeza ndiliyeka, wanhu howokunda ago gondonjile kuta ndikomya.
Ila kabaho yumwe yolovya ulolezi wa heni, na heni ndivizela kuta geng'ha goyolonga kwa heni kakomya.
Hemwe na mlajiza usenga kwa Yohani na ulolezi wa heni yoyalonjile kakomya.
Heni silingitumbila ulolezi wa wanhu, ila ndagulonga mbuli zino leka mloholigwe.
Yohani yali kota chenje chikwaka na kumulika na hemwe namwimilila kusechelela alo lumuli kwa mhela udo.
Ila heni ndangilavila ulolezi kwa mbuli ya heni loyali mkulu ng'hatu kusinda ula wa Yohani. Kwa vila mbuli zondilingukola, mbuli zoyamhele Mhaza ndite, azo zangulajila kota Mhaza ndo yanhumile.
Na heye Mhaza yanhumile kangulavya ulolezi. Hemwe hamnahulika lizi lya heye, ne kumona kumeho.
Usenga wa hemwe haulingikala mgati mwa hemwe mina mlema kumkunda yula yanhumile.
Hemwe mgalolaga goya Maandiko Matakatifu mchijesa kota mgati mwake mopata ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma, na aku Gandichigwe gago gangulavya ulolezi wa mbuli za heni.
Lelo, hemwe mwangulema kuwa kwa heni leka muwe na ukomu.
“Silingupala kutogoligwa na munhu.
Ila nandiwazela hemwe, ndivizela kota hemwe hamlingumgana Nguluwi.
Heni mbuya kwa ludali lwa Mhaza wa heni, ila hambochele. Ila munhu yunji loyokuya kwa ludali lwake, mombochela.
Mokunda ndaze hanga hemwe mwangugana kutogoligwa hemwe kwa hemwe baho, na hamlingupala kutogoligwa na heye yawele yeka Nguluwi?
Mleche kijesa kota heni ndoyowalonjeleza kwa Mhaza. Musa yomlingitumbila ndo yowalonjeleza.
Wone na muwe mumkundile ng'hatu Musa, mwahang'hundile heni kahi, kwa vila Musa nakandika mbuli za heni.
Wone hamlingukunda gala goyandiche Musa, hambi mokunda ndaze ulonzi wa heni?”
Ago logapulute, Yesu nakaloka ilamba lya Galilaya, au ilamba Tibeliya.
Chilundo chikulu cha wanhu nachimuwinza Yesu kwa wanhu awo wali wagawene goyalajile kwa kuwosa matamwa.
Yesu nakaluta kuchanya kuchidunda, kekalisa hanyi na walanguswa wa heye.
Mnvina ya Pasaka ya Wayahudi yali habehi.
Yesu nakalola kufungo, nakona lung'hongola lwa wanhu wokuya kuli heye. Ahyo nakamlonjela Filipo, “Kohi kotugula chilyo cha kuwagutiza wanhu weng'ha awa?”
Yesu nakalonga ahyo kwa kumjeza Filipo, kwavila nakavizela choni chowodita!
Filipo nakedichila, “Itugana tuwe na sendi denali miya mbili nyinji za kugula chilyo cha kulya wanhu weng'ha wano!”
Yumwe wa awala walanguswa, Andeleya yawele mkulugwe na Simoni Petili, nakalonga,
“Hana msongolo baha, kana mibumunda jihano na somba mbili, na vyokwila choni kwa wanhu weng'ha awa?”
Yesu nakalonga, “Namuwalonjele wanhu wekalise hanyi.” Baho wanhu weng'ha wekalisa hanyi, kwali na walume kota elufu zihano hino.
Yesu kahola ajila mibumunda, katambichiza na kawamogolela awala wanhu wekalise, kadita hihila na zila somba. Wanhu weng'ha walya kota vyowaganile mbaka weguta.
Vyowegute, Yesu nakawalonjela walanguswa, “Mlokoteze chilyo chisigale, tuleche kwajiliza chilyo ne hado.”
Walokoteza upumunizo wa mibumunda na somba, vimema vidoto kumi na vili vyowalechelele wala wanhu.
Vyowawene ulajilo wa vila vinduzanduza vyoyaditile Yesu, wanhu ahala walonga kota wakomya ayu ndo mloli wa Nguluwi yawele kuya kuli isi.
Hamba Yesu wavizelele kota wangugana yoye wamkabajize yawe mndewa vyohaviganile, baho nakoka, kaluta kahi kukula kuchidunda.
Loyali lufuku, walanguswa wa Yesu wadulika mbaka kuli ilamba.
Wakwina mli itumbwi leka waloche kuluta Kapanaumu. Nechilo injila, Yesu yali yang'hali kuwahejelela hebu.
Ilamba lyaluka kutiguka kwa vila mbeho yali iputa.
Walanguswa lowali walutile utali wa chilometa zihano au sita hino, nawamona Yesu yojenda mchanya mmalenga, yohejelela itumbwi. Nawadumba heko.
Ila Yesu nakawalonjela, “Nda heni! Mleche kudumba!”
Hamba nawagana kumwinula kumwinjiza mgati mli itumbwi, na baho itumbwi nalifika kumwambu hafungo koyali yoluta.
Mitondo, chilundo cha awala wanhu wekale hafungo mwa ilamba, na wavizela kota itumbwi limwe hela na lipona ahala honhu. Yesu nahalutile na awala walanguswa, ila walanguswa nawaluta waliyeka.
Mitumbwi jinji kulawa Tibeliya najuya honhu hala wanhu howadile mibumunda Mkulu loyasindile kumtogola Nguluwi.
Wanhu awo lowawene ahala honhu haduhuli Yesu na walanguswa wa heye, weng'ha wakwina mli ajila mitumbwi na waluta Kapanaumu kumpala Yesu.
Wanhu vyowamuwene Yesu kumwambu kwa ilamba, wamuuza, “Mlangusa, kuya nili hano?”
Yesu nakedichila, “Ndangulonga ndikomya, mwangumhala heni haiwele kwa vila vyomuwene ulajilo, ila kwa vila namulya mibumunda na miguta.

Mleche kugayila chilyo chilingola, iponile migayile chilyo chilingikala kwa mbuli ya ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma. Achi ndo chilyo choyowapani Mwana wa munhu kwa vila kahaguligwa na kukundigwa na Nguluwi Mhaza.”
Hewo nawamuuza Yesu, “Tudite choni leka tuweze kudita choyalingugana Nguluwi?”
Yesu nakawedichila, “Ayi ndo mijito yalingugana Nguluwi mdite, mumkunde yula yamlajize.”
Aho, nawamlonjela, “Kolajila chinduzanduza chachi tuchone ndo tukukunde? Kodita chinhu chachi?
Wasekulu wa hetwe nawalya tubumunda kula kugunuche, kota gandichigwe vyogalonjile, ‘Na kawalavila hewo chilyo cha kulawa kilanga walye.’”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Ndanguwalonjelani ndikomya, Musa hawapele mibumunda kulawa kilanga, Mhaza wa heni ndo yawapele hemwe mibumunda kulawa kilanga.
Libumunda lya Nguluwi, ndo ayula yodulika hasi kulawa kilanga yochigala ukomu kwa wanhu wa isi.”
Nawamlonjela wata, “Mkulu, tupegwe hetwe mibumunda mazuwa gose.”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Heni nda chilyo chilingigala ukomu. Heye yokuwa kwa heni hokona nzala hebu, na hewo wokunda ga heni wowa hela ng'halu ng'o.
Nandikulonjelani, mmbona heni ila hamlingukunda.
Weng'ha wondipegwa na Mhaza, wokuya kwa heni, na heni simtoza kunze munhu yoneche yokuya kwa heni,
kwa vila mbuya hanyi kulawa kuchanya kilanga haiwele kwa kudita kota vyondiviganile, ila kwa gala yalingugana Mhaza yanhumile.
Goyalingugana yula yanhumile ndo aga, ndeche kumwajiliza ne yumwe kwa wala yowamhele, ila ndiwazilipule hewo weng'ha zuwa lya mwiso.
Choyalingugana Mhaza, ndo achi chila yomona Mwana na kumkunda yawe na ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma, na heni ndomzilipula zuwa lya mwiso.”
Lelo, Wayahudi nawaluka kung'ung'uta kwa vila Yesu nakalonga, “Heni nda libumunda lyuyile hasi kulawa kuchanya kilanga.”
Hamba nawalonga, “Ayu munhu hawele Yesu mwanage Yusufu siyuyu? Tumzela Mhaza na mayake! Lelo yandaze yolonga heye kedulika kulawa kuchanya kilanga?”
Yesu nakedichila kawalonjela, “Mleche kung'ung'uta mwemwe kwa mwemwe.
Kuduhu munhu yokuya kuli heni, wone Mhaza yanhumile hamkwejile kuli heni, heni ndomzilipula zuwa lya mwiso.
Waloli nawandika wata, ‘Wanhu weng'ha wowa walangusigwe na Nguluwi.’ Heye yohulika ga Mhaza na yelanguse ga heye, kokuya kuli heni.
Chondilonga ndo achi, kuduhu munhu yoneche wamuwene Mhaza, ila yula yalawile kwa Nguluwi, ayo ndo yuye yeka yamuwene Nguluwi.
Ndangukulonjelani ndikomya, heye munhu yokunda kowa na ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma.
Heni nda chilyo chilingigala ukomu.
Wasekulu wa hemwe na walya chilyo chichemigwe mana akula kugunuche nawabagama.
Achi ndo chilyo chuyile kulawa kilanga, yula yolya chilyo acho hobagama hebu.
Heni nda chilyo chilingigala ukomu chiduliche kulawa kilanga, wone munhu yalye chilyo chino, kochikala lukami. Na chilyo chondimpa heni, chowa lukuli lwangu ndilulavya kuli ukomu wa wanhu wa isi.”
Baho hewo Wayahudi nawaluka kulonga longa akuno wazudile, wata, “Yowa ndaze ayu munhu yatupe lukuli lwake tulye?”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Ndanguwalonjela ndikomya, wone hamdile lukuli lwa Mwana wa Munhu, na kung'hwa danda ya heye, mowa hela ukomu mgati mwa hemwe.
Yula yolya lukuli lwangu na kung'hwa danda ya heni, kanawo ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma, heni ndomzilipula zuwa lya mwiso.
Lukuli lwangu ndo chilyo ng'hatu, na danda ya heni, ndo cha kung'hwa ng'hatu.
Yoneche yolya lukuli lyangu na kung'hwa danda ya heni, kochikala mgati mwa heni na heni mgati mwa heye.
Mhaza yali mkomu kanhuma heni, na ndamkomu kwa mbuli ya heye. Na heye yolya lukuli lwa heni, kowa na ukomu kwa heni.
Achi ndo chilyo chiduliche hanyi kulawa kilanga, hachiwhanile kota chilyo chowadile wasekulu wabagame. Ila hewo wolya achi chilyo wowa na ukomu wa mazuwa gose.”
Yesu nakalonga agano koyali yolangusa mng'handa ya kusalila ako Kapanaumu.
Walanguswa wenji nawamuwinzile Yesu nawahulika ago, walonga, “Ulanguso uno yowa ngondo kuuzela, yalikohi yoweza kuhulichiza?”
Yesu nakavizeela halonjelwe na munhu, walanguswa wa heye wali wong'ung'uta, nakawauza, “Mbuli ayi, yanguwadita hemwe mdumbe?
Hamba yowa ndaze, wone mmone Mwana wa Munhu yokwina kuza kula koyalawile?
Muhe ndo ulingigala ukomu, ludali lwa munhu luliyeng'ha haludita chinhu. Ulonzi wo ndikulonjelani, ndo Muhe wa Nguluwi na ulingigala ukomu.
Kuna yumwe mwa hemwe kowa hambe yakunde.” Yesu nakalonga hino kwa vila nakavizela koya na wanji hawokunda na yumwe komhinduka.
Wolawa aho kalonga kahi, “Ahi ndo inhumile ndiwalonjele hemwe, kuduhu munhu yokuya kuli heni mbaka yadite goyalajize Mhaza.”
Kulawa kwa ago, wenji wa walanguswa wa Yesu nawahiluka kumbele wolema kulutasa na heye kahi.
Yesu kawauza na awala kumi na weli, “Na hemwe namwe mwangugana kuka?”
Simoni Petili kamwidichila, “Mkulu, toza kwaani? Hegwe kuna ulonzi ulingigala ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma.
Hetwe twangukunda na kuvizela kota hegwe uli yumwe Yelile yalawile kwa Nguluwi.”
Yesu nakedichila, “Ndiwahagula hemwe kumi na weli, siditile hino? Lelo yumwe wa hemwe, kagaluka Limazoga!”
Yaliyolonga agala goyokola Yudasi, mwana wa Simoni Isikalioti. Kwa vila Yudasi ndo yomhinduka, hanga na yali yumwe wa awala kumi na weli.
Logamalile ago, Yesu yali yojenda ako Galilaya. Nahaganile kujenda mkoa wa Yudeya kwa vila wandewa wa Wayahudi wali wogana wamkopole.
Mnvina ya Wayahudi ya vibumuli yali habehi.
Lelo, wang'holoze Yesu nawamlonjela, “Ulawe ahano, ulute Yudeya leka walanguswa wa hegwe wazone mbuli zoulingudita.
Munhu halingudita vinhu kwa uviso wone walingugana yazeleche kwa wanhu. Kwa vila kwangudita mbuli zino, lelo, wilajile kwa isi yeng'ha
Na wang'holoze Yesu nawo hawamkundile!”
Lelo, Yesu nakawalojela, “Muhela wa heni unojile haufichile hebu, ila kwa hemwe chila mhela unoga.
Isi yeng'ha haiwazudila hemwe, ila heni yanguzudila kwa vila heni ndangulavya ulolezi wake kuta goyalingudita geha.
Hemwe mlute kuli mnvina ayo. Heni siluta hebu ako kuli mnvina, mhela wa heni unojile haufichile.”
Nakalonga ago hamba kapona kuko Galilaya.
Wang'holoze lowalutile kuli mnvina, na Yesu naye nakaluta, ila halutile hazelu nakaluta kwa uviso.
Wakulu wa Wayahudi wali wompala heye kuli mnvina ila nawauza, “Kakohi?”
Kwali na kuheha kwinji hali wanhu wala. Wamwe wa hewo nawalonga, “Kamunhu yanojile.”
Wanji nawalonga, “Hebu! Kanguwajiliza wanhu.”
Ila kwali kuduhu munhu yajezile kulonga mbuli za heye hazelu kwa kudumba wandewa wa Wayahudi.
Mnvina ila loyali ifichile hagati, Yesu naye nakaluta kuli ng'handa ya Nguluwi, nakaluka kulangusa.
Lelo, Wayahudi na wabubuwala na kulonga, “Munhu ayu kapata kohi elimu na heye halutile kusule?”
Aho Yesu nakawedichila, “Ulanguso wondilingulangusa hauwele wa heni, ila ulawa kwa yula yanhumile.
Munhu yalingugana kudita gala goyogana Nguluwi, kovizele kota ulanguso wa heni ulaya kwa Nguluwi, au heni ndangilonjela hela.
Heye yalingilonjela hela yuye kangupala kitogola yuye, ila yalingupala kumtogola yula yamtumile, ayo wa kitumbila, na mgati mwake mwahela wihe woneche ula.
Ndaze, Musa hawapele utaguso? Ahyo, kuduhu ne yumwe wa hemwe yalinguwinza mizilo. Iekachoni mwangugana kung'hopola?”
Aho wanhu nawamwidichila, “Kuna chijeni hegwe yalikohi yalingugana yakukopole?”
Yesu nakawedichila, “Kuna mbuli imwe yonditile, na hemwe mwangububuwala.
Musa nakawapa chila chihendo cha kwinjiza ikumbi. Na chihendo acho hachilawile kwa Musa. Ila na vilawa kwa wasekulu. Sambi hemwe mwangwinjiza munhu ikumbi kuli zuwa lya kwesela.
Hino lelo, munhu kenjizagwa ikumbi kuli zuwa lya kwesela, ila yolema malajizo ga Musa galeche kubezigwa, mbona mwangunzudila kwa vila ndimdita munhu yawe mkomu ng'hatu zuwa lya kwesela?
Mleche kutagusa mbuli kwa kulola kunze hela, lavyeni utaguso utanganiche.”
Wamwe wa wanhu wa Yelusalemu nawalonga, “Ndaze, yula munhu walingumpala wamkopole hawele yuyu?
Mlole sambi! Kanguwakanya hazelu, na kuduhu munhu yalingumlonjela ne chinhu. Ndaze, iwa kota vilongozi wa wamzela ng'hatu ayu ndo Kilistu Mlohozi?
Kilistu Mlohozi hoyokuya kuduhu munhu yovizela honhu yalawile, ila hetwe tuvizela koyalawile munhu yuno.”

Lelo, Yesu vyoyali yolangusa kuli ng'handa ya Nguluwi kakwiniza lizi na kulonga, “Hambi mvizela. Na kondawile mvizela! Ahyo, suyile kwa ludali lyangu heni baha, ila heye yanhumile heni ndo wakukomya, na hemwe hamzelele.
Ila heni ndimzela kwa vila ndawa kwa heye, na heye ndo yanhumile.”
Lelo, wanhu na wagana kumibata, ila kuduhu munhu yajezile kumibata kwa vila mhela wa heye hainoya hebu.
Wenji kulichila chilundo cha wanhu nawamkunda, nawalonga, “Ndaze, Kilistu Mlohozi loyokuya kodita ulajilo mkulu ng'hatu kusinda ayu?”
Mafalisayo nawawahulika wanhu woheha mbuli azo za Yesu. Lelo hewo hamwe na watambika wakulu wawalajiza wamizi wamibate.
Yesu nakalonga, “Nding'hali na hemwe mhela uchefu, hamba ndoluta kwa heye Yanhumile.
Momhala heni, ila hammbona hebu, na hala hondiwa hemwe hamfika hebu.”
Vilongozi wa Wayahudi nawalonga hewo kwa hewo, “Munhu ayu koluta kohi kotulemwela kumfika? Koluta kwa Wayahudi wasambaluche hali Wagilichi, na kuwalangusa Wagilichi?
Kana mana yachi hoyolonga, ‘Momhala ila hambona, na hala hondiwa hemwe hamfika hebu?’”
Zuwa lila lya mwiso lya mnvina ahyo yali zuwa itanganiche. Yesu nakema, kachemeleza, “Munhu yoneche yawele na ng'halu, yoye kwa heni yang'hwe.
Kota vyogolonga Maandiko Matakatifu, ‘Munhu yalingung'hunda heni, nzanda za malenga galingigala ukomu gobogoma kuli nhumbula ya heye.’”
Nakalonga ago kwa mbuli ya Muhe yawele kwa wala wamkundile heye wombochela. Muhela awo Muhe Yelile yali hanafika kwa vila Yesu yali hanapegwa ukulu na Nguluwi.
Wanhu wamwe nawamemile hala nawahulika ulonzi awo, nawalonga, “Kakomya munhu ayu ndo yula Mloli!”
Wanji nawalonga, “Ayu ndo Kilistu Mlohozi!” Ila wanji nawalonga, “Ndaze, hambi mlohozi kolawa Galilaya!
Maandiko Matakatifu gangulonga ndaze? Gangulonga, Kilistu Mlohozi kolawa lukolo lwa Daudi, kopondigwa ako Betelehemu, muji wa Daudi!”
Kwa mbuli ya Yesu nakulawila kibagula hali wanhu wala wamemile.
Wanhu wamwe nawagana kumibata ila kuduhu yajezile kumdoliza.
Hamba wala wamizi nawahiluka kwa watambika wakulu na Mafalisayo, na hewo nawauza, “Lekachoni hammigale?”
Wamizi wawedichila, “Kuduhu munhu yadahile kulonga kota heye!”
Mafalisayo yawauza, “Ndaze, na hemwe namwe kawabadani?
Ndaze, mina mmona ne chilongozi yumwe wa wanhu, au yumwe wa Mafalisayo yamkundile heye?
Ila awa wanhu hawauzelele mzilo wa Musa, wapanjilwa na Nguluwi!”
Mfalisayo yumwe yali hala, yali Nikodemo na yalutile kwa Yesu katali, heye nakawalonjela wayage,
“Ndaze, mzilo wa hetwe haulingumtagusa munhu ne kumhulika na kuvizela kangudita choni?”
Na hewo wamwidichila, “Ndaze, hegwe nagwe kulawa Galilaya? Lelo, kagakagule Maandiko Matakatifu nagwe kogona kota Galilaya hakulingulawa Mloli.”
Hamba chila munhu kaluta kaye kwake.
Yesu nakaluta kuchidunda cha Mizeituni.
Mitondo kung'hali lufuku, Yesu nakaluta kahi kuli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi. Wanhu weng'ha wammemelela, na heye kekalisa na yali yowalangusa.
Walangusa wa malajizo ga Musa na Mafalisayo nawamwigala mng'handa mdala wamwibate wodita ung'hondwa. Hamba wamuwika hagati.
Nawamlonjela Yesu, “Mlangusa, mdala ayu kebatigwa kuli ung'hondwa.
Kuli Malajizo, Musa kalajiza mdala kota ayu kanguganigwa yatowigwe na maganga mbaka yabagame. Lelo hegwe kwangulonga ndaze?”
Nawalonga hino kumjeza Yesu, wogana wapalile honhu ha kumtagusa, ila Yesu kenamiza na kukwada na chidole hasi.
Lowawele womuuza lukami, kenuka na kuwalonjela, “Yumwe wa hemwe, yawele hela gehile, yamtozele iganga lya mwaluko mdala yuno.”
Hamba kenamiza kahi, kaza kwaandika hasi.
Lowahuliche ago, waaluka kuka yumweyumwe, walongole wakulu kuli mdodo. Yesu nakapona waliyeka na ayula mdala yemile bahala.
Yesu loyenuche, nakamuuza ayula mdala, “Wakohi awala wanhu? Ndaze, haduhu ne yumwe yakutaguse kwa wihe?”
Nakedichila, “Kuduhu ne yumwe, mkulu.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Goya, na heni sikutagusa kwa wihe hebu, ila ulute uleche kudita kahi gehile.”
Yesu nakawalonjela Mafalisayo, “Heni nda lumuli lwa isi, munhu yoneche yombinza heni, hojenda kutitu, ila kowa na lumuli lwa ukomu.”
Mafalisayo nawamlonjela Yesu, “Hegwe kwangulavya ulolezi uliyeka kota kwa lumuli, awo ulolezi hulingukomya.”
Yesu nakedichila, “Hebu!,” “Wone ndilingilavila ulolezi ndiliyeka, agala gondiwalonjele ndangukomya kwa vila ndivizela kondawile na kondiluta. Hemwe hamvizelele kondawile na kondiluta.
Hemwe mwangutagusa kota wanhu vyowalingutagusa, heni silingumtagusa ne munhu.
Ila wone nhaguse, ndahataguse kwa kukomya kwa vila siwele ndiliyeng'ha kwa alino. Mhaza yanhumile kahamwe na heni.
Yandichigwa kuli Malajizo ga hemwe kota, wone wanhu weli walavye ulolezi, wowa wokomya.
Ndangilavila ulolezi ndiliyeng'ha kuta nda whaani, na heye Mhaza yanhumile kuli isi, kangulonga hihyo.”
Hewo nawamuuza Yesu, “Mhaza wa hegwe kakohi?”
Heye nakawedichila, “Hemwe hamnzelele heni wala hamzelele Mhaza wa heni?” “Wone namnzele heni, mwahamzelele na Mhaza wa heni.”

Yesu nakalonga ago vyoyaliyolangusa kuli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi, kuluhengo kowawichile vinhu vyowalavile mli isanduku lya ndolendole. Na kuduhu munhu yamibate, kwa vila mhela wa heye kibatika wali ung'hali.
Yesu kahiluchila kuwalonjela, “Ndanguka, ila hemwe mowa mmhala na mobagama na gehile genu. Kondiluta heni hemwe hamfika.”
Vilongozi wa Wayahudi nawalonga, “Kanguluta kikopola yaliyeng'ha. Mbona kangulonga, kondiluta hemwe hamfika hebu?”
Yesu nakawedichila, “Hemwe mwa wanhu wa baha hasi, heni ndawa kuchanya. Hemwe mwa wa isi ino, heni silawile isi ino.
Ndo mana ndiwalonjeleni, kota mobagama kuli gehile gomditile, na mobagama kwa gehile, wone hamlingukunda kota, ‘Heni ndo yuye.’”
Hewo wamuuza, “Hegwe kwa whaani?”
Yesu nakedichila, “Kota agala gondiwalonjeleni kulawa mwaluko!
Ndanago menji ga kulonga na ga kuwatagusa hemwe, ila heye yanhumile kangukomya. Na heni ndanguwalonjela wanhu muisi, mbuli zila hela zonyhuliche kulawa kwa heye.”
Hawavizelele kota Yesu yaliyolonga mbuli ya Mhaza.
Hamba Yesu nakalonga na hewo, “Baho hommwinula Mwana wa Munhu, movizela kota, ‘Heni Ndo Yuye’ Hamba movizela kota silingudita kwa ludali lwangu, mina ndangulonga Mhaza goyandanguse.
Na yula yanhumile heni twahamwe handechile ndiliyeng'ha kwa vila mazuwa gose ndangukola agala galingumnojeza.”
Wanhu wenji lowahuliche ago yalonjile nawamkunda.
Yesu yali yowalonjela awala Wayahudi waliwomkunda, Ndangukomya wone mkunde gondiwalangusa, mowa walanguswa wa heni ng'hatu.
Ahyo movizela kukomya, nako kukomya kowalekani hemwe milejehe.
Na hewo wamwidichila wata, “Hetwe twa ivyazi lya Ibulahimu, na hatuwele vitumagwa wa munhu yoneche. Lekachoni kwangulonga, ‘Mowa milejehe?’”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Ndangulonga ndikomya, munhu yoneche yalingudita gehile, kowa chitumagwa wa gehile.
Chitumagwa hawaga yehanzile na lukolo mazuwa gose, ila mwana kawaga wa lukolo lulula mazuwa gose.
Wone Mwana yawaleche milejehe, mowa milejehe ng'hatu.
Ndivizela kota mwa ivyazi lya Ibulahimu. Ila mwangugana mng'hopole kwa vila hamlingubochela gondilinguwalangusa.
Ndangulonga agala gondigawene kwa Mhaza wa heni, ila hemwe namwe mwangudita kota vyomlonjelwe na mhaza wa hemwe.”
Hewo nawamwidichila, “Mhaza wa hetwe Ibulahimu.”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Wone namuwe ivyazi lya Ibulahimu, mwahaditile kota vyoyaditile heye.
Geng'ha gonditile ndo kuwalonjela ga kukomya gonyhuliche kwa Nguluwi, ila hemwe mwangujeza kung'hopola. Ibulahimu haditile chinhu kota chino!
Hemwe mwangukola cho yakolile mhaza wa hemwe.”
Hewo wamlonjela wata, “Hetwe hatuwele vilokote, twanaye Mhaza yumwe hela, na heye ndo Nguluwi.”
Yesu kawalonjela, “Wone Nguluwi nayawe Mhaza wa hemwe, mwahanganile heni, kwa vila mbuya kulawa kwa Nguluwi, na sambi nda hano. Suyile kwa ludali lwangu nene, leka heye nakanhuma.
Lekachoni hamlingudaha gondilinguwalonjela? Kwa vila hambe muhulichize usenga wa heni.

Hemwe mwa wana wa mhaza wa hemwe, Limazoga, choyalingugana mhaza wa hemwe, ndo mlingugana kudita. Heye koyaluchile yali yokopola, na hemile kuli kukomya, kwa vila munhu ayu yali mdesi. Wone yalonje udesi, kangulajila kota vyoyali, hambi yali mdesi mhaza wa udesi.
Ila kwa vila heni ndanguwalonga ndikomya, ndo mina hemwe hamlingukunda.
Yalikohi yumwe mwa hemwe yolavya ulolezi kota heni ndita gehile? Wone ndilingulonga ndikomya, iwa ndaze hamlingukunda ga heni?
Munhu wa Nguluwi kahulikaga ulonzi wa Nguluwi, ila hemwe hamuwele wanhu wa Nguluwi, ndo mina hamlinguhulika.”
Wayahudi nawamliga Yesu wamuuza walonga, “Hegwe kwa Msamalia na kuna Limazoga?”
Yesu nakawedichila, “Ndahela Limazoga, ndangumtogola Mhaza wa heni, ila hemwe mwangumbeza heni.
Heni silingupala ukulu ndiliyeka, ila kuna yumwe yalingupala ukulu awo, na heye ndo mtagusa.
Ndanguwalonjela ndikomya, munhu yoneche yobochela gondilingulangusa hobagama hebu.”
Hamba Wayahudi wamlonjela wata, “Sambi twangukunda kota hegwe kuna Limazoga! Ibulahimu kabagama, na waloli nawabagama, kahi hegwe kwangulonga munhu yobochela goulangusa hobagama hebu!
Hegwe kwangidita kwa mng'hangala kusinda Mhaza wa hetwe Ibulahimu yabagame? Na waloli nawo nawabagama. Hegwe kwangidita kwa whaani?”
Yesu nakedichila, “Wone na iwe kitogola heni ndiliyeka kwali hela mbuli. Heye yotogola ga heni ndo Mhaza wa heni, ayu yomlonga kowa Nguluwi wa hemwe.
Hamumzelele heye, ila heni, ndimzela. Wone ndonje simzelele ndowa ndilonga udesi kota hemwe vyomuwele wadesi. Ndimzela na ndangukunda ulonzi wa heye.
Mhaza wa hemwe Ibulahimu nakasechelela kalyona zuwa lya kuwa kwa heni, kawona na kasangalala.”
Wayahudi nawamlonjela Yesu wata, “Ung'hali fika mihela kumi jihano. Kumonela kohi Ibulahimu?”
Yesu nakawedichila, “Ndanguwalonjela ndikomya, Ibulahimu naloyang'hali kuvumbuka, nene ndali baha.”
Hamba nawalokota maganga kumtozela Yesu, ila Yesu koka Mng'handa ya Nguluwi.
Yesu loyali yokola nakamona munhu yumwe, hambe yalole kulawa yaleleche.
Walanguswa nawamuuza, “Mlangusa! Whaani yaditile gehile, munhu ayu, au wahaza wa heye, yaleleche hambe yalole?”
Yesu nakedichila, “Mbuli ayi hailawile kwa kudita gehile ga heye, ila na kalela hambe yalole leka ludali lya Nguluwi loneche lukola mijito mgati mwa heye.
Kung'hali nemisi itugana kulutilila kukola mijito ja yula yanhumile, mina chilo changuya munhu howeza kukola mijito.
Mhela londing'hali muisi, heni nda lumuli lya isi.”
Vyoyalonjile ago, Yesu katema lite hasi kadita nhope kambakaliza yula yohambe yalole mmeho,
Nakamlonjela, “Ulute ukahovuge kumeho kuli izimbo lya Siloamu.” Aho ayula munhu kaluta kuhovuga kumeho na kahiluka yolola.
Lelo, yalingikala habehi na heye wala wamzelele kuta aho ha ulongolo yali mzunwa mlandaji, nawalonga, “Ayu hawele yula mzunwa yekalisaga na kulanda?”
Wamwe wata, “Ayu ndo heye,” Wanji nawalonga, “Hebu hawele heye, wewhana hela.”
Ila heye nakawalonjela, “Nda nene!”
Hewo nawamuuza wata, “Iwa ndaze sambi kwangulola?”

Heye nakedichila, “Yula munhu yochemigwa Yesu, nakahola nhope, kambakaliza kumeho na kundonjela, ‘Lute kihovuje kuli izimbo lya Siloamu.’ Aho heni nduta, ndizanawa, nakwaluka kulola. Kuhovuga kumeho, baho du mbona meho gangu galuka kulola.”
Hewo nawamuuza wata, “Kakohi heye?”
Nakawedichila, “Heni sivizelele!”
Hamba wanhu wamhola ayula munhu yohambe yalole, wamhilika kuli Mafalisayo.
Zuwa lila Yesu vyoyamditile ayula munhu mitope yalole, lyali zuwa lya kwesela.
Hamba Mafalisayo nawamuuza munhu ayo, wata, “Kulola ndaze?”
Heye nakawalonjela, “Kambaka nhope mmeho, na heni ndizahovuga mazi, na sambi ndangulola.”
Mafalisayo wamwe nawalonga, “Munhu ayu halawile kwa Nguluwi, mina hambe yebate Malajizo ga zuwa lya kwesela.”
Ila wamwe walonga, “Yowa ndaze munhu yawele na gehile kulajila vinduzanduza kota avino?”
Hamba nawamuuza kahi yula munhu yawele yali yohambe yalole, “Vila heye kakugubula meho, kwangulonga ndaze kuli munhu ayo?”
Heye nakawedichilla, “Heye ka mloli wa Nguluwi!”
Vilongozi wa Wayahudi, nahawakundile kuta munhu ayo yali hambe yalole tangia kalonga na sambi kangulola, mbaka wawachemile wahaza wa heye.
Wolawa, wawauza wahaza wa heye, “Ayu ndo mdodo wa hemwe mwangulonga nakalela hambe walole? Lelo kalola ndaze?”
Wahaza wa heye wedichila, “Tuvizela ayu mdodo wa hetwe, na kalela hambe walole.
Lelo kalola ndaze, hatuvizelele, kahi hatuvizelele yula wamgubule meho. Mumuuze yuye, heye ndo munhu mkulu, kochilohola yuye.”
Wahaza wa heye nawalonga ahyo, kwa vila wali wowadumba wakulu wa Wayahudi, hewo wali walongane ku munhu yoneche wovumila kuta Yesu ndo Kilistu Mlohozi kowinjigwa kunze mwa ng'handa ya kusalila.
Ndo mina wahaza wa heye walonjile, “Heye mkulu mumuuze.”

Lwa keli kahi, wamchema ayula munhu yaloholigwe na yali hambe yalole wamlonjela wata, “Wilahe kwa Nguluwi yawele na ukulu, kota kotulonjela ukomya, tuvizela kota ayula munhu yakulohole yali na gehile.”
Heye nakawedichila, “Wone yali na gehile heni sivizelele. Ila chinhu chimwe ndivizela. Ndali hambe ndole, na sambi ndangulola.”
Nawamuuza, “Kakuditila choni? Na kakugubula ndaze meho ga hegwe?”
Ayula munhu nakawalonjela, “Ndiwalonjela na hemwe hamunyhulichize, lekachoni mwangugana kuhulika kahi? Namwe mwangugana muwe walanguswa wa heye?”
Ila hewo wamliga wolonga, “Hegwe kwa mlanguswa wa heye, hetwe twa walanguswa wa Musa.
Hetwe tuvizela kuta Nguluwi nakalonga na Musa, ila munhu ayu hatuvizelele kangulawa kohi!”
Heye nakawalonjela, “Mbuli ayi ya kububuwaza! Hemwe hamzelele kalawa kohi, ila kangubula meho ga heni!
Tuvizela Nguluwi hawahulichizaga wanhu wali na gehile, ila kamhulichizaga yoneche yalingumhulichiza na magano ga heye.
Kulawa katali haina hulikwa munhu kamgubula meho ga munhu yaleleche hambe yalole.
Wone ayu munhu yawe halawile kwa Nguluwi, hali dita choneche.”
Hewo nawamwidichila wata, “Hegwe kuvumbuka na kukulila mli gehile, lelo kwangujeza kutulangusa hetwe?” Wamuwinga kulawa kuli Ng'handa ya kusalila.
Yesu vyoyahuliche wamuwinga mli Ng'handa yakusalila, kampala ayula munhu, nakumuuza, “Kwangumkunda Mwana wa Munhu?”
Ayula munhu nakedichila, “Mkulu, undonjele heye ka whaani, leka ndimkunde.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Mina kumona, na heye ndo mlingulongasa na hegwe sambi.”
Ayula munhu kalonga, “Ndangukunda Mkulu!” Na baho kamwinamila Yesu.
Yesu nakalonga, “Heni mbuya muisi kutagusa wanhu, hewo hawalingulola walole, na walingijesa wangulola waleche kulola.”
Mafalisayo wamwe wali hamwe na heye nawahulika ulonzi awo, nawamuuza wata, “Ndaze, kwangulonga na hetwe hambe tulole?”
Yesu nakedichila, “Wone na muwe hambe mlole, mwahawele hela nongwa, ila lelo hemwe mwangulonga, hetwe twangulola, na ahyo mwangulajila mng'hali na nongwa.”
Yesu nakalonga kata hino, “Ndangulonga ndikomya, wone munhu yogana kwinjila mli mibani ja ming'holo ne kukolela hali lwizi, na kwinjila kwa kukwina kulukanzi mwa mibani, ayo kowa muhizi na mbokaji.
Munhu yalingukolela hali lwizi lwa mibani, ayo ndo kowa mdima ming'holo yanojile.
Mlolela mibani komchumulila, na ming'holo ja heye johulika mluzi wa mdimi, kowa wojichema ming'holo kwa matagwa, na kujilongoza kunze.
Wone wajilavye kunze, heye kowa yalongole kumwando na ming'holo jimuwinza kumbele, kwa vila jowa jihulika luzi lwa mdimi.”
Ming'holo hajimuwinza munhu mjenzi, ila jombilima, kwa vila hajizelele luzi lwa heye.
Yesu nakawalonjela nhelo ayi, ila hewo nahawavizelele choni choyaganile kuwalonjela.
Yesu nakahiluchila kulonga, “Ndanguwalonjela ndikomya, heni ndo hali lwizi lwa kukolela ming'holo.
Hewo woyile heni sinoya, awo wowa wahizi na wabokaji, ila ming'holo hajiwahulika hewo.
Heni ndo lwizi lwa kukolela, munhu yoneche yokwinjila kukolela hali heni, kowa yaloholigwe, yokwinjila na kulawa kunze, na kuwona mhale.
Muhizi koyaga hela kuhiza na kukopola na kuwifya. Heni mbuya hela, ndiwape hemwe ukomu, ukomu wenele.
“Heni nda mdimi nojile, yawele kuya na kukopoligwa kwa kujilohola ming'holo.
Wone hawele mdimi yanojile, na ming'holo hajiwele ja heye, wone yalyone libwa lya kisolo likuya, kobilima na kuleka ming'holo jiliyeka. Aho libwa lyochibata na kibagulanga nakachene ming'holo.
Munhu yavisigwe kangubilima, kwa vila heye ka munhu wa mijito hela, kahela isungu na ming'holo.
kkkkHeni nda mdimi nojile. Ndiwazele wali wa heni, na hewo wali wa heni wanzela.
Kota vila Mhaza vyoyanzelele, na heni vyondimnzelele Mhaza. Heni ndangulavya ukomu wa heni kwa chiwalo cha mingholo.
Na ming'holo jinji ndigalilwe heni, hajiwele hamwe na jiyawo, ndojiwinza na kujihanza ha jiyawo, johulika luzi lwa heni na jowa mchilundo chimwe chili na mdimi yumwe.
“Mhaza kangungana heni, kwa vila ndangukunda kulavya ukomu wa heni, leka hamba ndiuhiluse kahi.
Kuduhu munhu yowa na ludali lwa kusa ukomu wa heni. Ndangulavya kota vyonganile heni. Ndoweza kuulavya na kuuhilusa kahi. Ahi ndo Mhaza wa heni vyoyandajize heni kudita.”
Kahi kwali na kibagula kwa hewo Wayahudi kwa aula ulonzi woyalonjile Yesu.
Wanhu wenji nawalonga, “Kana Limazoga! Kana lukwale! Iwa ndaze mwangumuhulichiza heye?”
Ila wanhu wanji nawalonga, “Munhu yawele na chijeni, kowa yolonga kota hino! Yowa ndaze Limazoga limlohole munhu yali yohambe yalole?”
Ako Yelusalemu kwali na mnvina ya kukumbuchila kwela kwa Ng'handa ya Nguluwi kwa Nguluwi. Muhela awo kwali na mbeho.
Yesu nayali yojenda mchipepela cha Solomoni, kuli Ng'handa ya Nguluwi.
Wayahudi vyowamuwene, wammemelela na kumuuza, wata, “Kotuleka mu uviso mbaka nili? Utulonjele kukomya, hegwe ndo Kilistu Mlohozi.”
Yesu nakawedichila, “Mina ndiwalonjela, ila hemwe hamlingukunda hebu. Vinhu vyondilingudita vifanda kota heye yandajize heni ndite.
Ila hemwe hamkunda hebu, vyohamuwele ming'holo ja heni.
Ming'holo ja heni jihulikaga luzi lwa heni, na heni ndijizela na jangumbinza.
Ndanguwapa ukomu wa mazuwa gose ne kuduma, na hawobagama hebu, na kuduhu munhu yoweza kuwalavya mmoko wa heni.
Mhaza wa heni ndo yamhele awo, wawele mng'hangala kusinda weng'ha, na hewo hawokwaga mazuwa gose, na kuduhu munhu yomboka mmoko wa heni.
Heni na Mhaza twa yumwe.”
Wayahudi nawalokota maganga, leka wamtowe.
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Ndiwalajilani mbuli nyinji kulawa kwa Mhaza. Ilikohi kuli azo zilinguwadita msubule na maganga?”
Wayahudi nawamwidichila wata, “Hatulingugana tukutowe na maganga kwa agala ganojile gouditile, ila vyoumkovula Nguluwi. Kwa vila hegwe kwa munhu hela, ila kwangidita kota Nguluwi!”
Yesu nakedichila, “Ndaze, hayandichigwe kuli chitabu cha Malajizo ga hemwe kota Nguluwi kalonga, ‘Heni ndonga hemwe mwa milungu?’
Nguluwi kawachema milungu wala wapeligwe usenga wa heye, na hetwe tuvizela kota Maandiko Matakatifu gangukomya ng'hatu mazuwa gose.
Kota vila Mhaza kanyhagula heni na kunhuma kuli isi yeng'ha, mwangumlonjela, kwangukovula, kwa vila nandonga, ‘Heni nda mwana wa Nguluwi.’
Wone muwene silingudita mijito johaganile Mhaza wa heni, mleche kung'hunda.
Ila wone ndilingudita, na hemwe mlema kung'hunda heni, yowa goya wone mkunde gondilingudita, aho mowa mvizelele kota, Mhaza kangikala mgati mwa heni, na heni ndangikala mgati mwa Mhaza.”
Nawalapa kahi wamibate Yesu, ila heye kasulupuka mmoko mwawo.
Yesu nakaluta kahi mwambu mwa lwanda lwa Yolodani, honhu Yohani nayali yobatiza, nakekala kuko.
Wanhu wenji nawoya walonga, “Yohani nahaditile ulajilo woneche,” “Geng'ha gowalonjile kwa munhu ayu nakakomya.”
Wanhu wenji wa ako nawamkunda Yesu.
Munhu yumwe yali yochemigwa Lazalo yali mtamwa. Munhu ayo yali yochikala hali muji wa Besania. Muji awo ndo kwali hakaye ha Maliya na lumbulye Malita.
Maliya ayu ndo yuyula yambakaze Mkulu Yesu mafuta ga kubakaliza na kubagusa kwa mnvili za heye. Lelo Lazalo, lumbulye ndo yali yotamika.
Awala wadala wahilika usenga kwa Yesu walonga, “Mkulu, mkulugwe ulingumgana Lazalo kangutamika.”
Yesu vyoyahuliche ago, nakalonga, “Utamwa awu haumkopola hebu Lazalo, ila ni kwa mbuli ya ukulu wa Nguluwi. Lazalo kotamika leka kwa kukolela ayo Mwana wa Nguluwi yapegwe ukulu.”
Yesu nakamgana heko Malita na lumbulye na mkulu wawo Lazalo.
Vyoyahuliche kota Lazalo mtamwa, kekala bahala hoyawele mazuwa gayage meli.
Hamba nakawalonjela walanguswa wa heye, “Tucheni tuhiluche Yudeya.”
Walanguswa nawamwidichila, “Mlangusa, kusemwa mhela udo hela Wayahudi vyowali wogana kukusubula na maganga, kahi kwangugana uhiluche kuko?”
Yesu nakawalonjela, “Zuwa limwe lina saa kumi na meli, si ndo vyoili? Lelo heye yojenda kuzelu hochikwang'wala hebu, kwavila kanguwona uzelu.
Ila wone munhu yojenda nechilo, kochikwang'hbwala, kwa vila kahela lumuli mgati mwa heye.”
Yesu nakalonga ago na konjezela, “Mganwa wa hetwe Lazalo kawasa, heni ndoluta ndikamwinule.”
Walanguswa nawedichila, “Mkulu, wone yawasile kowa mkomu.”
Yesu yali yolonga mbuli ya kubagama kwa Lazalo, ila walanguswa hewo nawavizela kota Lazalo kawasa hela.
Hamba Yesu nakawatubulila kalonga, “Lazalo kabagama.
Ndangusangalala kwavila nasali ako ila mkunde. Lelo tucheni koyali.”
Tomasi yali yochemigwa mnyambili kawalonjela walanguswa wayage kalonga, “Tucheni na hetwe tukabagame hamawe na heye.”
Yesu vyoyafichile, nakafika wamtilile Lazalo katali mazuwa gane nagakola.
Besania kwali kutali kwa kota maili zidatu hino kulawa Yelusalemu.
Wayahudi wenji nawoya kuwahembuliza Malita na Maliya kwa kufiligwa na lumbulyawo Lazalo.
Malita vyoyahuliche kota Yesu kanguya, nakaluta kumbochela, ila heye Maliya nakapona hakaye.
Malita nakamlonjela Yesu, “Mkulu, na uwe baha, lumbulyangu hali bagama!
Ila ndivizela kota na sambi, Nguluwi kokupa choneche choumlanda!”
Yesu nakamlonjela Malita, “Lumbulyake heye kozilipuka kahi.”
Malita nakedichila, “Ndivizela kota kozilipuka kuli zuwa lya mwiso.”
Yesu nakamlonjela, “Heni nda uzilipulo na ukomu. Munhu yoneche yalingung'hunda, kowa mkomu Ila wone yabagame.
Na munhu yoneche yalingikala na kung'hunda hobagama hebu! Lelo kwangukunda aga?”
Malita nakedichila, “Ena Mkulu! Ndangukunda kota hegwe uli Kilistu Mlohozi, Mwana wa Nguluwi yalinguya muisi.”
Malita vyoyalonjile ago, nakahiluka mng'handa na kumchema lumbulye Maliya hafungo yaliyeka. Kamlonjela, “Mlangusa koya, kangukuchema hegwe.”
